item.title: Kin Expands into Colorado with Customized Home Insurance Solutions for Severe Weather Challenges
item.description:
Kin, a direct-to-consumer digital home insurance provider, has announced its expansion into Colorado, offering homeowners a new insurance option that blends technology with personalized service. This move is part of Kin's mission to provide accessible and affordable coverage in markets heavily impacted by weather events. Colorado's unique environmental challenges, including hail, wildfires, and severe weather, have led to a significant increase in insurance premiums, making Kin's data-driven, customized approach particularly relevant. The company's CEO, Sean Harper, emphasizes the importance of understanding each property's unique risks to offer tailored protection at fair prices. With a 4.8 customer service rating in other states prone to severe weather, Kin aims to deliver transparent, technology-driven insurance solutions to Colorado residents.

According to NOAA data, Colorado has seen a 159% increase in billion-dollar-loss weather events, highlighting the urgent need for innovative insurance solutions. Kin's platform analyzes thousands of property-specific factors to ensure accurate pricing and coverage that meets homeowners' needs. The Rocky Mountain Insurance Information Association reports a 59.5% average increase in homeowners' premium rates from 2018 to 2023, underscoring the value of Kin's direct-to-consumer model, which eliminates traditional barriers and added costs. Angel Conlin, Kin's Chief Insurance Officer, notes that the company's offerings are designed with Colorado's specific challenges in mind, from hail season to wildfire risks, providing residents with straightforward, value-driven insurance options.

item.title: Newton Golf Company Inc. Introduces Lighter Shaft to Cater to Growing Women's Golf Market
item.description:
The golf industry is witnessing a significant transformation with women's participation reaching a historic high of 28% in the United States, marking a 41% increase since 2019. This surge is not only reshaping the demographic landscape of the sport but also fueling the global golf equipment market, which is projected to grow at nearly 6% annually, reaching an estimated $25.5 billion in 2024. At the forefront of this evolution is Newton Golf Company (NASDAQ: NWTG), which has introduced a lighter shaft designed to cater to golfers of all levels, including the burgeoning number of female players. This innovation, which maintains precision, stability, and distance, is gaining traction among tour professionals and weekend enthusiasts alike.

The rise in women's golf participation, especially among younger women engaging through recreational and social formats, is creating fresh opportunities for equipment manufacturers. Newton Golf's latest offering is perfectly timed to meet the demands of this dynamic market. For more insights into this development, Read More>>. Additionally, updates on NWTG can be found in the company’s newsroom at https://ibn.fm/NWTG.

item.title: CGC Sets New Record in Card Grading Industry with Historic Milestone
item.description:
Certified Guaranty Company® (CGC®) has set a new benchmark in the card grading industry by grading a staggering 570,000 cards in May 2025, as reported by NOTICIAS NEWSWIRE. This achievement follows another record in April, where over 341,000 trading card games (TCGs), sports, and non-sports cards were graded, solidifying CGC's position as the fastest-growing card grading company. The introduction of the CGC Pristine 10 label in 2023 has significantly influenced the secondary market, with cards like the Alpha Black Lotus fetching up to $3 million. Sports cards, particularly a Victor Wembanyama rookie card graded CGC 9.5, have also seen remarkable auction results, exceeding $100,000.

CGC's exponential growth is evident with sports cards up by 631% and TCGs by 146% year-over-year in May. The company's commitment to affordable, fast, and accurate grading services, along with strategic global expansions, is driving this unprecedented growth. With plans to grade 10 million cards by year-end and offices in key global cities, CGC is reshaping the collector's market, making it more accessible and lucrative for enthusiasts worldwide.

item.title: BluSky AI Inc. Elevates Market Position with Transition to OTCID Tier
item.description:
BluSky AI (OTC: BSAI) is set to transition from the OTC Pink Sheets to the OTCID tier by July 1, 2025, a move that highlights the company's commitment to higher reporting, compliance, and transparency standards. This transition is a significant step in BluSky AI's strategic growth, following its recent achievements such as the expansion of modular AI datacenters, new infrastructure partnerships, the launch of GPU-as-a-Service, and enhanced financial governance. CEO Trent D’Ambrosio emphasized that this upgrade is a testament to the company's dedication to building investor confidence and creating long-term value, aiming for greater market visibility and access to capital. BluSky AI, based in Salt Lake City, Utah, is at the forefront of providing innovative and sustainable infrastructure solutions to power the AI revolution, with plans to address the global AI supply shortage through its cutting-edge, turnkey modular solutions.

For more details, the full press release can be viewed at https://ibn.fm/Ij5k9. BluSky AI's initiatives and services are further detailed on their website at https://bluskyaidatacenters.com/. AINewsWire, a specialized communications platform focusing on AI advancements, provides comprehensive coverage on such innovations, offering a bridge between AI companies and their target audiences through various distribution channels.

item.title: UGI Utilities Launches Gas Main Upgrade in Hazleton to Enhance Safety and Reliability
item.description: UGI Utilities is set to embark on a significant system upgrade project in Hazleton, starting June 24 on Berner Avenue, as part of its ongoing commitment to ensuring safe and reliable service. This project not only involves the replacement of a gas main but also presents an opportunity for homes and businesses along the route to switch to natural gas. The construction will necessitate the closure of Berner Avenue between South Cedar Street and South Poplar Street during work hours, with access maintained for local residents and businesses. Parking restrictions and temporary interruptions to natural gas service are expected, requiring UGI to access properties for inspection and equipment relighting. The underground work aims for completion by mid-July, pending weather and working conditions, with final paving and restoration to follow. UGI invites those interested in converting to natural gas to reach out via phone or email at gasconversion@ugi.com. UGI Utilities, Inc., serving over 760,000 customers, continues to prioritize infrastructure improvements and customer service. More details can be found at www.ugi.com.

item.title: BluSky AI Inc. Launches SkyMod Series to Revolutionize AI Compute Infrastructure
item.description:
BluSky AI (OTC: BSAI) has made a significant leap in the AI infrastructure space with the launch of its SkyMod series, a modular AI datacenter infrastructure designed for rapid deployment. The series includes the SkyMod One, offering 1 MW of compute power in a compact 1,400-square-foot footprint, and the SkyMod XL, which provides 1.7 MW across 3,000 square feet. These units are equipped with NVIDIA GPUs and are ready for plug-and-play activation, targeting AI-intensive applications like generative AI and large language models. BluSky AI also highlights the sustainability features of its design, including efficient cooling and power systems, aligning with ESG goals. For more details, the full press release can be viewed here.

Headquartered in Salt Lake City, Utah, BluSky AI Inc. is at the forefront of providing innovative and sustainable infrastructure solutions to power the AI revolution. The company aims to address the global AI supply shortage with its cutting-edge, turnkey modular solutions, transforming how AI companies access the necessary compute power for innovation and growth. More information about BluSky AI can be found on their website.

InvestorWire, a specialized communications platform, played a key role in disseminating this news. As part of the Dynamic Brand Portfolio at IBN, InvestorWire offers advanced wire-grade press release syndication and a range of corporate communications solutions to enhance visibility and brand awareness for companies. Discover more about their services at InvestorWire.

item.title: DominicanCaOnline Launches Fully Online Early Childhood Education Certificate Program
item.description: DominicanCaOnline has launched a fully online, flexible early childhood education certificate program, designed for educators from Pre-K through third grade. This program offers graduate-level ECE units, accessible nationwide, aiming to help teachers meet continuing education requirements and advance their careers without disrupting their personal or professional lives. The announcement is timely, addressing the increasing demands on early childhood educators to demonstrate specialized expertise and stay current with developmental standards. The program is 100% online, fully flexible, graduate-level, and professionally relevant, focusing on child development, early literacy, classroom inclusion, and parent engagement. It is designed to fit into educators' busy schedules, allowing them to study at their own pace. The certificate is accredited by the Dominican University of California, ensuring the units earned are recognized for state license renewal, district salary advancement, and eligibility for specialized roles. DominicanCaOnline, known for its educator-focused professional development programs, continues its mission to make continuing education more accessible and relevant for teachers.

item.title: LaFleur Minerals Inc. Positions Itself as a Key Player in the Abitibi Gold Belt
item.description:
LaFleur Minerals Inc. (CSE: LFLR) (OTCQB: LFLRF) is making significant strides in the Abitibi Gold Belt with its Swanson Gold Project and the near-term restart of its Beacon Gold Mill. The company has consolidated a strategic land package, including acquisitions from Monarch Mining, Abcourt Mines, and Globex Mining, positioning itself as a key player in the region. With a 2024 mineral resource estimate of 123,400 oz indicated and 64,500 oz inferred at the Swanson Gold Project, and a 5,000-meter drilling program underway, LaFleur is on a path to potentially grow its resource to 1 million ounces. The Beacon Gold Mill, acquired in 2024 and recently refurbished, offers a low-cost production restart with an estimated budget of C$5-6 million, aiming for annual gold production of 15,000 to 20,000 ounces by early 2026. LaFleur's hub-and-spoke model and experienced leadership team underscore its transition from exploration to production, leveraging Québec's rich mining infrastructure and rising gold prices for growth.

LaFleur Minerals is not just focusing on its own projects but also offering custom milling opportunities to regional projects, which could generate additional cash flow with minimal capital outlay. This strategy, combined with the company's vision to become an intermediate gold producer, highlights its potential for regional consolidation and strategic partnerships. The company's progress is supported by a seasoned team with over 100 years of combined expertise in mining, finance, and capital markets. For investors and stakeholders, LaFleur's developments represent a compelling opportunity in the gold sector, especially in the current market conditions. Read More>> and stay updated with the latest news at https://ibn.fm/LFLRF.

item.title: Foremost Clean Energy Ltd. Strengthens Financial Position with $4.5 Million Raised for Uranium Exploration
item.description:
Foremost Clean Energy Ltd. (NASDAQ: FMST) (CSE: FAT) has significantly bolstered its financial standing by raising over $4.5 million through recent warrant and option exercises by insiders and investors. This financial injection is set to fuel the company's exploration and drilling activities, particularly timely given the current surge in uranium prices and an anticipated structural supply deficit. In a strategic move to enhance its market presence, Foremost has extended its investor awareness campaign with LFG Equities Corp. until December 31, 2025. This campaign aims to spotlight Foremost's unique role in the nuclear energy supply chain and its Nasdaq-listed exposure to Canada's uranium-rich Athabasca Basin, alongside Denison Mines Corp. (NYSE American: DNN). The initiative will leverage digital outreach, influencer engagement, and social media content across North America to reach a broader audience.

Foremost Clean Energy is on the verge of becoming a key player in North American uranium exploration, with interests in 10 properties covering over 330,000 acres in the Athabasca Basin. The company is poised to meet the growing global demand for nuclear power, a critical component in the world's decarbonization efforts. Additionally, Foremost holds a secondary portfolio of lithium projects across Manitoba and Quebec, further diversifying its clean energy assets. For more details on Foremost's initiatives and to view the full press release, visit https://ibn.fm/qKmQ7.

item.title: Exit Factor Recognized on Inc.'s 2025 Best Workplaces List for Outstanding Employee Culture
item.description:
Exit Factor, a leading franchise in business value enhancement and exit planning, has been named to Inc.'s 2025 Best Workplaces list, recognized in the Best Products & Services category. This prestigious accolade, featured on Inc.com, highlights companies that excel in creating vibrant cultures and exceptional workplaces. The selection process involved a thorough employee survey by Quantum Workplace, evaluating management effectiveness, perks, and company culture. Jessica Fialkovich, founder and president of Exit Factor, expressed pride in this recognition, attributing it to the company's strong, values-driven culture. As part of the United Franchise Group, Exit Factor offers a comprehensive suite of services aimed at increasing business value and facilitating successful exits, leveraging a global network and decades of franchising expertise.

The Inc. Best Workplaces program, as noted by Bonny Ghosh, Inc.'s editorial director, celebrates organizations that prioritize employee welfare and needs, a significant achievement in today's evolving economic landscape. Exit Factor's inclusion among the 514 honored companies underscores its commitment to fostering a supportive and engaging work environment. For those interested in exploring franchise opportunities or learning more about Exit Factor's services, additional information is available at http://www.exitfactorfranchise.com/ and www.ExitFactor.com.

item.title: Datavault AI and Brookhaven National Laboratory Pioneer AI-Driven Biofuel Crop Optimization
item.description:
Datavault AI (NASDAQ: DVLT) is at the forefront of revolutionizing biofuel crop optimization through its AI-driven multi-modal machine learning system. In partnership with the U.S. Department of Energy’s Brookhaven National Laboratory, the company is leveraging high-performance computing and digital twin technology to model metabolic pathways in canola (Brassica napus), aiming to enhance fatty acid metabolism. This initiative is a critical step towards reducing the development time for commercially viable biofuel crops, aligning with U.S. policies to replace up to 140,000 barrels of crude oil daily with biofuels. Datavault AI's innovative approach not only underscores its leadership in AI and data monetization but also its commitment to sustainable energy solutions. For more details, visit the full press release at https://ibn.fm/HxW9i.

Beyond biofuels, Datavault AI is making waves in the Web 3.0 environment with its cloud-based platform that offers comprehensive solutions across various industries. Its Acoustic Science Division boasts patented technologies like WiSA(R), ADIO(R), and Sumerian(R), while its Data Science Division harnesses the power of Web 3.0 for experiential data perception and monetization. The company's Information Data Exchange(R) (IDE) facilitates the creation of Digital Twins and the licensing of name, image, and likeness (NIL), showcasing its versatility and innovation in the tech space. Learn more about Datavault AI at www.datavaultsite.com.

item.title: ESGold Corp. Advances Montauban Gold-Silver Project with $3.3 Million Private Placement
item.description:
ESGold Corp. (CSE: ESAU) (OTCQB: ESAUF) has announced a significant non-brokered private placement, aiming to raise up to $3.285 million through the sale of units at $0.73 each. Each unit includes one common share and a share purchase warrant, with the latter exercisable at $0.91 within 18 months. The funds are earmarked for the construction of a mill circuit, final mobilization at the Montauban Gold-Silver Project, and general working capital, pending approval from the Canadian Securities Exchange. This move underscores ESGold's commitment to advancing its clean mining and exploration initiatives in Quebec, with the Montauban property being a cornerstone of its sustainable and innovative mining practices.

The announcement was highlighted by Rocks & Stocks, a specialized communications platform within the Dynamic Brand Portfolio of IBN, known for its deep insights into the mining industry and its ability to disseminate information across a wide network. ESGold's strategic funding initiative is a testament to its pre-production resource company status and its focus on delivering long-term value through responsible mining and exploration. For more details, the full press release can be accessed via the provided link, offering investors and stakeholders a closer look at ESGold's ambitious plans and the potential impact on the mining sector.

item.title: Europe's Electric Vehicle Market Shows Signs of Recovery Amid Challenges
item.description:
Electric vehicle (EV) sales in Europe are experiencing a notable rebounding, marking a significant shift from the previous months of slowed adoption and consumer hesitancy. Despite being the second-largest EV market globally, Europe faced challenges in 2024, including high costs, range anxiety, and brand controversies, which deterred potential buyers. However, recent trends indicate a resurgence in EV sales, though the growth remains uneven across different regions. This revival could benefit companies like Massimo Group (NASDAQ: MAMO), signaling a potential uptick in demand for EVs and related services.

GreenCarStocks (GCS), a specialized communications platform focusing on the EV and green energy sector, highlights this development. As part of the Dynamic Brand Portfolio under IBN, GCS provides comprehensive coverage and analysis, offering insights into the evolving EV market landscape. This resurgence in EV sales underscores the dynamic nature of the automotive industry and the growing emphasis on sustainable transportation solutions.

item.title: Global Copper Market Faces Strain as US Demand Surges, Highlighting Supply Disparities
item.description:
The global copper market is experiencing significant shifts as demand in the U.S. surges ahead of potential import duties, leading to supply shortages worldwide. The London Metal Exchange reports dwindling stocks, highlighting the growing imbalance in copper supply. This scenario presents a unique opportunity for investors, particularly in companies like Aston Bay Holdings Ltd. (TSX.V: BAY) (OTCQB: ATBHF), which owns properties with proven copper reserves. The situation underscores the importance of strategic investments in the mining sector to capitalize on the ahead of potential market shifts.

MiningNewsWire (MNW), a key player in disseminating mining sector news, offers comprehensive coverage and analysis, making it a vital resource for investors and industry stakeholders. With its extensive network and tailored communication solutions, MNW ensures that its audience stays informed about critical developments, such as the current copper supply disparities. For those looking to dive deeper into the implications of these market dynamics, Read More>> provides further insights.

item.title: England's Department for Education Advocates AI for Grading to Modernize Teaching
item.description:
The Department for Education (DfE) in England has issued new guidelines encouraging teachers to use AI for handling repetitive tasks, marking a significant step towards integrating artificial intelligence in the educational sector. This move highlights the potential for AI solutions, such as those offered by Thumzup Media Corp. (NASDAQ: TZUP), to gain traction in schools. The guidelines aim to streamline administrative tasks, allowing educators to focus more on teaching and less on paperwork.

AINewsWire ("AINW"), a specialized communications platform focusing on AI advancements, plays a pivotal role in disseminating such innovative news. Part of the Dynamic Brand Portfolio @ IBN, AINW leverages a vast network to ensure wide distribution of AI-related news, enhancing visibility for companies and technologies shaping the future of education and beyond.

item.title: Iberian Peninsula Blackout Sparks Debate on Renewable Energy Reliability
item.description:
Recent events on the Iberian Peninsula, where a blackout lasted over 10 hours, have sparked debates on the reliability of renewable energy sources, given that the region derives more than 60% of its electricity from green sources. Contrary to some assumptions that solar or wind systems were at fault, experts argue that such glitches don’t always indicate failure in clean energy systems. This situation mirrors the early challenges faced by electric vehicles, with companies like Mullen Automotive Inc. (NASDAQ: MULN) learning from past experiences to improve current models. For more insights, Read More>>.

GreenEnergyStocks (GES), a platform dedicated to companies shaping the green economy, highlights the importance of understanding the growing pains associated with transitioning to renewable energy. GES, part of the Dynamic Brand Portfolio at IBN, offers comprehensive corporate communications solutions to enhance visibility and engagement for green energy companies. For updates on Mullen Automotive Inc., visit https://ibn.fm/MULN.

item.title: Trump's Cryptocurrency Earnings Highlight Growing Industry Legitimacy
item.description: Former President Donald Trump's financial disclosure has unveiled a staggering $600 million income last year, significantly bolstered by his ventures into the cryptocurrency sector, alongside earnings from real estate and licensing deals. This revelation, detailed in his public financial disclosure form, highlights the growing intersection of high-profile individuals and digital assets, potentially boosting public confidence in cryptocurrencies. Companies like MARA Holdings Inc. (NASDAQ: MARA) may benefit from this heightened interest. The news, covered by CryptoCurrencyWire, underscores the platform's role in disseminating critical information in the blockchain and cryptocurrency sectors, offering a comprehensive suite of services to enhance brand visibility and investor engagement.

item.title: Barclays Announces Major Job Cuts in Investment Banking Unit to Boost Efficiency
item.description:
Barclays, a leading UK bank, is set to cut more than 200 jobs in its investment banking division, targeting around 3% of its workforce, including senior roles like managing directors. This move is part of Barclays' strategy to streamline operations and focus on more lucrative sectors. The article also hints at potential similar adjustments by other financial giants, such as B. Riley Financial Inc. (NASDAQ: RILY), as the investment banking sector continues to evolve. The news was reported by BillionDollarClub, a platform known for its focus on major corporations and its ability to disseminate information widely through its network.

BillionDollarClub, part of the InvestorBrandNetwork (IBN), offers comprehensive corporate communication solutions, including press release enhancement and social media distribution, to ensure maximum visibility for its clients. This platform stands out for its ability to connect companies with a broad audience, including investors and the general public, making it a pivotal player in financial news dissemination.

item.title: FingerMotion and Qingling Motors Forge Strategic Partnership to Revolutionize Commercial Mobility
item.description:
FingerMotion Inc. (NASDAQ: FNGR), through its subsidiary JiuGe Technology, has announced a strategic partnership with Qingling Motors to co-develop intelligent vehicle solutions. This collaboration aims to enhance efficiency and sustainability in commercial mobility, focusing on high-demand sectors such as logistics and emergency response. Qingling Motors will lead the vehicle design and compliance aspects, while JiuGe Technology will contribute its expertise in software integration and smart system development. A joint technical taskforce has been established to foster innovation, share intellectual property, and support long-term growth, including plans for international expansion and the development of remote service ecosystems. For more details, the full press release can be viewed here.

FingerMotion Inc. is a technology company specializing in mobile payment and recharge platform solutions in China. It is actively expanding its ecosystem by introducing value-added technologies to engage a growing user base, with ambitions to serve over 1 billion users in the China market and beyond. Learn more about FingerMotion Inc. by visiting their website.

item.title: UMAXX Endorses Trump Organization's Mobile Initiative, Highlighting Privacy and Domestic Manufacturing
item.description: UMAXX, a U.S.-based brand known for its privacy-first smartphones and services, has expressed support for the Trump Organization's new mobile phone initiative, highlighting the alignment with its own Liberty Phones. These smartphones, assembled in the U.S. with domestic components, offer unparalleled privacy features like physical kill switches for various connectivity options and run on PureOS, an open-source operating system designed to eliminate tracking. UMAXX's CEO, Jim Devericks, emphasized the company's readiness to collaborate with the Trump team, offering their tested and proven Liberty Phone platform. Available now, the Liberty Phones come with UMAXX's live TV service, providing a comprehensive secure mobile experience. The company has already engaged in preliminary discussions with the Trump Organization and remains open to further collaboration to advance digital freedom for Americans.

item.title: Mariner Strengthens Independent Advisory Platform with Strategic Leadership Appointments
item.description: Mariner, a leading national financial services firm, is doubling down on its commitment to the independent advisor sector through the expansion of its Mariner Independent platform. With over 1,100 advisors and $40 billion in assets under management, the platform is a cornerstone of Mariner's growth. The firm has bolstered its leadership team with the appointment of Rob Sandrew as Head of Mariner Independent and Verne Marble as Managing Director, signaling a strong push towards innovation and expansion in the independent advisor space. These strategic hires come at a time when Mariner is experiencing significant growth, offering advisors flexible affiliation models and succession solutions, exemplified by the acquisition of Ocean Heights Advisors. Mariner's CEO, Marty Bicknell, emphasizes the platform's success in providing advisors the freedom to operate independently with robust support. Since its inception in 2020, Mariner Independent has offered a comprehensive suite of services, backed by a team of over 300 professionals, making it a pivotal player in the financial advisory industry.

item.title: Innovative Designs, Inc. Reports Stellar Financial Growth Driven by Demand for INSULTEX® Technology
item.description: Innovative Designs, Inc. (OTC Pink: IVDN), a leader in the homebuilding and remodeling industry, has reported a staggering 165% increase in revenue for the fiscal second quarter of 2025, reaching $796,369, and a 265% increase for the first six months of the year, totaling $1,340,285. This marks a significant turnaround from the previous year's losses, with the company now boasting profitability for three consecutive quarters and a record net income of over $240,000 for the first half of 2025. The company's success is attributed to its patented INSULTEX® technology, featured in products like the Insultex® House Wrap and Arctic Armor® Line, which are recognized as the thinnest, lightest, and warmest insulators available. For more details, visit http://www.insultexhousewrap.com and http://www.idigear.com.

item.title: Get OSHA Courses Revolutionizes Workplace Safety Training with Online OSHA 30 Certification
item.description:
Get OSHA Courses is revolutionizing workplace safety training with its innovative platform, offering OSHA 30 online and other OSHA training online. This initiative is designed to meet the surging demand for certified professionals in various high-hazard professions, including construction, general industry, and warehousing. The platform provides a fast, affordable, and accessible way for workers and companies to achieve OSHA certification online, ensuring compliance with legal requirements and enhancing job eligibility.

The OSHA 30 certification is highlighted as a critical requirement for many jobs across the U.S., with Get OSHA Courses standing out by offering excellent training materials, instant access, mobile-friendly learning, and round-the-clock support. The company's rapid scaling to meet nationwide needs post-COVID underscores the growing importance of workplace safety and the demand for quality training programs. Trusted by workers and respected by employers, Get OSHA Courses is committed to providing a reliable, affordable pathway to workplace safety and job advancement.

item.title: DeckArt Unveils 2025 Limited-Edition Skateboard Art Decks, Blending Skate Culture with Contemporary Design
item.description:
DeckArt, a Melbourne-based design studio, has unveiled its latest collection of limited-edition skateboard art decks, blending skate culture with contemporary design. The 2025 lineup, a collaboration with visual artists, illustrators, and designers, showcases a variety of styles on Canadian maple decks, emphasizing quality and collectability. Sam West, DeckArt's founder, highlights the collection's aim to merge new visual ideas with skate culture's essence, creating pieces that resonate whether displayed or used. Available exclusively at www.deckart.com.au, the collection is already attracting attention from collectors and design-savvy retailers.

Founded in 2023 by Sam West, DeckArt specializes in transforming skateboard decks into limited-edition art pieces, collaborating with artists to produce collections that celebrate individuality and subculture. Each release is designed to be visually striking and culturally relevant, appealing to both art enthusiasts and skateboarders.

item.title: New Book 'Fractured to Freedom' Offers Path to Personal Liberation This Independence Day
item.description:
Fractured to Freedom, a groundbreaking book by Al Perry, is set to launch on July 4, 2025, offering a unique perspective on independence and personal healing. Unlike the traditional celebrations of freedom with fireworks and parades, Perry's work emphasizes the quiet, internal journey towards liberation from personal pain and fear. The book, described as a comprehensive and interactive guide to holistic healing, combines Perry's personal narrative with actionable tools for personal growth, including mindset practices, energy anatomy, and meditation techniques. It's a call to embrace freedom through self-reflection and healing, rather than external celebrations.

Al Perry, with over 36 years of experience in healing, shares his transformative journey from trauma and addiction to becoming a healer and teacher. His approach integrates Taoist wisdom with practical insights, aiming to guide readers towards a life of openness and ease. The book will be available on Amazon, and more information can be found at qiworks.net. Perry's story and methodologies offer a beacon of hope for those seeking to overcome their own fractures and find true freedom.

item.title: Rug Renovating Showcases Century-Old Craftsmanship on Designing Spaces
item.description: Rug Renovating, the United States' oldest and largest rug restoration company, recently showcased its expertise on the award-winning home improvement show, Designing Spaces. The segment, which aired in the New York market, highlighted the company's 125-year legacy of rug cleaning, restoration, and preservation. Founded in 1896 and still family-owned, Rug Renovating employs master craftspeople dedicated to reviving rugs of all types, from antique treasures to modern designs. Laura Iskyan, General Manager, expressed pride in the company's craftsmanship and history, emphasizing their commitment to excellence. The feature provided a glimpse into the company's state-of-the-art facility, revealing the meticulous processes behind their national reputation for quality. Rug Renovating's services are trusted by homeowners, designers, and collectors alike, setting the gold standard in rug care. For more details, visit www.rugrenovating.com or watch the segment at Designing Spaces.

item.title: CollectionPro Services LLC Revolutionizes Healthcare Revenue Recovery with No-Risk Model
item.description:
In the face of tightening healthcare reimbursements and increasing payer resistance, CollectionPro Services LLC stands out as a beacon of hope for providers struggling with Out-of-Network (OON) collections. With a unique blend of legal expertise and innovative revenue cycle strategies, CollectionPro offers a risk-free solution to recover what's rightfully owed to healthcare providers. Their approach is underscored by a 92% success rate in over 10,000 arbitration cases, particularly under the No Surprises Act (NSA), ensuring providers have a fighting chance in complex disputes and overdue payments.

What sets CollectionPro apart is their commitment to transparency and provider empowerment. Their flat 10% contingency model means no upfront costs, no hidden fees, and payment only upon successful recovery. This model spans across all specialties, including those with traditionally high dispute rates like anesthesia and emergency care. Moreover, CollectionPro covers all administrative and arbitration fees upfront, removing financial barriers to dispute resolution. Their expertise in reviving denied OON claims under NSA guidelines has enabled providers to reclaim revenue previously thought lost, making them a pivotal ally in the healthcare financial landscape.

item.title: ERZIA Strengthens Market Presence in Southern California Through Strategic Partnership with ACETEC
item.description: ERZIA, a global leader in high-performance RF and microwave amplifiers and subsystems, has announced a strategic partnership with ACETEC, appointing them as the exclusive ERZIA representative for Southern California. This collaboration leverages ACETEC's 30 years of expertise in the RF, microwave, and test equipment industries to expand ERZIA's presence in the technologically vibrant region. David Diez, Managing Director at ERZIA, highlighted the alignment of ACETEC's technical knowledge and customer focus with ERZIA's commitment to innovation in mission-critical RF solutions. The partnership promises enhanced local access to ERZIA's high-reliability RF systems, supported by ACETEC's expert service, benefiting sectors like Defense, Space, SATCOM, and Electronic Warfare. Both companies will showcase their collaboration at the International Microwave Symposium in San Francisco, offering a platform for industry engagement and exploration of ERZIA's latest innovations.

item.title: Luxury Rehab Centers for Couples Now More Accessible with Insurance Coverage
item.description:
CouplesRehabGuide.com has unveiled an updated collection of resources focusing on luxury rehabilitation centers for couples, particularly those accepting Blue Cross Blue Shield (BCBS) insurance. This initiative aims to simplify the journey towards recovery for couples battling substance use and mental health disorders by offering detailed profiles of luxury facilities that cater to their needs. The update includes a comprehensive guide to luxury couples rehab centers across the US, emphasizing privacy, amenities, and evidence-based care. Additionally, the platform now features a specialized guide for couples seeking rehab in Georgia, highlighting facilities that offer modern accommodations and trauma-informed treatment. These resources are designed to help couples find high-quality, insurance-friendly rehab options that align with their clinical needs and financial situations.

The expansion of CouplesRehabGuide.com's offerings reflects a growing demand for couples rehab programs that combine luxury with accessibility. By providing up-to-date information on centers that accept major insurance providers like BCBS, the platform ensures that couples can access dignified and effective care without compromising on comfort or quality. The inclusion of user-friendly search tools and personalized support further enhances the accessibility of these vital resources, making it easier for couples to embark on their recovery journey together.

item.title: Salon and Spa Galleria Empowers Tenants with Free Marketing Workshops and Comprehensive Support
item.description: Salon and Spa Galleria, a leading provider of salon suites for independent beauty and wellness professionals, is taking significant steps to ensure the success of its tenants. With 23 locations across the United States, the company not only offers affordable and flexible leasing options but also provides comprehensive support through free monthly marketing workshops. These workshops, led by Marketing Manager Jennifer Brook, focus on essential marketing strategies tailored for small salon businesses, fostering a community of learning and networking among tenants. Additionally, Salon and Spa Galleria enhances its tenants' visibility by offering a complimentary marketing program, including a personalized press release and a web page in the online salon directory. The suites are equipped with state-of-the-art amenities, ensuring a comfortable and efficient working environment for professionals and their clients.

item.title: Township Building Services Secures Prestigious Contract for KOIN Tower and Sixth+Main in Portland
item.description:
Township Building Services, a leader in janitorial services and building maintenance, has been chosen as the official service partner for two of Portland's most iconic commercial properties, KOIN Tower and Sixth+Main. This partnership marks a significant expansion for Township in the Pacific Northwest, showcasing its commitment to high-quality service standards in Class A buildings. Managed by Jones Lang LaSalle, these properties represent the pinnacle of commercial real estate in Portland. Township's selection comes after a competitive process, highlighting its reputation for excellence, customized service programs, and strong client relationships. The company's President, Travis Gill, expressed pride in this achievement, viewing it as a testament to the team's daily dedication. This collaboration is part of Township's broader strategy to grow its presence on the West Coast, building on successful partnerships with other notable properties.

Founded in 1976, Township Building Services has evolved from a small family business into a premier provider of comprehensive building services, including janitorial, engineering, and security. With over four decades of experience, Township is celebrated for its innovative solutions and unwavering commitment to quality and client satisfaction. This latest partnership not only reinforces Township's market position but also its role in enhancing the operational standards of commercial real estate through trusted service relationships.

item.title: Survey Reveals Credit Card Misuse Among Hispanic Families Highlights Need for Financial Education
item.description:
A recent survey by Consolidated Credit highlights the dual nature of credit cards for Hispanic families in the U.S., serving as both a financial tool and a potential debt trap. With over 90% of Hispanic participants owning at least one credit card and a significant portion holding multiple cards, the study underscores the risks of over-indebtedness without proper financial education. The findings reveal that 61% of respondents learned to manage credit only after falling into debt, with 51% feeling that credit card use has negatively impacted their financial situation. The survey also details what Hispanics value in credit cards, such as low interest rates and no annual fees, emphasizing the importance of financial literacy to avoid damaging credit scores and limiting access to essential services.

Consolidated Credit offers solutions through free financial education and debt management programs, aiming to help families regain financial control. The organization, a leader in credit counseling since 1993, provides tailored support for the Hispanic community, emphasizing the need for responsible credit use to avoid the cycle of debt.

item.title: UGI Utilities Launches Major Infrastructure Upgrade in Union Township to Enhance Safety and Reliability
item.description:
UGI Utilities, a leading natural gas and electric utility company serving over 760,000 customers, has announced a significant system upgrade project in Union Township, including parts of Winfield, starting June 23, 2025. This initiative underscores UGI's dedication to ensuring safe and reliable service, while also offering residents and businesses along the project route the opportunity to convert to natural gas. The project, expected to conclude by early September, will involve gas main replacements and service line upgrades on several key roads, including Trutt Road, Woodsedge Drive, and Felmey Road, potentially causing traffic delays and temporary service interruptions.

Construction will occur Monday through Friday, from 7am to 5pm, with road closures and parking restrictions in effect. UGI emphasizes the importance of property access for safety inspections and equipment relighting. Interested parties in natural gas conversion are encouraged to reach out via gasconversion@ugi.com or by calling 800-276-2722. For more details on UGI Utilities, visit www.ugi.com.

item.title: Breacher Launches First Agentic, Cross-Channel Deepfake Phishing Simulator to Combat AI-Driven Threats
item.description:
Breacher, a pioneering cybersecurity firm, has unveiled the Breacher Platform, a groundbreaking deepfake phishing simulator designed to revolutionize how Managed Security Partners, Awareness Training Managers, and Consulting Firms combat AI-driven threats. This innovative platform leverages proprietary AI technology to create highly realistic deepfakes across multiple communication channels, including email, phone, SMS, and video, setting a new standard in security testing. By enabling security practitioners to identify vulnerabilities and demonstrate resilience against sophisticated social engineering attacks, Breacher not only meets but exceeds compliance mandates and client expectations. The platform's key features, such as unmatched deepfake realism, multi-channel simulation capabilities, and compliance-ready reporting, position it as a vital tool in the modern cybersecurity arsenal. With the launch scheduled for August 1st, Breacher is already generating significant interest, offering early access to select security providers eager to leverage this advanced AI security testing solution.

For more details on how the Breacher Platform is setting a new benchmark in cybersecurity, visit Breacher's simulation platform.

item.title: Argentina's Uranium Exploration Positions It as a Key Player in Global Nuclear Energy Supply
item.description:
The Investing News Network (INN) has spotlighted Argentina's burgeoning role as a uranium exploration hotspot in its latest INNspired article. Highlighting the country's vast uranium potential, the piece focuses on Blue Sky Uranium's significant projects, including the Amarillo Grande in the Neuquén Basin and recent acquisitions of the Corcovo and Chihuidos properties. These developments, covering nearly 80,000 hectares, position Argentina as a promising frontier for in-situ recovery (ISR) uranium targets. The article also delves into Argentina's pro-nuclear policies, operational reactors, and plans for expansion, alongside supportive governmental frameworks aimed at attracting foreign investment. Chris Hogg, INN's Chief Revenue Officer, emphasizes Argentina's unique combination of geological assets and policy support, marking it as a key player in the global nuclear fuel supply chain. For more insights, readers are encouraged to explore the full article here.

Blue Sky Uranium Corp. emerges as a pivotal figure in this narrative, with its ambitious projects and commitment to sustainable development. The company's efforts to advance uranium deposits into production underscore Argentina's potential to meet both domestic and international uranium demands. This story not only sheds light on Argentina's strategic advantages but also on the broader implications for the energy sector and investors looking for opportunities in emerging markets.

item.title: SolarBank Corporation Advances Renewable Energy with New York Solar Project
item.description:
SolarBank Corporation, a leader in renewable and clean energy project development, is making significant strides with its Forest Hill Rd solar project in upstate New York. This 4.584 megawatt DC community solar facility is set to power approximately 540 homes, offering both renewable energy and cost savings to the local community. Highlighted in a recent article, this project underscores SolarBank's expanding footprint in the U.S. market, despite challenges posed by rising supply chain costs. With a development pipeline exceeding one gigawatt, SolarBank continues to solidify its position in the renewable energy sector, focusing on distributed and community solar projects across North America. For more details, the full article can be viewed here.

SolarBank's commitment to renewable energy is further evidenced by its diverse portfolio, which includes solar, battery energy storage system (BESS), and EV charging projects. The company's innovative approach to energy solutions is paving the way for a sustainable future, with projects that cater to utilities, commercial, industrial, municipal, and residential off-takers. For investors and stakeholders, the latest updates on SolarBank's progress are available in the company's newsroom at https://ibn.fm/SUUN.

item.description:
The recent outage of ChatGPT on June 10 and 11, 2025, highlighted the growing dependence on AI tools across various sectors, affecting users worldwide. This incident not only disrupted the daily operations of individuals and businesses but also underscored the vulnerabilities of AI systems still in their developmental stages. item.title: UK's New Gas and Oil Licenses Threaten Paris Climate Agreement Goals, Study Finds
item.description:
A groundbreaking study reveals that the UK's proposed North Sea gas and oil field is incompatible with the Paris Climate Agreement goals. Conducted by scientists from UCL, the research highlights a contradiction in the UK government's issuance of new exploration licenses amidst global climate commitments. This development underscores the ongoing global reliance on fossil fuels, with companies like GEMXX Corp. (OTC: GEMZ) navigating this complex landscape. For more insights, Read More>>.

TinyGems, a specialized communications platform, offers a comprehensive suite of services to enhance visibility for innovative companies. Part of the Dynamic Brand Portfolio @ IBN, TinyGems leverages a vast network to ensure impactful communication strategies. Discover more at https://www.TinyGems.com.

item.title: Platinum Group Metals Ltd. Capitalizes on Surging Platinum and Palladium Prices
item.description:
Platinum and palladium prices are soaring, with platinum reaching its highest level in over two years, driven by a resurgence in demand from China's jewelry sector and global supply concerns. Platinum Group Metals Ltd. (NYSE American: PLG) (TSX: PTM), a development-stage mining company, is poised to benefit from these trends with its advanced-stage project in South Africa and strong partnerships. The company's strategic focus on platinum group metals (PGMs) positions it as a key player in a market experiencing renewed interest and inflation pressures.

The recent rally in platinum prices, up more than 20% year-to-date, highlights the growing demand and potential for companies like Platinum Group Metals Ltd. to capitalize on these favorable market conditions. With platinum prices trading above $1,095 per ounce, the industry is witnessing a significant uptick in interest, particularly from the Chinese market. This development underscores the importance of innovative and strategic mining operations in meeting global demand for precious metals.

item.title: Huddle House Expands Texas Presence with New Laredo Location
item.description: Huddle House, a beloved neighborhood diner known for its home-style American classics and all-day breakfast, has opened its doors in Laredo, TX, marking its first location in the city and the 21st in Texas. Located at Mall del Norte, the new restaurant promises to bring the community together with its generous portions and incredible value, operating from 6 am to 9 pm daily. This expansion is part of a broader growth strategy, including a 20-unit agreement for the Houston-metropolitan area, showcasing the brand's commitment to spreading its warm hospitality and delicious meals across Texas. Peter Ortiz, Chief Development Officer for Ascent Hospitality Management, Huddle House's parent company, expressed excitement about the new opening and future franchise opportunities. With nearly 300 locations open or in development, Huddle House continues to be recognized for its quality and value, earning spots on prestigious lists like Franchise Times' Top 200+ Franchises and Thrillist's "Regional Breakfast Chains that Should Be Everywhere."

item.title: Lee's Famous Recipe Chicken Aims for Third Consecutive Win in USA Today's 10Best Readers' Choice Awards
item.description: Lee's Famous Recipe® Chicken, a beloved name in home-style fried chicken for nearly six decades, is vying for a third consecutive win in USA Today's 10Best Readers' Choice Awards for the Best Fast Food Fried Chicken. With voting open until July 7, the brand, known for its fresh, never frozen, and hand-breaded chicken, is rallying its fans to secure the top spot once again. CEO Ryan Weaver emphasizes the pride and consistency behind their nearly 60-year legacy, inviting guests to participate in the voting process at 10best.usatoday.com. Celebrating National Fried Chicken Day on July 6, Lee's offers a variety of chicken dishes and Southern-style sides across more than 130 locations, reinforcing fried chicken's 83% popularity rating according to a recent YouGov survey.

item.title: Vibra Stream: A New Era for Hispanic Sports Engagement Through Live Streaming
item.description:
Brilla Media Ventures (BMV) and Creator Sports Network (CSN) have unveiled Vibra Stream, a revolutionary partnership aimed at delivering live, licensed creator-casts of sporting events to the U.S. Hispanic Market. This innovative platform enables brands to engage Latino audiences on a massive scale through promotional videos and messages, leveraging the power of live streaming across platforms like Twitch, YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, X, and Kick. The collaboration combines CSN's creator network and sports licenses with BMV's media and adtech expertise, focusing initially on Liga MX Soccer games and expanding to include a variety of sports and pop culture events. This initiative not only opens new avenues for brands to connect with fans but also fosters opportunities for emerging sports commentators.

With the World Cup on the horizon, BMV and CSN are set to captivate U.S. Hispanic audiences with a lineup of social live-streamed events, from Liga MX matches to MMA and international soccer. Vibra Stream's approach to content consumption trends promises a deeper connection between brands and engaged fanbases, supported by extended media inventory and content opportunities around the events. BMV, a certified women-owned Minority Business Enterprise, brings a wealth of experience in multicultural marketing through its platforms like Nuestro Stories and Minivela, further solidifying Vibra Stream's potential to redefine sports streaming for Hispanic audiences.

item.title: Vibra Stream Launches to Revolutionize Live Sports Streaming for the U.S. Hispanic Market
item.description:
Brilla Media Ventures (BMV) and Creator Sports Network (CSN) have announced a revolutionary partnership to launch Vibra Stream, a service offering live, licensed creator-casts of sporting events tailored for the U.S. Hispanic Market. This innovative platform enables brands to engage Latino audiences on a massive scale through promotional videos and messages, leveraging the popularity of sports like Liga MX Soccer. The collaboration combines CSN's creator network and sports licenses with BMV's media and adtech expertise, promising a unique blend of live sports and pop culture content. With the World Cup on the horizon, this partnership is set to redefine sports commentary and brand engagement across platforms like Twitch, YouTube, and TikTok.

Alex Hernandez, BMV's Chief Revenue Officer, highlights the potential of creator-led livestreams to connect brands with Latino consumers effectively. Vibra Stream not only offers a turnkey solution for brands but also creates opportunities for emerging sports commentators. BMV enhances the value for brands by providing extended media inventory around these live events, ensuring maximum engagement. This initiative underscores BMV's commitment to multicultural marketing, backed by its trailblazing leadership in Hispanic media and influencer marketing.

item.title: Lantern Pharma's AI-Driven Drug LP-300 Shows Promise in Treating Advanced Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
item.description:
Lantern Pharma (NASDAQ: LTRN) has reported a significant breakthrough in its Phase 2 HARMONIC(TM) trial, where a 70-year-old never-smoker with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) achieved a durable complete response after being treated with LP-300 in combination with standard chemotherapy. This patient, who had previously undergone three unsuccessful lines of therapy, including Keytruda(R), radiation, and Tagrisso(R), saw a 57% reduction in tumor size initially and later achieved full resolution of lung and adrenal lesions. Remarkably, nearly two years post-treatment, the patient remains progression-free with no significant adverse effects after 21 cycles. This outcome highlights the potential of LP-300, developed using Lantern's RADR(R) AI platform, to meet the urgent needs of never-smoker NSCLC patients who have limited treatment options.

Lantern Pharma is at the forefront of transforming oncology drug discovery and development through its AI and machine learning platform, RADR(R), which utilizes over 200 billion oncology-focused data points. The company's innovative approach has enabled the rapid advancement of its drug pipeline, with programs moving from AI insights to clinical trials in just 2-3 years at a fraction of the traditional cost. For more details on this groundbreaking development, visit the full press release at https://ibn.fm/R0c2m.

item.title: Accredited Solutions, Inc. Shifts Focus to Blockchain and AI in Telecom with ItsBchain Acquisition
item.description:
Accredited Solutions, Inc. (OTC: ASII) has announced a strategic pivot towards blockchain and fintech solutions by acquiring ItsBchain, a subsidiary specializing in telecommunications infrastructure and settlement automation. This acquisition, expected to close imminently, marks a significant shift in ASII's business model, aiming to leverage ItsBchain's innovative platform that combines blockchain, telecom, and AI to revolutionize carrier settlement and interconnect transaction processing. The move is driven by the potential to transform telecom and fintech settlements globally, reducing fraud and optimizing settlement times.

The partnership with ItsBchain, led by a team of seasoned telecom and financial professionals, is seen as a strategic opportunity for ASII to lead in a high-demand, innovation-driven sector. Concurrently, ASII has decided to rescind its agreement with Globetopper, citing excessive dilution and market competitiveness as key reasons. The company is also finalizing its financial audit, expecting to regain current status shortly. This strategic realignment underscores ASII's commitment to creating long-term shareholder value through cutting-edge technologies in fintech and blockchain.

item.title: SolarBank Advances Canadian Community Solar Sector with Sydney Project
item.description:
SolarBank Corporation (NASDAQ: SUUN) (Cboe CA: SUNN) (FSE: GY2) has made significant strides in its 2.4 MW DC Sydney project located in Nova Scotia, marking a pivotal expansion in the Canadian community solar market. This $4.57 million venture, developed alongside AI Renewable Flow-through Fund and Trimac Engineering, is projected to generate 2,730 MWh of clean energy each year, sufficient to power 221 homes and reduce CO₂ emissions by 1,900 tons. Set to commence construction in spring 2026, SolarBank will act as both the developer and EPC contractor, eyeing immediate engineering revenues and sustained income from operations and maintenance agreements. This initiative aligns with Nova Scotia's ambitious target of achieving 80% renewable energy by 2030. For more details, the full press release is available at https://ibn.fm/Eeps4.

SolarBank Corporation specializes in renewable and clean energy projects across Canada and the USA, focusing on distributed and community solar, Battery Energy Storage System (BESS), and EV Charging projects. With a potential development pipeline exceeding one gigawatt and over 100 megawatts of projects already developed, SolarBank is at the forefront of the renewable energy sector. Additional information can be found on their website at SolarBankCorp.com.

item.title: Healthcare Triangle, Inc. Strengthens Digital Healthcare Portfolio with Strategic Acquisition
item.description:
Healthcare Triangle, Inc. (HCTI), a leader in digital transformation for the healthcare and life sciences sectors, has announced the acquisition of Niyama Healthcare, Inc., a mental health SaaS platform, and a 100% equity stake in Ezovion Solutions Private Limited, a provider of hospital information systems. This strategic move, facilitated through HCTI's subsidiary QuantumNexis, aims to bolster HCTI's global presence and enhance its digital healthcare offerings, particularly in mental health and hospital information systems across India, Southeast Asia, and Europe. The deal, valued at $5.7 million, includes cash, restricted common stock, and earn-out payments based on financial performance. Key benefits include expansion into high-growth segments, enhancement of AI and cloud-first architectures, and the addition of recurring revenue streams. The acquisition also brings in talented personnel and opens up cross-selling opportunities within HCTI's existing customer base. Operational continuity for Niyama is assured until full integration with HCTI is completed by August 15, 2025.

This acquisition underscores HCTI's commitment to transforming healthcare delivery through integrated platforms, as highlighted by CFO David Ayanoglou and COO Sujatha Ramesh. With HITRUST Certification for its Cloud and Data Platform, HCTI is poised to lead in digital transformation, offering solutions that improve health outcomes through better data and technology utilization. For more details, visit www.healthcaretriangle.com.

item.title: Luxury Ski and Activewear Brand Perfect Moment Ltd. Expands Globally Amid Economic Uncertainties
item.description:
In a surprising turn amidst economic concerns, the luxury skiwear and apparel sector, led by brands like Perfect Moment Ltd. (AMEX: PMNT), is thriving. This resilience is attributed to affluent consumer sentiment and demand from emerging markets. Perfect Moment is aggressively expanding globally through exclusive retail openings and wholesale partnerships, targeting a North American ski apparel market projected to hit $3.06 billion by 2030. The brand's strategy includes retail expansion in elite ski destinations, global wholesale partnerships, and a shift towards year-round luxury outerwear, supported by significant share purchases by its founder.

Perfect Moment's recent opening of a seasonal store in Kitzbühel, Austria, and partnerships with global sales agencies underscore its commitment to luxury and exclusivity. The brand is also focusing on the year-round luxury outerwear market, recognizing the shift towards designer jackets as statement pieces. With the Winter Olympics on the horizon, Perfect Moment is poised to capitalize on the global spotlight, further solidifying its position in the luxury apparel market.

item.title: Bloomen.ca Enhances Flower Subscription Service, Reinventing Floral Delivery in Toronto
item.description: Bloomen.ca, Toronto's premier online florist, has unveiled an upgraded flower subscription service, reinforcing its status as a trailblazer in the floral subscription sector. With nearly a decade of expertise and a loyal customer base of over 1,100 monthly subscribers, Bloomen.ca offers a seamless solution for receiving fresh, locally sourced flowers. The service features three bouquet sizes—Small, Medium, and Large—with flexible delivery schedules (weekly, monthly, or yearly), catering to diverse preferences and occasions. Each bouquet comes with a complimentary vase, flower food, care instructions, and the option for a personalized message, embodying Bloomen's commitment to convenience and quality. The company also prides itself on being the only florist in Toronto offering same-day delivery for orders placed by 3 PM, ensuring fresh blooms are always within reach. For more details, visit their subscription page.

item.title: Bila Solar Launches U.S. Production with New Indianapolis Factory, Boosting Domestic Clean Energy Manufacturing
item.description: Bila Solar, a U.S.-based solar panel manufacturer, has launched its new line of domestic content solar modules at its Indianapolis factory, marking a significant step in U.S. clean energy manufacturing. Utilizing American-made solar cells, the facility is set to become Central Indiana's largest solar panel factory, reinforcing the domestic supply chain for high-efficiency panels. Mick McDaniel, Vice President and General Manager of Bila Solar, emphasized the importance of this development for the U.S. clean energy industry, highlighting the creation of good-paying jobs and the advancement of American energy independence. The factory, retrofitted from a former Eli Lilly building, is producing ultra-lightweight solar modules and 550W dual-glass conventional panels, qualifying for the 10% domestic content bonus under the federal Investment Tax Credit (ITC). This initiative is expected to create over 75 advanced manufacturing jobs and aims to reach 300 megawatts of annual capacity, scaling up to 1 gigawatt at full buildout. The announcement comes as the U.S. solar industry experiences a surge in demand for domestically manufactured components, amidst challenges such as shifting federal policies and tariffs. The Solar Energy Industries Association (SEIA) and Wood Mackenzie's U.S. Solar Market Insight Q2 2025 report highlights the industry's resilience, with 8.6 gigawatts of new solar module manufacturing capacity added in the first quarter of 2025. Bila Solar's investment in Indiana exemplifies the potential of policies that support domestic manufacturing, as stated by SEIA president and CEO Abigail Ross Hopper.

item.title: Rangeford Investment Reinvents Wealth Management with AI and Global Expansion
item.description:
Rangeford Investment, a Luxembourg-based wealth management firm, has reaffirmed its dedication to providing personalized and high-performance investment services globally. Recognized in 2018 as the Fastest Growing Portfolio Management Company, Rangeford serves a diverse clientele including institutional investors and corporate enterprises. Michael Casagrande, COO, highlights the firm's commitment to evolving financial solutions tailored to client goals and market changes. Rangeford's innovative portfolio model combines traditional and emerging asset classes, aiming for risk minimization and return maximization. The firm is also investing in AI and predictive modeling for enhanced decision-making and plans to expand in emerging markets.

Founded in 2000, Rangeford Investment offers services like portfolio management and retirement strategies, focusing on long-term client success through research and technology. The firm's approach is consultative and transparent, aiming to navigate financial complexities for clients worldwide.

item.title: NeuralBase AI and Vibes Multientertainment Forge Strategic Partnership to Beta Test BMP AI Chatbot
item.description:
NeuralBase AI Ltd., under its enterprise brand BMP AI, has announced a strategic collaboration with VM Entertainment, a Mumbai-based multimedia and entertainment company, to beta test its BMP AI Chatbot. This partnership marks a significant step in integrating AI into creative and high-impact environments, with VM Entertainment leveraging the chatbot to enhance workflow efficiency, automate support systems, and provide AI-enhanced content support for client campaigns. The collaboration not only showcases the potential of AI in transforming entertainment industry operations but also sets the stage for future co-branded initiatives and a broader commercial partnership by September 2025.

The BMP AI Chatbot, currently in its final development phase, is designed to streamline document processing and client engagement in regulated industries, offering compliance-aware solutions. VM Entertainment's participation in the beta testing program will provide NeuralBase AI with valuable feedback to refine the chatbot's performance. This initiative underscores the growing importance of AI in enhancing operational efficiency and client experiences in the entertainment sector, as highlighted by the enthusiasm from both NeuralBase AI's CEO, Vighnesh Dobale, and VM Entertainment's Director, Pujan Jobalia.

item.title: Lone Star JC Construction Simplifies Concrete Driveway Replacements with Free Estimates
item.description:
Lone Star JC Construction, a leading construction company in Fort Bend County, has introduced a new initiative to provide free estimates for concrete driveway replacements, aiming to enhance transparency and customer satisfaction. This move addresses common homeowner concerns about costs and hidden fees, offering a clear, upfront pricing structure. The company's expertise in local soil conditions and climate variances ensures durable and aesthetically pleasing driveways. With a focus on quality materials and craftsmanship, Lone Star JC Construction is setting a new standard in the industry, making the replacement process seamless for property owners.

For those considering a driveway replacement, the company offers detailed consultations to discuss specific needs and preferences, followed by a comprehensive estimate. This approach not only simplifies decision-making but also builds trust through honesty and openness. Additionally, Lone Star JC Construction provides maintenance and repair services to extend the lifespan of existing driveways, emphasizing the importance of regular inspections to prevent future issues. Their commitment to excellence and customer education makes them a reliable choice for residents of Fort Bend County.

item.title: Axleboy Offroad Elevates Overlanding with Expert Rooftop Tent Solutions
item.description:
Axleboy Offroad, based in O'Fallon, United States, is revolutionizing the off-road experience by helping adventurers select the perfect rooftop tent for their needs. With the rise in popularity of overlanding, the company emphasizes the importance of choosing a rooftop tent that matches one's vehicle and lifestyle, focusing on durability, weatherproofing, and comfort. Axleboy Offroad offers expert advice and installation services for a range of rooftop tents, including the iKamper Skycamp line, known for its quick setup and robust design. The company also provides vehicle-specific guidance to ensure optimal performance and safety, catering to a variety of 4x4 vehicles from 4Runners to Ford Rangers.

Key considerations for selecting a rooftop tent include weight capacity, setup time, weatherproofing, interior space, and mounting system compatibility. Axleboy Offroad stands out by ensuring that each installation is tailored to the vehicle's specifications, avoiding common pitfalls like overhang or weight imbalance. Their commitment to quality and customer service has made them a trusted name in the St. Louis region and beyond, offering solutions that enhance the overlanding experience for solo travelers and families alike.

item.title: GlobalManagerGroup.com Launches Updated ISO 37001:2025 Documentation Kit to Combat Bribery
item.description:
GlobalManagerGroup.com has unveiled its ISO 37001:2025 Documentation Kit for Anti-Bribery Management System, a comprehensive solution designed to help organizations align with the latest ISO 37001:2025 standards. This kit includes over 95 editable files, such as manuals, procedures, and templates, aimed at simplifying the certification process for businesses of all sizes. The ISO 37001:2025 Documents package is a testament to the company's commitment to fostering a culture of ethics and integrity, as highlighted by Mr. Devang Jhaveri, Director of GlobalManagerGroup.com. Priced at 599USD, the kit is readily available online, ensuring quick implementation.

About GlobalManagerGroup.com: A leader in ISO documentation and training solutions, GlobalManagerGroup.com serves over 3,600 clients worldwide, offering expert guidance in quality management and certification processes. Their latest offering underscores their dedication to supporting sustainable business growth and operational excellence.

item.title: MacKenzie Capital's Strategic Insights Highlight Commercial Real Estate's Evolving Landscape
item.description: John Black, President of MacKenzie Capital, LLC, brings over 35 years of expertise in commercial real estate finance, having completed transactions worth billions. His career spans roles at Draper & Kramer Realty Advisors, the AFL-CIO Building Investment Trust, and MHI Hotels, LLC, showcasing a deep commitment to real estate investment and finance. Meanwhile, Johnny Black, a founder and now Managing Partner of Chesapeake Search Partners, specializes in high-touch recruitment across various industries, with a recent focus on expanding CSP's HR solutions platform. Both leaders highlight the dynamic nature of their respective fields, with MacKenzie Capital focusing on innovative financing solutions in a challenging market, as evidenced by recent transactions and market outlooks. The interview questions poised to John Black delve into MacKenzie Capital's evolution, economic recovery opportunities, and current trends in deal flow and capital activity, offering insights into the commercial real estate sector's future.

item.title: Dr. Antonio Ganios Joins ProCare Family Dental, Enhancing Dental Care with a Comprehensive Approach
item.description:
Morton Grove welcomes Dr. Antonio Ganios to ProCare Family Dental, marking a significant enhancement in local dental care services. Dr. Ganios, renowned for his compassionate approach and emphasis on preventive care, offers a wide range of services tailored to meet the needs of patients across all age groups. From preventive care and hygiene to advanced treatments like dental implants and Invisalign® clear aligners, the clinic is equipped with modern digital technology to ensure precise and minimally invasive treatments. Dr. Ganios's philosophy centers around personalized, education-driven care, ensuring each patient's unique needs are met in a warm and welcoming environment.

ProCare Family Dental is committed to making dental care accessible and affordable, offering flexible scheduling and insurance-friendly services. Located in Morton Grove, IL, the clinic serves not only the local community but also surrounding areas including Niles, Skokie, and Evanston. With Dr. Ganios at the helm, families can expect a higher standard of dental care where patient relationships and oral health are prioritized. The clinic's comprehensive services and patient-centered approach make it a standout choice for families seeking quality dental care in the Chicago area.

item.title: The Wagner Law Group Champions Justice for Sexual Abuse Survivors at FCI Dublin
item.description: Butch Wagner, founder of The Wagner Law Group, has emerged as a pivotal figure in representing survivors of sexual assault at the now-closed FCI Dublin Women's Correctional Facility, dubbed 'The Rape Club' by multiple outlets. With over $300 million recovered for victims, Wagner's firm stands out for its unparalleled expertise in handling such sensitive cases. The pervasive rape culture at the facility left victims fearing retaliation, a fear so deep that even during internal investigations, many remained silent. The recent mistrial in a criminal case underscores the importance of victims coming forward, not just for compensation but to bolster evidence against accused officials. Defense tactics aimed at discrediting survivors highlight the challenges victims face in seeking justice. The Wagner Law Group emphasizes the critical need for survivors to speak out, offering a hotline for confidential consultations. Beyond prison sex abuse, the firm also specializes in representing wildfire victims, showcasing their broad commitment to justice.

item.title: SmartytheRealtor™ Revolutionizes Philadelphia's Real Estate Market with AI
item.description:
In a groundbreaking move for the Philadelphia real estate market, SmartytheRealtor™, an AI Certified Agent™, is revolutionizing home sales with innovative solutions that promise control, clarity, and faster closings. Combining decades of experience with cutting-edge technology, Smarty offers smart pricing, instant cash offers, and a streamlined process designed to eliminate the traditional hassles of selling a home. This approach not only accelerates the selling timeline but also ensures sellers receive competitive and transparent offers, tailored to their unique needs and backed by real-time market data. item.title: The Next Evolution of AI: System-Level Awareness and Autonomy
item.description:
Andrew Evan Watkins, Chief Analyst and Board Director at HorizonPointe Financial Group, heralds the advent of system-level awareness in artificial intelligence (AI), marking a pivotal shift from task-specific AI to intelligent systems capable of self-management and optimization. Watkins envisions AI that transcends responding to commands, evolving into systems that understand context, intent, and system-wide dependencies, thereby embedding intelligence into the very fabric of organizational processes. This transformative approach, termed AI-native systems, promises to redefine enterprise operations by making AI an integral part of strategy rather than a supplementary tool.

However, Watkins emphasizes the necessity for architectural readiness, including systems that support adaptive learning and modular behavior, alongside the imperative for transparent governance frameworks to ensure these advanced AI systems remain explainable, accountable, and secure. HorizonPointe Financial Group, a leader in financial services, underscores the potential of AI to revolutionize industries by integrating intelligence into infrastructure, data pipelines, and decision-making processes. For more insights, visit HorizonPointe Financial Group or check the original news on newsdirect.com.

item.title: Navigating Marital Separation in Florida: Legal Complexities and Solutions
item.description:
In Florida, the legal landscape for couples facing marital difficulties is notably different from many other states, as it does not recognize "legal separation agreements" in the same manner as divorce. This distinction has profound implications for property, finances, and parental responsibilities. A recent article delves into the intricacies of separation agreements in Florida, offering insights into common practices, potential pitfalls, and alternative legal options. It explores why some couples choose separation over immediate divorce, the benefits and limitations of such arrangements, and the key differences between informal separation agreements and legally recognized temporary relief measures during divorce proceedings.

The article also emphasizes the importance of postnuptial agreements for spouses wishing to define their rights and responsibilities while remaining married. It addresses challenges that may arise from prolonged separations, such as asset division, new relationships, and unexpected pregnancies. For those navigating these complex issues, the full article provides essential guidance and is a must-read for anyone considering separation or looking to formalize arrangements outside of divorce.

item.title: Navigating Rising Food Costs: Strategies for Maintaining a Healthy Diet
item.description:

A poll reveals that 60% of Americans find the cost of healthy food to be their biggest barrier to better nutrition. Arlen Vanessa Marin, M.S., R.D., suggests creative budget-stretching strategies like using homemade vinaigrettes, frozen veggies, and lentils as healthier, cost-effective alternatives.

The Association offers tips for affordable, nutritious eating, emphasizing protein sources like beans, tofu, and ground turkey, and healthier grain options such as brown rice and quinoa. They also recommend canned, dried, and frozen foods as nutritious alternatives that reduce waste. For more advice and recipes, visit recipes.heart.org.

item.title: FAVO Capital Secures $8 Million Investment to Bridge the SMB Credit Gap and Accelerate Nasdaq Uplisting
