This move comes as the company voluntarily converted all super voting Series C Preferred Shares, simplifying its capital structure and enhancing governance transparency. Amidst a backdrop of inflationary pressures and elevated interest rates, small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs) are increasingly turning away from traditional banks, with bank approval rates for SMB loans dropping from 83% in 2019 to just 68% in 2022. This shift has spurred demand for alternative lending solutions like those offered by FAVO, which provides fast, flexible funding through its revenue-based lending platform.

FAVO Capital stands out in the booming alternative lending market with its advanced digital platform designed to meet the needs of underserved SMBs. item.title: Maruti Suzuki Slashes EV Production Amid Rare Earth Mineral Shortage
item.description:
Maruti Suzuki, a leading Indian automaker and subsidiary of Suzuki Motor, has significantly cut electric vehicle production due to a global shortage of rare earth minerals. This decision has led to a two-thirds reduction in the production targets for its e-Vitara model in the first half of the 2025–2026 financial year. The shortage stems from China's recent halt on the export of seven rare earth metals, a move that is already affecting the automobile industry worldwide. Companies like Massimo Group (NASDAQ: MAMO) are now compelled to seek alternative supply sources to mitigate the impact.

This development underscores the growing challenges faced by the EV sector in securing essential materials for production. GreenCarStocks, a specialized communications platform focusing on EVs and the green energy sector, highlights the broader implications of this shortage for the industry and investors alike. The platform, part of the Dynamic Brand Portfolio @ IBN, provides comprehensive coverage and analysis on such critical issues affecting the green energy and automotive sectors.

item.title: Hooker Furniture Corporation Navigates Market Challenges with Strategic Cost Reductions and Strong Dividend Yield
item.description:
Hooker Furniture Corporation (NASDAQ: HOFT) has recently been under the spotlight as Stonegate Capital Partners updated their coverage on the company. Despite facing macroeconomic challenges, including decreased volumes and tariff impacts on the HMI segment, HOFT reported a consolidated GPM of 22.3%, marking a 173bps q/q increase. The company is strategically navigating through the current market turbulence by focusing on reducing fixed costs by 25%, aiming for full realization by FY27. HOFT's commitment to being a consistent dividend payer is evident with its distribution of $0.23 per share, showcasing a strong dividend yield of 8.1%. Furthermore, the company has made significant strides in strengthening its balance sheet and inventory position, highlighted by the strategic increase in inventory levels and the operational efficiencies gained from its new Vietnam warehouse, which has significantly reduced lead times.

Stonegate Capital Partners, a leading capital markets advisory firm, has provided a comprehensive analysis of HOFT's financial health and strategic positioning. Despite the challenging furniture retail environment, HOFT's efforts to streamline its supply chain and improve warehousing capabilities position it well for future growth. The company's backlog, although slightly decreased from the previous quarter, remains elevated from pre-pandemic levels, indicating resilience in demand. Stonegate's valuation models, including Dividend Discount, DCF, and EV/EBIT analyses, suggest a positive outlook for HOFT, further bolstered by its high dividend yield compared to its peers.

item.description:

Hansen, with over 40 years of mining experience, was appointed as the new Chair of the Board, succeeding J. Birks Bovaird, who had served since 2006. CEO Mark S. Chalmers lauded Bovaird's contributions to the company's transformation and expressed optimism for Hansen's leadership. Energy Fuels Inc. is a key player in the production of critical minerals, including uranium and rare earth elements, and operates several projects in the U.S. and internationally. item.title: Candy Marx Launches The Solar Shift: A New Era of Ethical Fashion and Holistic Wellness
item.description: Former high-end fashion footwear designer Candy Marx has launched The Solar Shift, a limited edition collection of ethically-made 100% organic cotton loungewear and handcrafted copperware, marking her return to the fashion industry with a focus on intentional living and holistic health. Known for her early success with luxury footwear label KeilanaSkye and her pioneering shift to cruelty-free fashion, Marx's latest venture, BLOOM, introduces four limited editions per year, starting with The Solar Shift. This collection blends her design expertise with her passion for veganism, ethical living, and spiritual wellness, offering pieces that are not only stylish but also imbued with positive energy and intention. Available exclusively at www.candymarx.com, the collection features solar-inspired prints and sacred numerology, crafted from eco-friendly materials and handmade by Ayurvedic Artisans.

item.title: Pioneering School Safety: Sandhills Classical Christian School Adopts Wearable Panic Button Technology
item.description:
Active Defender, a pioneer in school safety solutions, is set to unveil its latest innovation, wearable panic buttons, at the School Leadership Safety Summit in Pinehurst, NC. This groundbreaking technology, developed by Jim Boyte, a retired Department of Defense software engineer, promises to revolutionize emergency response in educational settings by enabling instant communication between school staff and emergency services. The event, hosted by Sandhills Classical Christian School, will feature live demonstrations and insights from the founder, educators, and administrators, highlighting the system's potential to save precious seconds during crises.

The platform, recently honored with an NC IDEA SEED Grant, is already making waves across North and South Carolina, with plans for expansion throughout the Southeast. The summit will also welcome keynote speakers Rob DePriest and Bobby Brasher, who will discuss the critical role of technology in enhancing campus safety. Active Defender's mission to equip schools with real-time communication tools underscores a commitment to protecting students and staff, ensuring that in moments of danger, everyone has the information needed to act swiftly. Discover more about this life-saving technology at https://active-defender.com/.

item.title: Rhinox Locksmith Las Vegas Expands 24-Hour Emergency Services to Meet Growing Demand
item.description: Rhinox Locksmith Las Vegas has significantly expanded its mobile locksmith services across Southern Nevada, including Las Vegas, Henderson, Summerlin, and Boulder City. Specializing in emergency and everyday lock needs, Rhinox offers a wide range of services such as car lockout assistance, car key replacement, home and office rekeying, and security hardware upgrades. item.description: The Super Crowd, Inc. has announced an impressive lineup for SuperCrowd25, its fourth annual global conference focused on democratizing capital through regulated investment crowdfunding. The event, set for August 21–22, 2025, will feature Rebecca Kacaba of DealMaker, Ron Miller of StartEngine, and Jonny Price of Wefunder among its spotlight speakers. item.description:

FAVO Capital offers a variety of financing options, including revenue-based funding and merchant cash advances, and has supported over 10,000 small businesses with more than $138 million in capital. This growth comes at a time when traditional banks are increasingly unable to meet the unique needs of SMBs, highlighting the importance of private credit as a lifeline for these enterprises. The market's expansion is underscored by Preqin's data, showing private credit assets under management soaring from $500 billion in 2013 to over $1.7 trillion projected by 2025. item.title: Brera Holdings PLC Celebrates SS Juve Stabia's Historic Season and Strategic Growth
item.description:
Brera Holdings (NASDAQ: BREA), an Ireland-based international holding company, is making waves in the sports world with its strategic investment in Italian football club SS Juve Stabia. The club's remarkable performance, finishing fifth in Serie B and reaching the semifinals of the Serie A promotion playoffs, has not only increased its market value significantly since March 2025 but also attracted international attention, with matches broadcast in the U.S., U.K., and Canada. Brera's acquisition of a 38.46% stake in Juve Stabia, approved by the Italian Football Federation (FIGC), marks a significant milestone in its multi-club ownership strategy. Additionally, a €5 million subsidy from the Campagna Region for stadium refurbishment underscores the growing support and potential for the club's future.

The success of Juve Stabia under Brera's portfolio highlights the potential of strategic investments in sports clubs to yield both financial and cultural returns. With attendance surging and international broadcasts expanding the club's reach, Brera Holdings is setting a precedent for how global investment can revitalize local sports teams. For more details on Brera's innovative approach to sports club ownership, visit Brera Holdings.

item.description:

This accolade celebrates Dr. Blair's pioneering role in integrating storytelling into leadership, strategy, and institutional development, marking her as a visionary in the field. Her work, spanning decades, has not only established storytelling as a critical organizational tool but also demonstrated its power to address complex issues like systemic bias and cultural barriers. Dr. Blair's contributions, including her foundational role in Goldenfleece and her influential research at institutions like the World Bank, have cemented storytelling's place in business and policy circles. Her current media endeavors, notably the TV series Unlocked, continue to showcase her commitment to depth and authenticity in storytelling.

Dr. Blair's recognition by The Stone Register underscores the transformative potential of storytelling in fostering clarity, connection, and change. Her innovative approach to resilience, redefining it as a decision point rather than a mere bounce-back, has particularly resonated in today's fast-paced business environment. The Stone Register's publication of a long-form interview with Dr. Blair offers insights into her methodologies and the evolving significance of storytelling in leadership, further highlighting her enduring influence on professionals worldwide.

This initiative, expected to be operational by 2027, involves a 495 MW project that aligns with Google's ambitious goal of achieving zero emissions. The partnership underscores the tech giant's commitment to sustainability and renewable energy, setting a precedent for other corporations to follow. (NASDAQ: MULN), signaling a broader shift towards eco-conscious innovations in the tech and automotive industries.

With nearly 90% of 2024 vehicle sales in Norway being electric, compared to just 10% in the U.S., the Scandinavian country's success highlights the potential for rapid EV adoption with the right policies and incentives. item.title: Metavesco, Inc. Launches AI-Powered Virtual Staffing Pilot in Gainesville, Georgia
item.description:
Metavesco, Inc. (OTC: MVCO) is set to revolutionize the staffing industry with the launch of an AI-powered virtual staffing branch in Gainesville, Georgia. This innovative pilot program, led by CEO Ryan Schadel, utilizes machine-learning algorithms and generative AI to streamline the process of sourcing, screening, and managing labor in real time. The initiative aims to significantly reduce operational costs and enhance scalability by eliminating the need for a physical office. Key features of the program include automated talent sourcing, predictive demand forecasting, conversational AI support, and dynamic dispatch and scheduling. The success of this pilot could pave the way for Metavesco's Epic Labor to expand into additional markets, offering a first-mover advantage in the integration of deep-tech AI with blue-collar staffing.

The potential benefits of this AI-driven approach are vast, including lean, high-margin growth, scalable roll-out plans, and significant shareholder value creation. Schadel emphasizes the transformative potential of AI in the staffing industry, viewing the Gainesville pilot as a critical step towards establishing best practices for explosive growth. Epic Labor, a subsidiary of Metavesco, specializes in providing fast, reliable, on-demand labor to small and mid-sized businesses across various sectors. This initiative underscores Metavesco's commitment to innovation and long-term growth through strategic acquisitions and market solutions.

item.description:

This update, detailed in the "Independent Technical Report for the Condor Project, Ecuador," prepared by SRK Consulting (Canada) Inc., underscores the project's potential and Silvercorp's commitment to responsible mining and ESG principles. With a staggering 45 million readers, the company is not just about content; it's about creating a comprehensive ecosystem that includes data collection and analysis, setting it apart from competitors.

The company's ambition to become the largest independent media tech group is fueled by its one-to-two acquisitions per year strategy, with ongoing discussions for future targets. item.title: Steve's PC Repairs: A Pillar of Reliability in Adelaide's Tech Support Landscape
item.description: Steve's PC Repairs, a trusted name in Adelaide, stands out for its comprehensive computer repair services catering to both individuals and businesses. With over two decades of experience, founder Steve Tomblin leads a team dedicated to resolving a wide range of PC and laptop issues, from hardware malfunctions to software glitches, ensuring minimal downtime for clients. The company prides itself on transparent communication, competitive pricing, and the convenience of on-site repairs, making it a go-to solution for Adelaide residents facing technology troubles. Learn more about their services, including laptop repairs in Adelaide, network troubleshooting, and preventive maintenance plans designed to keep businesses running smoothly.

item.title: The Critical Role of Pre-Purchase Building Inspections in Melbourne's Real Estate Market
item.description: The article highlights the critical importance of pre-purchase building inspections in Melbourne, emphasizing their role in safeguarding potential homebuyers from unforeseen expenses and ensuring the structural integrity of properties. DC Building Inspectors - Melbourne, a key player in this sector, offers comprehensive inspection services that cover everything from the foundation to the roof, including pest inspections, which are particularly vital in Melbourne's climate. The piece underscores the necessity of hiring licensed and certified inspectors to avoid the risks associated with unprofessional evaluations, such as hidden damages or safety hazards. Engaging a building inspector in Melbourne is portrayed as a strategic move in the competitive real estate market, providing buyers with leverage in negotiations and peace of mind.

item.title: HomeSphere and Overhead Door Forge Strategic Partnership to Benefit Homebuilders
item.description:
HomeSphere, a premier platform linking building product manufacturers with mid-market homebuilders, has forged a strategic alliance with Overhead Door, a revered name in garage door solutions. This partnership enables over 2,700 builders within HomeSphere's U.S. network to avail exclusive rebates on Overhead Door™ brand garage doors, offering them both value and trust in a brand they already rely on. Eric Herbst, Vice President of Builder Sales at Overhead Door, highlighted the partnership's ability to streamline access to garage door solutions, thereby saving time and simplifying operations for builders. With a legacy dating back to 1921, Overhead Door™ has set industry standards with its quality and design, supported by a vast network of distributors. HomeSphere CEO Greg Schwarzer emphasized the platform's role in providing builders with top-tier products at competitive prices, alongside simplifying the rebate collection process, especially in these uncertain times.

HomeSphere, established in 1999, stands as a pivotal connector for homebuilders to exclusive rebate offers, supporting the construction of over 250,000 new homes annually. The Overhead Door™ brand, recognized by its iconic Red Ribbon logo, continues to be a trusted provider of residential and commercial garage doors across North America, backed by a network of over 440 distributors.

item.title: Neuralbase AI Strengthens Leadership and Global Engagement to Advance Compliance-First AI Solutions
item.description: Neuralbase AI Ltd., operating under the brand BMP AI, has announced its global industry engagement program, starting with participation at the Global AI Show Abu Dhabi in late 2025. The company, specializing in enterprise AI solutions for regulated industries, has appointed Tushar Shivekar as Chief Technology Officer and Suraj Sharma as Head of Design and Frontend Development to bolster its BMP AI platform's development and international exposure. The BMP AI platform is designed for enterprises in highly regulated sectors, offering compliance-first AI solutions with features like retrieval-augmented generation and document ingestion. Neuralbase AI's strategy includes engaging with enterprise customers, industry partners, and government agencies worldwide to explore market opportunities and strategic partnerships. CEO Vighnesh Dobale emphasizes the company's commitment to building a trusted, compliance-first enterprise AI platform for global regulated industries. More details can be found on NEWMEDIAWIRE and the company's website.

item.title: Navigating Negative Google Reviews: A Strategic Approach for Businesses
item.description:
BLVD, a digital marketing agency based in SEAL BEACH, CA, has released an insightful article addressing the issue of bad Google reviews. The article delves into the common reasons behind negative feedback and provides business owners with practical steps to manage their online reputation effectively. It highlights the significance of understanding customer grievances, responding to reviews professionally, and the potential to flag inappropriate reviews for removal. Moreover, the piece underscores the value of critical feedback in fostering business growth and improvement.

For those looking to navigate the challenges of online reputation management, BLVD offers a comprehensive guide on transforming negative feedback into opportunities for enhancement. The agency, known for its strategic approach to digital marketing, emphasizes the importance of measurable results and ROI in their services. Business owners are encouraged to explore the full article for detailed strategies on handling negative reviews and bolstering their online presence.

item.title: New Book 'Disillusioned Malaise' Sparks Debate on Leadership Styles Between Republican and Democratic Administrations
item.description: In a compelling analysis by Michal Bennett, the stark contrasts between Republican and Democratic leadership in the U.S. are highlighted, focusing on economic policies, border security, foreign relations, and individual freedoms. Bennett's work, Disillusioned Malaise, critiques Democratic administrations for economic strain, increased national debt, and regulatory burdens, while praising Republican leaders for economic growth, border security measures, and a strong foreign policy stance. The book, available on Amazon, serves as a call to action for voters to consider these differences in upcoming elections. Published by Foodbrats, inc., a South Florida-based author services provider, the book aims to influence public opinion by advocating for a return to Republican leadership values.

item.title: Whistleblower Secures $1.5 Million Settlement in PPP Loan Fraud Case
item.description: The Law Offices of Darth M. Newman, LLC has marked a significant victory in whistleblower advocacy by securing a $1.5 million settlement in a False Claims Act case involving Zachary Holtzman against Argosy Investment Partners V, L.P., and its affiliates. The case centered on allegations of improper use of a Paycheck Protection Program (PPP) loan, specifically that AIP-ECS received a second-draw PPP loan exceeding allowable limits, violating the CARES Act. This settlement underscores the critical role whistleblowers play in safeguarding public funds and ensuring corporate accountability. Pittsburgh whistleblower lawyer Darth Newman highlighted the importance of this case in promoting justice and compliance with federal relief programs. The firm's dedication to representing individuals who expose fraud against the government is a testament to its commitment to public accountability and protecting taxpayer interests.

item.title: Construction Safety Crisis: Subcontractors Left Vulnerable in Emergencies
item.description:
In a groundbreaking revelation, Cory Sherman, founder of Safety Systems Management, highlights a critical oversight in construction site safety protocols: the exclusion of subcontractors from emergency communications. Despite constituting the majority of the workforce on many sites, subcontractors are often left out of emergency alerts, leading to dangerous communication gaps. With the construction industry facing increasing risks from heat waves, wildfires, and jobsite violence, the need for inclusive emergency notification systems has never been more urgent. Wireless emergency notification systems emerge as a solution, offering real-time alerts to all workers, irrespective of their employment status. Industry leaders are now recognizing the importance of including every worker in safety protocols, marking a significant shift towards more inclusive and effective jobsite safety measures.

Safety Systems Management, founded by Cory Sherman in 2016, is at the forefront of this change, specializing in wireless emergency notification systems that ensure all workers are alerted during emergencies. These systems, which operate on a patented mobile platform, are designed to improve evacuation times, emergency service notifications, and overall jobsite communications. The company's efforts underscore a moral imperative in the construction industry: protecting every worker equally. For more information, visit Safety Systems Management.

item.title: GARVEE.com Launches 2025 Eco-Friendly Air Conditioning Lineup with R-454B Refrigerant
item.description:
GARVEE.com has unveiled its 2025 AC lineup, featuring eco-friendly R-454B refrigerant, marking a strategic shift towards more sustainable cooling solutions. This move aligns with the EPA's mandate to phase down high-GWP hydrofluorocarbons and caters to the growing consumer demand for environmentally responsible home appliances. The new lineup includes portable and split-system ACs, both pre-charged with R-454B, offering reduced environmental impact, enhanced energy efficiency, and compliance with future regulations. GARVEE.com's initiative not only supports global climate objectives but also ensures American households have access to efficient, reliable, and sustainable cooling options.

The 2025 collection boasts advanced features such as smart Wi-Fi control, maintenance notifications, and high SEER ratings, ensuring energy savings and convenience for users. With products like the Portable Air Conditioner and Split Air Conditioner, GARVEE.com is setting new standards in residential air conditioning. The company's commitment to sustainability and innovation is evident in its proactive approach to adopting next-generation refrigerants, positioning it as a leader in the HVAC industry's transition towards more eco-friendly solutions.

item.description:
Qingdao Xinguangzheng Global Engineering Co., Ltd is leading the charge in the construction industry's shift towards prefabricated steel structures, a move that promises efficiency, sustainability, and intelligence in building practices. The company's innovative approach, highlighted by the rapid completion of the Lomé Industrial Park in Togo, showcases the potential of prefabricated metal buildings to reduce construction timelines and carbon emissions significantly. With the integration of Building Information Modeling (BIM) technology and investments in intelligent manufacturing, Xingguangzheng is setting new standards for the industry.

The global emphasis on green building and carbon neutrality has propelled the adoption of prefabricated steel structures, offering advantages such as rapid construction, eco-friendly design, versatile applications, and superior safety. Xingguangzheng's commitment to innovation and its vision for the future, including expanding into key markets and increasing the share of prefabricated projects, positions the company at the forefront of this transformative trend. The construction industry's future is being reshaped by these advancements, with Xingguangzheng leading the way towards a greener, more efficient world.

item.title: RingCentral Introduces AI Receptionist to Revolutionize Business Communications
item.description: RingCentral introduces an innovative AI Receptionist solution designed to revolutionize how businesses handle incoming calls. This advanced AI system, seamlessly integrated into the RingCentral phone system, offers 24/7 call answering and routing, eliminating the need for a traditional receptionist. It engages callers in natural conversations, handles routine inquiries, and intelligently routes complex calls to the appropriate personnel. Additionally, it can schedule appointments and follow up via SMS, ensuring no business opportunity is missed. The AI Receptionist not only enhances customer experience by providing instant responses but also significantly reduces operational costs associated with human receptionists. Businesses can now convert after-hours callers into customers and scale effortlessly during call volume spikes. A demo is available for those interested in experiencing the future of call management. For more details, check out our online video demo here.

item.title: Woofie’s Montclair Launches Innovative Mobile Pet Care Services in Essex County
item.description:
Woofie’s® Montclair, a premier provider of personalized mobile pet care services, has expanded its operations to Essex County, including areas like Montclair, Upper Montclair, and Bloomfield. Led by General Manager Gabriela Cobos and Co-Owner Kristina Castro, the business offers a vet-informed, compassionate approach to pet care, including mobile grooming, dog walking, and pet sitting. item.title: Burgess Unveils Last-Minute Charter Availabilities for Prestigious Superyachts
item.description: Burgess, a leader in the superyacht industry, has announced an exceptional fleet of superyachts available for charter this summer, featuring some of the most luxurious and innovative vessels on the water. Highlights include the 88m MALTESE FALCON, known for its groundbreaking DynaRig sail system, and the 85m GIGIA, a masterpiece of craftsmanship and elegance. item.title: Kevin Atticks: Steering Maryland's Agriculture Towards Innovation and Growth
item.description:
Kevin Atticks, a seasoned professional in the agricultural sector, has been appointed as the Secretary of Agriculture for Maryland in January 2023. With a rich background as the CEO and founder of Grow & Fortify, Atticks has been instrumental in supporting value-added agricultural organizations, showcasing the significant impact of this sector through the first comprehensive assessment of Maryland's value-added agricultural industry. His leadership roles in various agricultural associations and councils highlight his deep commitment to the industry. Atticks' academic credentials, including a doctorate in communications design, complement his practical experience, making him a well-rounded leader in his field.

David Nevins, president & CEO of Nevins & Associates, brings over three decades of expertise in strategic communications, public relations, and community engagement to the table. His firm serves a diverse clientele across multiple industries, leveraging Nevins' extensive network and leadership in civic and political communities. The interview between Nevins and Atticks, featured on citybiz, offers insights into Atticks' vision for Maryland's agricultural future and Nevins' perspective on strategic communication's role in shaping public perception and policy.

item.title: From Racetracks to Storytelling: Michelle St. John's Journey in Journalism and Non-Fiction Production
item.description:
Michelle St. John's journey from the hardworking environment of Bonita Farm to becoming a storyteller and producer is a testament to the power of perseverance and passion. Raised in a family where hard work was the cornerstone, Michelle's early exposure to the horse racing world's human stories shaped her career path. Her transition from Washington and Lee University to 60 Minutes and later to The Nantucket Project showcases her dedication to blending human connection with journalism. Now, as a co-founder of Paradocs Studio, Michelle continues to focus on premium non-fiction content, proving that storytelling can bridge gaps and foster understanding.

David Nevins, a seasoned executive with over 30 years in marketing and public relations, brings a wealth of experience to his role as president & CEO of Nevins & Associates. His extensive involvement in various sectors and leadership roles highlights his commitment to leveraging his network for the benefit of his clients. The interview between David and Michelle, as featured on citybiz, underscores the intersection of storytelling and strategic communication in today's media landscape.

item.title: Monarch Professional Services Group Champions Collaboration and Innovation in Financial Services
item.description: Lee Farabaugh, co-founder and president of Monarch Professional Services Group, a division of Core10, is at the forefront of providing implementation and customer success services for financial service CRM and SaaS platforms. With a rich background in venture capital, geographic expansion, and forging partnerships, Farabaugh's leadership extends to her recent election to the Board for the Association for Financial Technology (AFT) and her role as Co-Entrepreneur in Residence for Project Fintech. Monarch's mission revolves around enabling financial services professionals through technology that simplifies complexity, fostering a culture of collaboration and shared success. The company emphasizes talent development, mentorship, and training, ensuring team members are well-equipped to serve clients with confidence. Farabaugh highlights key market trends financial service firms should monitor, including the extended holding period for private assets and the importance of investing in a future-proof tech stack to maintain competitive advantage. Monarch is focused on helping firms navigate these challenges by optimizing systems and empowering teams through technology.

item.title: Carlos Rosso's $2 Billion Midtown Park Set to Redefine Urban Living in Miami
item.description:
Carlos Rosso, a visionary developer known for shaping Miami's skyline, has embarked on a new venture with Rosso Development, focusing on high-design, community-centric projects. His latest endeavors include the nearly sold-out Standard Residences and the ambitious $2 billion Midtown Park, a master-planned community in Midtown Miami. This project, branded by Proper Hospitality, aims to blend luxury with lifestyle, creating a vibrant urban community. Rosso's approach emphasizes walkability, public spaces, and a mix of residential, retail, and office spaces to foster a dynamic neighborhood atmosphere. The development is set to feature a Padel Club, extensive fitness facilities, and over 40,000 square feet of owner amenities, catering to a diverse demographic of buyers seeking a blend of luxury and community.

Rosso's strategy reflects a broader trend towards creating integrated urban experiences in Miami, moving beyond isolated towers to build complete communities. His projects, including Midtown Park, are designed to connect with the city's cultural and social fabric, offering residents a lifestyle that's both luxurious and grounded in community values. With Miami's real estate market booming, Rosso's developments stand out for their focus on sustainability, smart design, and the creation of spaces that encourage interaction and engagement among residents and visitors alike.

item.title: ShopBack Expands into the U.S. Market, Offering Cashback and Rewards to American Consumers
item.description:
Joel Leong, Co-Founder of ShopBack Group, has been instrumental in transforming the platform into Asia-Pacific's leading shopping, rewards, and payments platform. With over 50 million shoppers across 13 markets, ShopBack has driven more than US$4 billion in annual sales for over 20,000 merchant partners. Leong's journey from the Singapore Economic Development Board to leading ShopBack's expansion highlights his commitment to creating a rewarding shopping experience. ShopBack's entry into the U.S. market is timely, offering real cashback and gamified savings to value-driven consumers amidst rising inflation. The platform differentiates itself with mobile-first experiences and partnerships with major brands like Walmart and Amazon. ShopBack's success is attributed to its adaptability, local market understanding, and a clear mission to deliver value to both advertisers and consumers.

The platform's innovative approach, including gamification and quests, has significantly enhanced user engagement and retention. ShopBack's strategy as a performance partner to brands emphasizes measurable sales and high-intent shoppers. Looking ahead, Leong envisions ShopBack as the go-to platform for smarter spending in the U.S., focusing on convenience, value, and control. The Q&A with Joel Leong sheds light on the future of consumer fintech and e-commerce, emphasizing the importance of value, personalization, and seamless savings experiences.

item.title: Fortec Modern Real Estate Pioneers $100 Million Fund to Address Childcare Deserts
item.description:
Pablo Barreiro, Chairman of Fortec, a national leader in early childhood education development, has transformed the overlooked real estate sector of early education into one of the most promising asset classes in the country. With over two decades of experience in commercial real estate, Barreiro has led Fortec to complete over $200 million in early education projects. Fortec's mission is to build purpose-driven schools that meet the unique needs of early childhood learning environments, addressing the critical shortage of quality early childhood education facilities. The company recently launched a $100 million fund to develop 50-60 schools across the U.S., targeting underserved communities and partnering with mission-aligned operators. Fortec's approach is designed to deliver schools that are not only code-compliant but also classroom-ready, licensing-optimized, and enrollment-aligned, thereby solving a systemic shortage in early childhood education.

Fortec's strategy involves identifying high-growth, underserved communities and developing facilities that align with the operational, licensing, and learning requirements of early childhood education. The company's proprietary development system ensures that each project is tailored to the specific needs of early childhood education, from zoning and traffic to classroom layouts and vendor needs. With the early childhood education sector at the intersection of demographic demand, public policy momentum, and social impact, Fortec is uniquely positioned to respond to the growing need for high-quality early-learning environments. The company's efforts are not just about financial returns but also about creating real estate that delivers performance and purpose, supporting educators, empowering families, and expanding access to early education.

item.title: Joseph H. Powell: Blending Pragmatism with Innovation in Architecture
item.description:
Joseph H. Powell, AIA, LEED AP, a principal at BKP Architects, shares insights into his architectural journey and the philosophy behind BKP's community-focused designs in a revealing Q&A. Founded in 1996, BKP Architects stands out for its commitment to creating purposeful architecture that serves educational, institutional, and civic clients. Powell's background in library design and his people-centered approach have significantly influenced the firm's projects, ranging from public libraries to zoos. His emphasis on pragmatism and creativity, stakeholder engagement, and the importance of professional community involvement offers valuable lessons for both clients and young architects.

In the interview, Powell discusses his accidental entry into architecture, the founding of BKP, and the firm's design philosophy that balances practicality with innovation. He highlights the importance of listening to clients and the community to create spaces that are both functional and inspiring. Powell also offers advice on hiring architects, the significance of professional leadership, and tips for young professionals starting their careers in architecture.

item.title: Andrew Weissman's Vision for Transforming Residential Living and Addressing Real Estate Challenges
item.description: Andrew Weissman, a seasoned real estate professional with over 25 years of experience, currently serves as the Director of North Jersey for JCMLiving, overseeing a portfolio of 22 residential rental communities. His journey in the real estate industry was inspired by his grandfather, leading him to a career that combines operational excellence with a sense of purpose. Weissman shares insights into his career, including amusing anecdotes and the importance of putting residents' needs first, a principle that defines JCMLiving's approach. He also discusses the exciting Rosera Wesmont project in Wood-Ridge, NJ, which transforms historic industrial land into a luxury residential community. Weissman's concerns include the need for affordable housing reform and overregulation in real estate, while his advice for success emphasizes empathy, patience, and persistence. His vision for a movement involves embedding hospitality principles into residential living to enhance community life.

item.title: Helios AI Revolutionizes Supply Chain Management Amid Climate Volatility
item.description:
Francisco Martin-Rayo, CEO of Helios AI, shares insights into the genesis and mission of the world's leading climate risk platform in a revealing Q&A. With a background that spans startups, digital transformation consulting, and even an avocado importing business, Martin-Rayo, alongside co-founder Eden Canlilar, a former Google senior AI engineer and Abie Award winner, founded Helios AI to tackle the unpredictable nature of today's supply chains. The platform leverages AI to forecast agricultural disruptions and commodity prices, offering companies a much-needed edge in navigating climate volatility, geopolitical tensions, and shifting consumer demands. A standout example includes Helios AI's prediction of a sharp rise in global mandarin prices, enabling Libby's to save 15% on procurement costs. The interview delves into the challenges of supply chain forecasting, the impact of climate crises on global supply chains, and the role of AI in fostering resilience and adaptation in the face of environmental uncertainties.

Helios AI stands at the intersection of technology and real-world problem-solving, aiming to mitigate the effects of climate change on the global food supply chain. The company's location in Washington D.C. is strategic, positioning it close to policy-making centers and federal agencies, underscoring its commitment to addressing climate challenges through innovation. Martin-Rayo's diverse career and passion for solving complex problems highlight the human element behind Helios AI's technological advancements, emphasizing the importance of AI in providing timely solutions to pressing global issues.

item.title: Global IT Security Survey Reveals Cybersecurity Gaps in SMBs
item.description:
Maxime Trottier, a key figure at Devolutions, is at the forefront of driving growth and enhancing customer experience through his leadership in revenue, support, and product marketing. Devolutions specializes in providing Privileged Access Management (PAM), password management, and remote access tools tailored for small and mid-sized businesses (SMBs), offering a secure, scalable, and user-friendly alternative to complex enterprise solutions. The company's mission is to empower IT teams to bolster security without hindering productivity, a vision that's reflected in their annual global IT security survey. Now in its fifth year, this survey sheds light on the cybersecurity challenges and trends within SMBs, revealing a significant gap between awareness and operational maturity in handling cyber threats.

The latest survey highlights include a concerning reliance on manual PAM processes, with 52% of SMBs using spreadsheets or shared vaults for privileged access, and a notable disparity in addressing insider threats, where only 20% have a formal strategy despite 78% expressing concern. These findings not only inform Devolutions' product development, emphasizing ease of adoption and scalability, but also underscore the company's commitment to making cybersecurity accessible and practical for SMBs. Recognition as a 2025 Champion in Info-Tech’s Emotional Footprint Report for PAM further validates Devolutions' approach, highlighting the effectiveness of their solutions in meeting the unique needs of SMBs.

item.title: CryptoraX Exchange Launches Multilingual Access Framework to Bridge Global Financial Inclusion Gap
item.description:
CryptoraX Exchange has launched its innovative Multilingual Access Framework, a comprehensive initiative aimed at breaking down language and cultural barriers in digital finance. This groundbreaking framework introduces a suite of features including language-aware navigation, localized user journeys, and 24/7 multilingual live support, designed to provide a seamless and culturally attuned experience for users across the globe. With initial support for 12 languages and targeting key regions such as Southeast Asia, the DACH market, Latin America, and the MENA region, CryptoraX is setting a new standard for inclusivity in the fintech sector. The initiative has already shown promising results, with significant improvements in user engagement and retention in non-English-dominant regions.

At the heart of this initiative is the belief that technology should be accessible to all, regardless of language or geography. Jacqueline Miles, Director of Global Technology Partnerships at CryptoraX Exchange, emphasizes the importance of creating a platform where users can experience trust natively, without the need for translation. The framework's dynamic architecture allows for rapid updates and region-specific customizations, ensuring that CryptoraX remains at the forefront of financial innovation. With plans to expand language coverage to over 20 languages by year-end, CryptoraX is committed to making digital finance more accessible and user-friendly for a global audience.

item.title: Vivakor Inc. Pioneers Sustainable Energy Logistics and Remediation
item.description:
Vivakor (NASDAQ: VIVK), a leader in sustainable energy logistics and remediation, is making waves in the energy sector with its innovative approach to handling oilfield fluids and waste. The company, which operates one of the largest oilfield trucking fleets in the U.S., offers end-to-end solutions for crude oil and produced water management. Through long-term contracts and strategic asset positioning, Vivakor is setting a new standard for environmentally responsible operations in the energy industry. Their vision to integrate logistics with remediation practices positions them as a key player in supporting the evolving energy ecosystem. For more details, visit https://ibn.fm/lbszd.

item.description:
Alphabet Inc., the parent company of Google, is currently trading at a valuation below the S&P 500 average, making it the most affordable among the 'Magnificent Seven' tech giants. item.title: Meta Platforms Inc. Invests $14.8 Billion in Scale AI to Bolster AI Capabilities
item.description:
Meta Platforms (NASDAQ: META) is making a significant leap into the artificial intelligence (AI) sector with a reported $14.8 billion investment for a 49% stake in Scale AI, a key player in data-labeling services essential for AI model training. This strategic move, led by Meta's Mark Zuckerberg and Scale AI's CEO Alexandr Wang, aims to establish a new "superintelligence" lab, marking a pivotal shift in Meta's AI strategy following challenges with its Llama 4 model and delays in the "Behemoth" project. The deal is under scrutiny by U.S. antitrust authorities, reflecting ongoing regulatory challenges Meta faces, yet it's bolstered by Scale AI's promising revenue projections and early investor confidence.

As of June 11, 2025, Meta's stock showed slight fluctuations, trading at $700.45, amidst a backdrop of regulatory and market dynamics. This investment underscores Meta's commitment to leading in AI innovation, despite hurdles. For more details, visit the full article on InvestorWire, a platform known for its comprehensive coverage of investment news and corporate communications.

item.title: NVIDIA's Quantum Computing Announcement Sparks Market Rally
item.description:
NVIDIA (NASDAQ: NVDA) has sparked a significant uptick in quantum computing stocks following CEO Jensen Huang's announcement at the VivaTech conference, where he highlighted the industry's reach of an "inflection point." This revelation, centered around NVIDIA's Cuda-Q platform facilitating practical quantum-classical hybrid solutions in sectors like chemistry and finance, has reinvigorated investor interest in quantum computing. Consequently, stocks of Quantum Computing Inc. (NASDAQ: QUBT), IonQ Inc. (NASDAQ: IONQ), Rigetti Computing Inc. (NASDAQ: RGTI), D-Wave Quantum Inc. (NYSE: QBTS), and Arqit Quantum Inc. (NASDAQ: ARQQ) experienced notable gains. Despite NVIDIA's slight dip in share price, the broader quantum ecosystem witnessed intraday gains ranging from 2% to 14%. For more details, visit the full article.

NVIDIA Corporation, a pioneer in GPU and AI computing technologies, continues to lead in innovation, with its Cuda-Q initiative bridging classical GPU capabilities with quantum systems. item.title: Snap Inc. Unveils Next-Generation AR Glasses and Major Snap OS Upgrades at Augmented World Expo 2025
item.description:
Snap Inc. (NYSE: SNAP), the innovative force behind Snapchat, has unveiled its next-generation AR glasses, Specs, set to revolutionize the augmented reality space by 2026. Announced at the Augmented World Expo 2025, these standalone wearable computers feature see-through lenses for overlaying digital content onto the real world, powered by on-device AI and significant upgrades to Snap OS. The enhancements include deep integrations with OpenAI and Google’s Gemini, a depth-module API for 3D spatial anchoring, and automated speech recognition in over 40 languages. Additionally, developer solutions like a Fleet Management app and Guided Navigation aim to foster shared AR experiences and productivity. Snap's shares saw a positive uptick following the announcement, trading at $8.67, up 2.12% for the day. For more details, visit the full article.

Snap Inc., headquartered in Santa Monica, California, has been a pioneer in AR and social media, investing over $3 billion in AR hardware and software development. With a global network of more than 400,000 developers creating over 4 million AR Lenses, Snap continues to lead at the intersection of AI, computer vision, and immersive computing. The announcement was covered by InvestorWire, a platform known for its advanced wire-grade press release syndication and part of the IBN portfolio, emphasizing the significance of Snap's latest innovation in the tech and investment communities.

item.title: Adageis Revolutionizes Healthcare with AI-Powered Platform for Value-Based Care
item.description:
Adageis, a healthcare technology company, is revolutionizing the way providers navigate the complexities of value-based care with its AI-powered platform. This innovative solution simplifies insurance contracts, identifies high-risk patients, and closes care gaps, all while enabling providers to track financial performance and align income with quality of care. With expectations to cover 580,000 patient lives by Q2 2025 and reach $100,000 in monthly recurring revenue, Adageis is poised for significant growth. The platform, now rebranded as a fintech AI solution, offers clarity on how clinical decisions impact revenue, providing three central benefits that stand out in the evolving healthcare landscape. For more insights, Read More>>.

item.title: SolarBank Pioneers Integration of Renewable Energy Revenue with Bitcoin Investment
item.description:
SolarBank Corporation, a leader in renewable and clean energy projects, is pioneering the integration of renewable energy with Bitcoin treasury management through its 3.79 MW Geddes Solar Power Project. Expected to commence revenue generation in June 2025, this initiative represents a novel approach by directing net revenue from the project towards Bitcoin investments, based on market conditions and operational cash flow. The Geddes facility, notable for its construction on a repurposed landfill, underscores SolarBank's commitment to clean energy and sustainable land use. This strategy may extend to other projects within SolarBank's extensive pipeline, marking a significant step in the convergence of renewable energy and digital currency investments.

For more details on SolarBank's innovative approach, visit GreenEnergyStocks. This move not only highlights the company's forward-thinking strategy but also sets a precedent for how renewable energy projects can diversify revenue streams through digital assets.

item.title: Tesla Announces Tentative June Debut for Robotaxi Service in Austin
item.description:
Tesla Inc. (NASDAQ: TSLA), a leader in electric vehicles and clean energy, has announced a tentative launch date of June 22 for its highly anticipated robotaxi service in Austin, Texas. This move comes after Elon Musk, Tesla's CEO, stepped back from a public disagreement with former President Trump, signaling a focus on the company's autonomous ride-hailing ambitions. Despite the excitement, Tesla remains cautious about safety, with Musk admitting the launch date could change. The announcement has reignited investor confidence, contributing to a rise in Tesla's stock price for the third consecutive day. The robotaxi service represents a significant step towards realizing Tesla's vision for autonomous transportation, though challenges such as regulatory approval and operational logistics remain.

The article also highlights the role of GreenCarStocks (GCS), a specialized communications platform focusing on electric vehicles and the green energy sector, in disseminating this news. item.title: Lantern Pharma Harnesses AI to Revolutionize Oncology Drug Development
item.description:
Lantern Pharma (NASDAQ: LTRN), a clinical-stage biotechnology company, is making waves in the oncology sector with its AI-driven RADR(R) platform, which integrates over 200 billion oncology-specific data points. This innovative approach underpins the development of its precision oncology pipeline, featuring three lead drug candidates targeting major oncology markets such as NSCLC, TNBC, and NHL. Additionally, through Starlight Therapeutics, Lantern is expanding its reach into brain and CNS cancers, including pediatric indications, supported by orphan and rare disease designations. The company's commitment to transforming cancer treatment is further evidenced by its receipt of multiple FDA designations, including Fast Track, Orphan Drug, and Rare Pediatric Disease status, enhancing regulatory pathways for its portfolio. With approximately $19.7 million in cash and equivalents, Lantern is well-funded to advance its pipeline and platform development through at least mid-2026.

Lantern Pharma's vision leverages large-scale genomics, AI-based biomarker discovery, and preclinical modeling to accelerate the development of oncology drugs. Its pipeline includes three lead small molecule candidates and an antibody-drug conjugate (ADC), showcasing the company's dedication to redefining oncology drug development. For those interested in following Lantern Pharma's progress, updates are available in the company's newsroom at https://ibn.fm/LTRN. This story is a testament to the potential of AI and machine learning in revolutionizing cancer treatment, offering hope for more effective and targeted therapies.

item.title: Broadcom's Fiscal Q2 Highlights Surge in AI Chip Sales and Market Confidence
item.description:
Broadcom Inc. (NASDAQ: AVGO) has reported a significant 20% year-over-year revenue increase to $15 billion in its fiscal Q2 results, with AI-related chip sales soaring by 46% to $4.4 billion. This remarkable performance has led to analyst upgrades and a boost in investor confidence, despite more cautious forward guidance. The company's stock saw a 2.75% increase, trading at $251.36 as of the latest session. Broadcom, a global technology leader, specializes in semiconductor and infrastructure software solutions, catering to key markets such as data center, networking, and wireless. For more details, visit the full article.

item.title: farm-ng Unveils Major Software Updates to Enhance Agricultural Robotics for Small and Medium-Sized Farms
item.description:
farm-ng, a pioneer in accessible agricultural robotics, has unveiled major updates to its on-robot software stack, aiming to make advanced farming technology more affordable and user-friendly for small and medium-sized farms. The enhancements include a grower-centric user interface, automated implement control, improved navigation accuracy, and a new Job Manager to streamline field operations. These updates, available over-the-air, are designed to empower farmers with minimal technical expertise to efficiently manage tasks like seeding, weeding, and spraying with the Amiga robotic platform.

Brendan Dowdle, CEO of farm-ng, emphasized the company's commitment to responding to user feedback by making agricultural technology accessible to farms of all sizes. The updated UI and Job Manager feature are highlighted as key improvements that simplify operations and reduce human error, showcasing farm-ng's dedication to innovation and productivity in agriculture.

item.title: Minivela Strengthens Leadership with Media Veteran Cristina Sarnoff to Scale Bilingual Drama Shorts Platform
item.description:
Minivela, a pioneering bilingual drama shorts platform aimed at Latino audiences in the U.S. and Latin America, has welcomed Cristina Sarnoff, a veteran media executive, as a shareholder and strategic partner. Sarnoff, with her extensive background at Warner Bros. Discovery US Hispanic and her own Sarnoff Media Co., is set to propel Minivela's innovative storytelling across digital, CTV, and streaming platforms. This collaboration underscores Minivela's commitment to delivering culturally rich, short-form content that resonates with Latino Gen Z and Millennial audiences, featuring genres from romantic comedies to supernatural thrillers.

The platform, a joint venture involving actor Carlos Ponce, Brilla Media, Numatec, and Sarnoff Media Co., is revolutionizing the way Latino stories are told and consumed. With exclusive production partnerships and a focus on family-friendly, bilingual content, Minivela is accessible across various social media platforms and YouTube, offering brands unique opportunities to engage with multicultural audiences. The involvement of high-profile figures like Sarnoff and Ponce, along with partnerships with Chicano Hollywood and influencer Haydita Veloz, highlights Minivela's potential to become a significant player in the digital content space.

item.title: Comcast's Rio Rancho Expansion Marks a Digital Milestone for Over 20,000 Homes and Businesses
item.description: Comcast has reached a significant milestone in Rio Rancho, completing over half of its expansion project to bring its high-speed fiber network to more than 20,000 homes and businesses. This initiative includes a variety of services such as Xfinity Internet, Xfinity Mobile, and Comcast Business Internet and Mobile. The project, praised by local officials like Mayor Greggory Hull and Jerry Schalow of the Rio Rancho Regional Chamber of Commerce, is set to enhance economic growth and digital access in the community. Upon completion, residents and businesses will have access to Comcast's comprehensive suite of products, including Internet, video, mobile, voice, and home security solutions, alongside programs aimed at bridging the digital divide like Internet Essentials and Lift Zones.

item.title: SFC Network Launches to Revolutionize High School Football Streaming
item.description:
The Super Football Conference (SFC), in partnership with Accelerate Sports Ventures, has launched the SFC Network, a premier streaming platform for high school football in New Jersey. This initiative aims to showcase top-tier programs such as Bergen Catholic, Delbarton, and others, providing a platform for student-athletes to build their brands and leverage NIL opportunities. Accelerate Sports Ventures will oversee the operational aspects, including corporate partnerships and marketing, while Varsity Media and Hudl will handle production and technology, respectively. The network promises high-quality game coverage with professional announcers and multiple camera angles, available for a subscription fee of $79.

Key figures like SFC President Tom Mullahey and Accelerate CEO Doug Fillis emphasize the importance of this platform in supporting student-athletes' futures in the evolving landscape of college football and NIL agreements. The SFC Network is set to stream at least 40 games this fall, offering fans live and on-demand access, marking a significant step forward in high school sports broadcasting.

item.description:
The UK government is exploring the introduction of new regulations aimed at limiting the daily social media usage for children, as part of broader initiatives to safeguard young individuals from excessive online exposure and harmful content. This development could have significant implications for global social media entities, including Thumzup Media Corp. (NASDAQ: TZUP), highlighting the ongoing discourse on balancing digital engagement with youth protection. item.title: West Lane Partners Strengthens Advisory Team with Sheon Karol, a Veteran in Investment Banking and Restructuring
item.description:
West Lane Partners, a private equity firm specializing in middle market companies across various sectors, has announced the addition of Sheon Karol as a Senior Advisor. Karol, a seasoned investment banker and restructuring advisor with over 30 years of experience, is renowned for his expertise in complex M&A, capital raises, and operational turnarounds. His approach to de-risking situations and ability to navigate complex deals has earned him national recognition, including the "Boutique Investment Banker of the Year" award. Deryck Palmer, Founder and Managing Partner at West Lane Partners, praised Karol's dynamic approach and deep market insight, highlighting his ability to align stakeholders and adapt in real-time to keep transactions on course. Karol views the middle market as an underserved segment, emphasizing the importance of bringing high-caliber insight to businesses at pivotal moments. His extensive experience includes advising on high-stakes transactions across various industries and serving in executive roles, such as Chief Restructuring Officer for a $1 billion company. Karol's addition to West Lane Partners is expected to enhance the firm's capability to generate long-term value for its clients.

For more information, visit West Lane Partners.

item.title: Brera Holdings PLC and Toronto Blizzard Corp. Forge Path for Young Soccer Talents
item.description:
Brera Holdings (NASDAQ: BREA) has entered into a strategic advisory agreement with Toronto Blizzard Corp., Canada's premier soccer scholarship academy, to forge a pathway for young athletes into professional soccer. This collaboration leverages Brera's extensive multi-club global network, including clubs like SS Juve Stabia in Italy and Brera Strumica FC in North Macedonia, to provide youth players aged 3 to 18 with unparalleled development opportunities. The initiative, targeting the lucrative youth sports and sports tourism markets, will introduce Talent ID camps and European academy experiences starting in 2026, alongside friendly matches and further integration efforts. This move underscores Brera Holdings' dedication to creating cross-continental development pathways for aspiring soccer players, both boys and girls.

For more details on this groundbreaking partnership, visit the full press release at https://nnw.fm/p4URw. Brera Holdings PLC is committed to expanding its social impact through football by developing a global portfolio of emerging sports clubs, offering increased opportunities for tournament prizes, sponsorships, and professional growth. Discover more about their mission at www.BreraHoldings.com.

item.title: AI-Powered Interview Scheduling Agent Revolutionizes Recruiting Industry
item.description: candidate.fyi, a company revolutionizing the recruitment process for high-growth teams, has unveiled fyi, the world's first AI-powered interview scheduling agent. This innovative tool is designed to streamline the recruitment coordination process, enabling teams to operate more efficiently and enhance the candidate experience. Trusted by industry leaders such as Intercom, Discord, GoPro, Bally's, and Collective Health, fyi stands out by automating tedious scheduling tasks while maintaining a human touch. CEO Kyle Connors highlights the transformative potential of fyi, emphasizing its ability to reduce hours of manual work to mere seconds. The platform offers instant matching of candidates and interviewers, effortless rescheduling, automated follow-ups, and seamless integration with existing systems, all while providing recruiters with full control. Discover how fyi is setting a new standard in recruiting coordination by visiting candidate.fyi/product/fyi.

item.title: Kamada Ltd. Reports Strong Q1 2025 Growth with Revenue Up 17% and Adjusted EBITDA Surging 54%
item.description: Kamada Ltd. (NASDAQ: KMDA) has reported a strong first quarter in 2025, with revenue up by 17% and Adjusted EBITDA by 54% year-over-year, signaling robust growth through its diverse portfolio and operational efficiency. CEO Amir London highlighted the company's disciplined expense management and portfolio diversity as key drivers. Notably, products like GLASSIA®, KAMRAB®, and VARIZIG® have contributed significantly to this growth, catering to treatments for emphysema, rabies prevention, and varicella disease prophylaxis, respectively. Kamada also launched a post-marketing research program for CYTOGAM®, aiming to enhance CMV disease management, and expanded its plasma collection operations with a new center in San Antonio, Texas, expected to add $8-$10 million in annual revenue. The company has reiterated its 2025 guidance, projecting total revenue between $178-$182 million and adjusted EBITDA of $38-$42 million, reflecting confidence in its strategic growth pillars.

item.title: FINTECH Media Group Acquires America First News, Launches 24/7 Global News Channel Focused on U.S. Policies and Economic Impact
item.description:
FINTECH Media Group, a global powerhouse in finance and innovation media, has made a significant move by acquiring America First News (AFN), rebranding it into a 24/7 global news channel. This new iteration of AFN is set to focus on fact-driven reporting that underscores how U.S. policies influence job creation, national security, and economic vitality. Highlighting mutual investment and recognizing excellence through the AFN Liberty & Leadership Awards, the channel aims to shine a light on American factories, reshoring efforts, and the strategic use of policies like immigration enforcement and technology sovereignty for national and worker protection. With a strong emphasis on government accountability, AFN plans to tackle waste and inefficiency in federal agencies, backed by a dedicated investigative team.

Under the leadership of Vince Molinari, Founder & CEO of FINTECH Media Group, and AFN Co-Founders Evelio Silvera and Josh Feuerstein, the channel promises to bring clarity and measurable outcomes to news reporting. The introduction of the AFN Liberty & Leadership Awards will celebrate contributions to American economic interests and community resilience across various categories. AFN's content will be widely distributed across multiple platforms, ensuring global reach. This acquisition underscores FINTECH Media Group's commitment to expanding its influence in global finance media, following its recent acquisitions of Bull Street, Coin Street, and Breakout: Audio Social Network.

item.title: Better Trucks' Checkpoint Technology Wins 'Last Mile Innovation of the Year' at SupplyTech Breakthrough Awards
item.description:
Better Trucks, a technology-driven logistics firm, has been awarded the "Last Mile Innovation of the Year" for its Checkpoint technology by SupplyTech Breakthrough, a leading market intelligence organization. Checkpoint, a revolutionary address validation solution, combines AI, human oversight, and geofencing to ensure accurate parcel deliveries, addressing the persistent issue of incorrect addresses in the last-mile delivery sector. This innovation not only enhances customer satisfaction but also significantly reduces operational costs associated with returned packages. With approximately 60 million parcels delivered daily in the U.S. and up to three million affected by address errors, Checkpoint's multilayered approach, including Google Address Validation and SMS-based customer verification, sets a new standard for reliability and efficiency in logistics.

The recognition by SupplyTech Breakthrough underscores the transformative potential of Checkpoint in revolutionizing the last-mile delivery process. Better Trucks' commitment to innovation is evident in its strategic use of technology to solve one of the industry's most challenging problems, offering a scalable solution that benefits both shippers and recipients. The ability to white-label the Checkpoint technology further allows clients to maintain brand consistency while improving customer engagement. This achievement highlights Better Trucks' role as a pioneer in the logistics industry, dedicated to delivering better value and experience for all stakeholders involved in the parcel delivery ecosystem.

item.title: G6 Hospitality Revolutionizes Guest Booking with AI-Powered My6 App
item.description:
G6 Hospitality, the parent company behind the iconic Motel 6 and Studio 6 brands, has launched the My6 2.0 app, a groundbreaking upgrade that leverages advanced AI to personalize the booking experience for users. This innovative app not only doubles performance speed and halves latency but also introduces a proprietary AI-powered recommendation engine. This engine smartly matches guests with properties that best fit their preferences, significantly enhancing property visibility and occupancy rates. With features like dynamic homepage experiences, personalized deals, and an interactive map for neighborhood exploration, the app aims to boost conversion rates and reduce booking abandonment. Early results show a 14% year-over-year increase in direct bookings, signaling a successful start. The app is part of G6 Hospitality's commitment to making hospitality accessible and efficient, with plans for further AI enhancements and payment options like Google Pay and Apple Pay on the horizon.

The My6 2.0 app is now available for download on iOS and Android platforms, marking a significant step forward in the hospitality industry's digital transformation. For more details, visit www.g6hospitality.com.

item.title: Bacula Systems Enhances Data Protection with Native IBM Spectrum Scale Integration
item.description:
Bacula Systems, a leader in high-security backup and recovery solutions, has announced a groundbreaking native integration with IBM Spectrum Scale (GPFS), enhancing backup efficiency for large-scale, high-throughput file systems. This collaboration allows Bacula Enterprise to operate seamlessly within GPFS environments, offering IT teams unparalleled backup efficiency, reduced system load, and robust data protection. Jorge Gea, CTO of Bacula Systems, highlights the integration as a significant advancement for enterprises and HPC environments dealing with massive data volumes, combining Bacula's secure backup engine with GPFS's performance for a resilient, efficient solution.

The integration brings several key benefits, including direct GPFS interoperability, extreme scalability, optimized throughput, high-security data protection, advanced file-level control, cost optimization, and seamless integration with HPC workflows. Bacula Systems continues to set industry standards with its adaptable, secure, enterprise-grade backup solutions, now with native support for both ZFS and GPFS. This development is particularly relevant for Bacula's prestigious clientele, including NASA, Navisite, and Warner Bros Discovery, among others. For more details, visit www.baculasystems.com.

item.title: Bayuk Pratt Law Firm Achieves Prestigious Band 1 Ranking by Chambers and Partners
item.description: The Atlanta-based law firm Bayuk Pratt has been awarded a prestigious Band 1 ranking in the 2025 Chambers and Partners lawyer rankings for Georgia in the area of 'Litigation: Mainly Plaintiffs.' This recognition highlights the firm's exceptional legal expertise, professionalism, and dedication to client service. Founded by Frank Bayuk and Bradley Pratt, both of whom have backgrounds in elite defense law firms, Bayuk Pratt specializes in representing individuals and families in personal injury and civil litigation cases, securing over $300 million in recoveries for its clients. Notably, the firm played a key role in a landmark $2.1 billion verdict against Monsanto for a client who developed cancer from using Roundup weedkiller. The Chambers rankings, known for their rigorous and independent research process, place Bayuk Pratt among the top law firms in their field, underscoring their technical legal ability, commercial astuteness, and commitment to justice.

item.description:

This 10mm wide bracelet, featuring the renowned Cuban chain design, is a testament to the brand's commitment to bold design and unparalleled craftsmanship. Each link is meticulously handcrafted, ensuring durability and a mirror-like finish, making it not just an accessory but a modern heirloom. The bracelet is customizable, offering engraving options to personalize this symbol of heritage and personal achievement.

The Standard Cuban Chain Bracelet is part of ByEnzo's elite collection of platinum men's jewelry, reinforcing the brand's status as a global authority in luxury platinum craftsmanship. ByEnzo Jewelry specializes in creating pieces that embody strength, simplicity, and sophisticated masculinity, tailored for men who value authenticity and timeless design. This release highlights the brand's dedication to craftsmanship and character, offering jewelry that stands the test of time in both form and meaning.

item.title: California Businesses Turn to Fast Guard Service Amid Civil Unrest and ICE Operations
item.description:

The situation echoes the 2020 George Floyd protests, highlighting the urgent need for security in high-risk areas. Fast Guard Service offers a range of services, including armed and unarmed guards, to ensure safety and compliance during these turbulent times.

Roderick C. Payne Jr, President of Fast Guard Service, emphasizes the importance of preparedness and trust in today's security landscape. With a rapid deployment model and a 24/7 operations center, Fast Guard Service is equipped to meet the evolving needs of businesses across California, offering peace of mind in uncertain situations.

item.title: Easy Dynamics Corporation Secures $50 Million Contract with USDA to Enhance Cybersecurity and Cloud Modernization
item.description: Easy Dynamics Corporation (EZD), a prominent cybersecurity services provider, has successfully secured a five-year contract recompete with the U.S. Department of Agriculture (USDA) to continue its provision of Identity, Credential, and Access Management (ICAM) and cloud modernization services. This contract, awarded after a competitive bidding process on May 28, 2025, underscores EZD's proven capability in delivering essential cybersecurity infrastructure and cloud transformation solutions. Greg Gordon, Chief Delivery Officer at EZD, expressed pride in the USDA's continued trust, highlighting the company's commitment to enhancing federal agencies' cybersecurity and digital transformation efforts. EZD's role under this contract includes advancing ICAM solutions and cloud modernization, ensuring agencies meet security and compliance standards while improving user experience. Easy Dynamics Corporation stands out as a trusted advisor in cybersecurity, cloud computing, and information sharing, dedicated to delivering technical excellence and strategic advice to its clients.

item.description:

With over 20 years of experience in financial and operational leadership across various technology sectors, Nierman's expertise is expected to drive SeaTrain's mission to revolutionize ocean shipping. Her role will focus on overseeing finance, accounting, risk management, and supply chain operations, crucial for the company's growth and its commitment to environmental sustainability. Nierman's appointment is seen as a strategic move to bolster SeaTrain's position in the maritime industry, especially as it continues to develop its patented submersible glider technology in collaboration with industry partners and regulatory bodies.

SeaTrain Technology, headquartered in Boynton Beach, Florida, aims to set new standards in ship design, construction, and operation, emphasizing innovation, sustainability, efficiency, and safety. The company's initiatives are poised to make significant impacts on the shipping, energy, and defense sectors. For more details on SeaTrain's groundbreaking work, visit SeaTrain Technology.

item.description:

This podcast aims to challenge societal norms and celebrate the power, aging, reinvention, and visibility of women in their 40s, 50s, and beyond. With a lineup of influential guests like real estate mogul Tracy Tutor and women's health expert Dr. Louise Newson, the podcast promises engaging discussions on topics ranging from hormonal health to ambition at every age. Jensen, a decorated U.S. Marine Corps veteran and a renowned branding expert, brings over a decade of experience in lifestyle brand development and digital strategy. His leadership at Grunt Style has transformed it into a top patriotic apparel brand in the U.S., known for its bold messaging and strong cultural identity. item.title: SolarBank Corporation Embraces Bitcoin as a Strategic Reserve Asset
item.description:
SolarBank Corporation, a leading developer in renewable and clean energy projects, has announced a strategic move to integrate Bitcoin into its treasury operations. This decision aligns with a growing trend among public companies seeking to hedge against inflation and currency volatility by diversifying their cash reserves with digital assets. SolarBank has filed to open an account with Coinbase Prime for secure custody and transactions, though it has not yet purchased any Bitcoin. The allocation will be contingent on market conditions and the company's liquidity needs. This initiative underscores SolarBank's commitment to financial resilience while maintaining its core focus on solar and battery energy storage projects across Canada and the U.S. The company's approach mirrors strategies adopted by other firms like MicroStrategy and SharpLink Gaming, blending clean energy commitments with digital asset exposure.

For more details on SolarBank's innovative strategy, visit GreenEnergyStocks.

item.title: High-Performance Data Centers Face Concrete Degradation Risks, Kryton Warns
item.description:
In response to the escalating demand for high-performance data centers, Kryton International, a pioneer in concrete waterproofing and durability solutions, highlights the critical issue of concrete degradation threatening data center uptime and longevity. With the integration of robotics and automation, the necessity for ultra-durable, waterproof concrete has become paramount. Forbes reports that data center outages can cost over $9,000 per minute, emphasizing the financial stakes of infrastructure failures. Kryton's innovative products, Krystol Internal Membrane™ (KIM®) and Hard-Cem®, offer solutions by making concrete self-sealing, waterproof, and abrasion-resistant, addressing the challenges posed by modern data center operations and environmental factors.

The article underscores the importance of advanced concrete solutions in ensuring the structural integrity and operational resilience of data centers, especially in regions with high water tables or extreme weather conditions. Kryton's technologies not only prevent costly shutdowns and equipment damage but also enhance energy and cost efficiency, marking a significant advancement in data center infrastructure.

item.title: ECGI Holdings Invests in AI-Enhanced Fantasy Sports Platform Payday Fantasy
item.description:
ECGI Holdings (OTC: ECGI) has made a strategic move by investing in Payday Fantasy, a cutting-edge fantasy sports platform that leverages artificial intelligence to enhance social engagement and user experience. This investment, made through ECGI's Uplist Ventures arm, underscores the company's commitment to supporting innovative early-stage companies with high growth potential. Payday Fantasy distinguishes itself from traditional betting apps by integrating smart picks, real-time advice, and interactive features, drawing inspiration from platforms like DraftKings, Discord, and Twitch. With over 15,000 users already onboard during its limited rollout, Payday Fantasy is gearing up for the launch of Version 2, aimed at further boosting user retention and growth.

Beyond its venture into the tech and gaming sector, ECGI Holdings boasts a diverse portfolio that includes viticulture and luxury fashion. The company manages a five-acre vineyard in Lake County, California, specializing in Petite Sirah, and has invested in Pacific Saddlery, a luxury equestrian tack and apparel retailer. This unique blend of investments highlights ECGI's strategy to innovate across various markets, from technology to luxury lifestyle.
