As part of the InvestorBrandNetwork (IBN), MNW provides extensive distribution channels, including wire solutions, editorial syndication, and social media, to amplify the reach of its content. This news underscores the increasing demand for secure gold storage options amidst global instability, with Singapore positioning itself as a key player in this niche market.

item.title: Alpha Modus Strengthens Leadership Team with Appointment of Tim Matthews as Head of Deployment Strategy
item.description:
Alpha Modus Holdings, a pioneer in AI-driven retail technology, has announced the appointment of Tim Matthews as the Head of Deployment Strategy. This strategic move is aimed at accelerating the national expansion of the CashX smart kiosk network, a proprietary technology designed to revolutionize the retail cash experience by integrating with crypto-enabled financial services. Matthews, with his extensive background in fintech and digital product launches, is expected to bring operational discipline and user-centricity to the forefront of Alpha Modus's mission. The company's press room, available at https://alphamodus.com/press-room/, highlights the rapid growth and strategic alignment of CashX with AI-powered retail infrastructure.

Chris Chumas, Chief Strategy Officer at Alpha Modus, emphasized Matthews' proven track record in performance marketing and digital transformation as key to meeting the growing demand for CashX kiosks. Matthews himself expressed enthusiasm for the opportunity to lead the deployment during its breakout phase, citing the readiness of the market and the technology. His compensation package, including equity incentives and profit-sharing, underscores the company's commitment to aligning strategic outcomes with shareholder value. For more details, visit the Alpha Modus press room at https://alphamodus.com/press-room/.

item.title: THEIA Analytics Group Strengthens Leadership with Appointment of Stephen Baker as Strategic Growth Advisor
item.description:
THEIA Analytics Group, Inc., a leader in quantitative risk insights, has welcomed Stephen Baker as a Strategic Advisor. With a rich background in global financial markets, Baker's expertise is expected to propel THEIA's growth, especially within the asset management and hedge fund sectors. His previous roles at Coremont LLP and ICE Data Services highlight a career dedicated to expanding business revenues and enhancing sales strategies. Baker's advisory role will focus on leveraging his extensive network and sales experience to broaden THEIA's global footprint.

THEIA's innovative platform, Regulatory Risk Ranx (RRX), stands at the forefront of transforming qualitative governance data into actionable intelligence. With over 30 patents protecting its technology, RRX offers unparalleled insights into regulatory and political risks, drawing from a vast database of over 12 billion data points. The platform's recognition at the 2024 FIA Innovators Pavilion underscores its impact on the governance intelligence space. CEO Jeff Hood praises Baker's addition to the team, emphasizing his potential to enhance THEIA's offerings and expand its reach among global fiduciaries.

item.title: Meketa Investment Group Expands Employee Ownership with Addition of Matt Curran
item.description:
Meketa Investment Group, a global leader in investment consulting and fiduciary management, has announced the expansion of its employee ownership by welcoming Matt Curran, CFA, CAIA, as a new shareholder. Curran, a Research Consultant on the Public Markets Manager Research team, has been recognized for his significant contributions to the firm's research and consulting efforts. This move underscores Meketa's commitment to growth and culture, as highlighted by Managing Principal and Co-CEO Peter Woolley. With over 70 shareholders, Meketa continues to strengthen its position in the industry, offering independent advice and customized investment solutions to a diverse clientele.

Matt Curran's expertise in equity investment manager evaluation and selection has been instrumental in enhancing Meketa's manager research platform, as noted by Hayley Tran, CFA, CAIA, Head of Global Equity Research. His elevation to shareholder status reflects the firm's dedication to fostering talent and delivering exceptional service to its clients. Meketa's approach to investment consulting is deeply relational, focusing on understanding each client's unique goals to provide tailored advice and support. The firm's impressive $2.3 trillion in assets under advisement as of December 31, 2024, speaks volumes about its credibility and success in the financial sector.

item.title: B. Riley Securities Strengthens Real Estate Investment Banking Team with Eric Dobi
item.description:
B. Riley Securities, Inc., a prominent middle market investment bank, has announced the appointment of Eric Dobi as a Senior Managing Director in its Real Estate Investment Banking group. This strategic hire highlights the firm's commitment to enhancing its team with seasoned professionals who possess extensive industry relationships and expertise. Eric Dobi, with 25 years of experience in the real estate investment banking sector, is renowned for his proficiency in capital markets and strategic advisory services, having advised on over $40 billion in transactions.

Jimmy Baker, Co-CEO and Head of Capital Markets at BRS, expressed enthusiasm about Dobi's joining, emphasizing his reputation as a trusted advisor in the global real estate market. Similarly, Joe Nardini, Senior Managing Director and Head of Investment Banking at BRS, highlighted Dobi's industrious approach and the immediate benefits his expertise would bring to clients. Dobi himself is excited to contribute to BRS's culture of excellence and innovative client solutions, drawing on his previous leadership roles at Wedbush Securities, BMO Capital Markets, and Deutsche Bank.

item.title: CompQsoft Digital Strengthens Leadership with New Chief Customer Officer to Drive Digital Transformation
item.description:
CompQsoft Digital, a global Microsoft solutions and services provider, has announced the appointment of Andrew Jeffers as Chief Customer Officer (CCO). With over 25 years of experience in delivering Microsoft-focused enterprise solutions, Jeffers is set to lead customer success initiatives, oversee digital transformations, and maximize customer value across the company’s Cloud and AI offerings. His previous roles at leading technology firms like Deloitte and IBM/Neudesic highlight his expertise in driving customer engagement and business outcomes. Greg Moser, President and Board Member at CompQsoft Digital, praised Jeffers for his proven track record in fostering growth and innovation, aligning with the company's vision to prioritize customer experiences.

Andrew Jeffers expressed his excitement about joining CompQsoft Digital, emphasizing the mission to ensure customer health, drive retention, and deliver exceptional value through innovation and excellence. CompQsoft Digital, known for its innovative management consulting services, aims to empower businesses with agile, customer-centric solutions leveraging Microsoft technologies. The company's offerings include Cloud Modernization, Data & Analytics, and next-gen innovations like Generative AI, backed by its commitment to excellence as an ISO-certified and CMMI Level 3 organization.

item.title: Vocatus Recognized as Finalist in WealthManagement.com 2025 Industry Awards
item.description: Vocatus, a premier communications and marketing firm specializing in the financial services sector, has once again been recognized as a finalist for the Best Client PR Campaign at the Wealth Management 2025 Industry Awards, also known as the 'Wealthies'. This marks the second consecutive year of such honor, highlighting Vocatus' exceptional work with Callan Family Office, a distinguished registered investment advisor catering to ultra-high-net-worth individuals and entities. Beyond its own nomination, Vocatus celebrates its clients' achievements as finalists in 19 categories, underscoring the firm's significant impact on the industry. Ray Hennessey, CEO of Vocatus, expressed gratitude towards the team, clients, and peers for this recognition, reflecting on the firm's growth and future prospects since its inception in 2022. Vocatus' recent accolades include the Best Marketing or PR Campaign at the Family Wealth Awards, further cementing its reputation in the financial services arena. The Wealth Management Industry Awards, now in its 11th year, stands as a unique platform acknowledging contributions that enhance financial advisors' success, with winners to be unveiled at a New York City gala on September 4th. David Armstrong of WealthManagement.com praised the awards for spotlighting innovators shaping the financial services' future.

item.title: Blink Charging Co. Appoints Michael Bercovich as New CFO to Drive Strategic Growth
item.description:
Blink Charging Co., a global leader in electric vehicle (EV) charging equipment and services, has announced the appointment of Michael Bercovich as its new Chief Financial Officer (CFO). Bercovich, with over 20 years of experience in global finance and accounting, is set to join Blink on June 23rd. His extensive background includes roles at Helios Global Payments Solutions, MyOutDesk, Cialfo, and Elements Global Services, where he led various financial operations and strategic initiatives, raising over $250M in capital. Blink's CEO, Mike Battaglia, highlighted Bercovich's operational leadership and his potential to drive the company towards profitability and global expansion.

The transition comes as Michael Rama, the previous CFO, departs to pursue new opportunities. Robert Strauss from FTI Consulting will serve as Interim CFO until Bercovich's official start. Bercovich expressed enthusiasm about joining Blink during a pivotal growth phase, focusing on introducing new EV charging and energy management solutions to enhance revenue and market impact. Blink Charging continues to innovate in the EV sector, offering a range of products and services through strategic partnerships across various industries.

item.title: Callan Family Office Recognized as Finalist in Multiple Categories for 2025 WealthManagement.com Industry Awards
item.description: Callan Family Office, a distinguished registered investment advisor catering to ultra-high-net-worth individuals and entities, has been recognized as a finalist in four prestigious categories for the 2025 WealthManagement.com Industry Awards. The firm's innovative Tax Overlay program has earned it spots in the Family Office and RIA Client Initiative categories, while its leaders, Jack Ginter and Dan Burke, are finalists for CEO and CTO of the Year, respectively. This accolade underscores the firm's commitment to excellence and innovation in serving the unique needs of its clientele. The awards, now in their 11th year, celebrate the achievements of those who significantly contribute to the success of financial advisors. Winners will be unveiled at a grand ceremony in New York City on September 4th. Callan Family Office's recognition is a testament to its dedication to providing top-tier investment management and financial planning services. For more details, visit their company website.

item.title: Brian Davey Appointed President of Build Group's Signature Interiors Division
item.description:
Build Group, a leading privately held general contractor, has announced the appointment of Brian Davey as President of its Signature Interiors division, focusing on high-end tenant improvement projects. With over 20 years at Build Group, Davey's expertise in operational depth and preconstruction is expected to drive the division's growth, emphasizing premium interior spaces for luxury retail, boutique hospitality, and more. The division, known for its transformative work on projects like Miller & Lux and the InterContinental Hotel, aims to set new standards in high-end interiors under Davey's leadership.

Scott Brauninger, CEO of Build Group, highlighted Davey's client-first mindset as pivotal for the division's national expansion strategy. Signature Interiors is celebrated for its craftsmanship and ability to deliver spaces that reflect clients' brands and values, as noted by Alexa Nafisi-Movaghar of Adean Studios. This move underscores Build Group's commitment to excellence and innovation in construction and design, promising to redefine how spaces are built and experienced across the country.

item.title: Cove Secures Strategic Growth Investment to Revolutionize Commercial Real Estate Management
item.description:
Washington, D.C.-based Cove, a developer of commercial property management software, has secured a new investment from Lead Edge Capital, a New York-based growth equity firm. This investment, the amount of which remains undisclosed, marks a significant milestone for Cove, which has previously attracted backing from industry giants like Nuveen Real Estate and Blackstone. Cove's innovative "all-in-one" software platform is designed to streamline operations across the commercial real estate (CRE) sector, offering a unified solution that enhances efficiency, reduces costs, and improves tenant experiences. The platform is utilized by a diverse range of properties, from office buildings to medical offices, highlighting its versatility and broad appeal.

Nimay Mehta, managing partner at Lead Edge, praised Cove for its rapid growth and its ability to simplify complex property operations, emphasizing the firm's excitement to support Cove's continued momentum. Cove's CEO, Adam Segal, highlighted the company's commitment to expanding its product offerings to further simplify real estate management, with a focus on empowering owners and operators. Cove's success is also attributed to its strong client base, including notable properties like Chicago's Willis Tower, and its high retention rates amidst the evolving challenges of the CRE industry. Lead Edge's investment in Cove adds to its impressive portfolio, which includes stakes in major companies like Alibaba Group and Asana, underscoring the potential it sees in Cove's innovative approach to CRE software solutions.

item.title: Rocketgraph Strengthens Leadership with Appointment of Walt Maguire as Vice President of Product
item.description:
Rocketgraph, a leader in the no-code graph analytics platform sector, has announced the appointment of Walt Maguire as its new Vice President of Product. Maguire, a seasoned expert in data technology and customer-focused product development, brings decades of experience from leading companies like AWS, HPE, Vertica, and Oracle. His role will focus on evolving the Rocketgraph platform to unlock the full potential of graph analytics for businesses. The announcement highlights Maguire's innovative contributions to the tech industry, including significant advancements in cloud computing and database migration services.

The CEO of Rocketgraph, Brock Alston, praised Maguire's visionary innovation and customer-centric approach, emphasizing his ability to drive the company's product leadership forward. Maguire expressed his enthusiasm for mainstreaming graph analytics, making it more accessible for analysts to uncover insights. Rocketgraph's platform, known for its high-performance computing capabilities, is set to benefit from Maguire's leadership, further enhancing its offerings like the xGT server and Mission Control with GenAI capabilities. The company invites interested parties to learn more about Maguire through his blog post and to experience Rocketgraph's innovative solutions through a 30 Day Free Trial or demo.

item.title: InRule Technology Strengthens AI Leadership with Appointment of Jeff Prosise as Chief Artificial Intelligence Officer
item.description:
InRule Technology®, a leader in AI decisioning, machine learning, and process automation, has announced the appointment of Jeff Prosise as its Chief Artificial Intelligence Officer (CAIO). Prosise, a renowned engineer and AI evangelist, will spearhead the company's AI strategy, focusing on integrating artificial intelligence into its product vision and development practices. With a background that includes co-founding Wintellect and authoring significant works like Applied Machine Learning and AI for Engineers (O’Reilly Media), Prosise is set to enhance InRule's AI capabilities and represent the company as a thought leader in the AI space.

This strategic move underscores InRule's commitment to leveraging AI for delivering scalable, explainable, and ethically grounded solutions to its customers. CEO Charles Snellgrove highlighted Prosise's role in advancing the company's mission to achieve better outcomes through AI innovation. Prosise himself expressed enthusiasm for joining InRule, a company that prioritizes meaningful customer outcomes and the responsible use of AI.

item.title: Vestian Strengthens Retail Advisory Services with Jason Wuchiski as National Lead
item.description:
Global real estate advisory firm Vestian has announced the appointment of Jason Wuchiski as the National Lead for its Retail Group, marking a significant step in the company's expansion of its retail services across the United States. Wuchiski, who previously served as the Northeast Retail Lead, brings over two decades of experience in the retail real estate sector, having represented more than 50 national and regional retailers and restaurants. His expertise in strategic expansion and leasing of retail portfolios is expected to drive Vestian's national retail strategy forward.

Michael Silver, Chairman of Vestian, highlighted Wuchiski's leadership and industry knowledge as key factors in his appointment, emphasizing the value he brings to the firm's retail services. Wuchiski expressed his honor in taking on the role and his eagerness to work with the team to deliver innovative solutions in the evolving retail landscape. Based in Vestian's Northeast office, Wuchiski will oversee the firm's retail service offerings nationwide, aiming to optimize clients' real estate strategies. For more details on Vestian's retail services, visit www.vestian.com.

item.title: Car Garage Expert Sets New Standards in Dubai's Vehicle Repair Industry
item.description:
Car Garage Expert, a leading vehicle repair shop in Dubai, has announced its wide array of car repair and maintenance services, catering to the varied needs of car owners in the city. With a strong reputation for quality and customer satisfaction, the company has established itself as a trusted name in the Repair Dubai industry. Offering everything from routine maintenance to major repairs, Car Garage Expert employs the latest tools and techniques to ensure vehicles are returned to their best condition. The company prides itself on reliability, safety, transparent pricing, and timely service, making it a go-to for drivers in Dubai.

Mian Muhammad Fahad Malik, CEO of Car Garage Expert, emphasizes the company's commitment to exceeding the high standards demanded by Dubai's roads through exceptional Repair Dubai services that blend quality workmanship with outstanding customer care. As a trusted car repair Dubai provider, Car Garage Expert continues to lead the sector with its focus on quality, transparency, and customer satisfaction.

item.title: Car Garage Expert Revolutionizes Affordable Auto Care in Dubai
item.description:
Car Garage Expert is transforming the automotive service landscape in Dubai by providing affordable, transparent, and professional auto care. With the increasing number of car owners in the UAE seeking reliable yet cost-effective service options, Car Garage Expert meets this need with its advanced diagnostics, certified mechanics, and competitive pricing. The company's CEO, Mian Muhammad Fahad Malik, emphasizes their commitment to making high-quality vehicle maintenance accessible to all Dubai residents. Car Garage Expert stands out as a trusted car service station near me, offering a comprehensive range of auto repair and maintenance services aimed at elevating the standard of vehicle care in the city.

For more details, visit their website or check out the original news on NewsDirect.

item.title: C3 Industries Strengthens Retail Strategy with Key Appointment and Acquisition
item.description:
C3 Industries, a prominent multi-state cannabis company, has announced two significant strategic moves: the appointment of Krista Raymer as Chief Strategy Officer and the acquisition of Vetrina, a leading cannabis retail consulting firm. Krista Raymer, a seasoned strategic leader and the founder of Vetrina, brings a wealth of experience in consulting for over 270 cannabis retailers across the U.S., specializing in data-driven business transformation and market expansion. This acquisition and appointment underscore C3 Industries' commitment to enhancing its operational excellence and profitability through data-driven insights across its High Profile retail network.

Ankur Rungta, CEO and cofounder of C3 Industries, highlighted the strategic importance of these moves, emphasizing the exclusive access to proven retail consulting expertise that will optimize every aspect of their operations. The company's expanded leadership team is set to oversee its growing retail network, including locations in several states and upcoming openings in Kentucky. Valay Shah, CFO of C3 Industries, pointed out that this investment not only strengthens current operations but also positions the company as an attractive partner for future mergers and acquisitions, anticipating a period of heightened deal activity in the industry.

item.title: Jeff Huntington Promoted to Vice President of Engineering at TransLogic, Signaling a New Era in Healthcare Automation
item.description:
TransLogic, a Swisslog Healthcare company renowned for its transport automation solutions, has announced the promotion of Jeff Huntington to Vice President of Engineering for North America. Huntington, who has been instrumental in advancing the company's technology and security standards, will now oversee Software Development, Mechatronics, and the System Design & Sustaining Engineering Support teams. His leadership has already led to significant achievements, including the launch of TransLogic’s latest Version 8 software platform and enhancements in system performance and reliability. Huntington's new role is expected to further elevate the company's products and teams, driving innovation and excellence in transport automation solutions. Learn more about TransLogic's innovative solutions at translogic.com.

Swisslog Healthcare, the parent company of TransLogic, is a global leader in providing integrated medication supply chain solutions to healthcare facilities. The company's focus on minimizing operational waste and enhancing productivity aims to improve patient care. For further details on Swisslog Healthcare's services, visit www.swisslog-healthcare.com.

item.title: Digimarc Elevates Carle Quinn to Chief Operating Officer to Drive Operational Excellence
item.description:
Digimarc Corporation, a pioneer in digital watermarking, has announced the promotion of Carle Quinn to Chief Operating Officer (COO), marking a significant step in the company's business transformation and operational scaling efforts. Quinn, who joined Digimarc as Chief People Officer in April 2024, has been pivotal in aligning strategy with execution and fostering cross-functional collaboration. With a rich background in executive leadership, including roles at Citrix and SAP SuccessFactors, Quinn's expertise in go-to-market strategy and customer value is expected to drive Digimarc's scalable and sustainable growth. CEO Riley McCormack highlighted Quinn's strategic mindset and operational discipline as key to the company's future success.

Digimarc's leadership in digital watermarking technologies has been instrumental in various sectors, including anti-counterfeiting measures for global currency, earning it spots on the Fortune 2023 Change the World list and recognition as a 2023 Fast Company World Changing Ideas finalist. The company's commitment to innovation and operational excellence under Quinn's leadership is poised to enhance its market position and shareholder value.

item.title: Peter Hong Appointed as Assistant Vice President at Preferred Employers Insurance to Drive Growth in Workers Compensation Sector
item.description:
Preferred Employers Insurance, a Berkley company, has announced the appointment of Peter Hong as the new Assistant Vice President of Programs & Distribution Operations. With over two decades of experience in managing distribution teams and overseeing broker territories, Hong is set to lead the development and execution of Preferred's distribution strategy for Programs. His role will involve close collaboration with underwriting, marketing, and broker partners to foster sustainable, profitable growth. This strategic move is aimed at enhancing the company's programs, customizing customer experiences, and expanding its footprint across California.

Peter Hong's extensive background in personal lines, small commercial, middle market, and national accounts, coupled with his educational credentials from Georgia Tech and the University of Wisconsin-Madison, positions him as a key player in Preferred Employers Insurance's mission to provide the gold standard of care for injured workers in California. The company, a specialty provider of workers compensation insurance, continues to strengthen its leadership team to better serve California employers and maintain its reputation as a preferred workers compensation solution.

item.title: Encore Dental Studio Revolutionizes Patient Care with Comprehensive Dental Services in Winston-Salem
item.description: Encore Dental Studio, a premier dental clinic in Winston-Salem, NC, is making waves with its comprehensive, patient-centered approach to dental care. Spearheaded by the skilled duo of Dr. Lamarr Holland and Dr. Tsua Lor, the clinic offers a wide range of dental services from routine cleanings to advanced cosmetic and restorative treatments. Their commitment to combining state-of-the-art technology with a compassionate, stress-free environment sets them apart. With specialties in cosmetic dentistry, emergency dentistry, family dentistry, restorative dentistry, and sedation dentistry, Encore Dental Studio ensures personalized care for every patient's unique needs. Dr. Holland's background in chemistry and dentistry, along with his fluency in Spanish, and Dr. Lor's Invisalign certification and active involvement in the dental community, underscore their dedication to excellence. From veneers and teeth whitening to dental implants and TMJ treatment, the clinic is equipped to handle all dental needs, including sedation options for anxious patients. Their modern conveniences like same-day crowns and emergency appointments further cement their status as a trusted oral health partner in the Winston-Salem community.

item.title: Fast Guard Service Rises to Meet Surging Demand for Security Amid Natural Disasters and Seasonal Peaks
item.description:
As June 2025 approaches, bringing with it Flag Day, Father's Day, and Juneteenth, the demand for reliable security services across the U.S. surges. Fast Guard Service, with over 1 million deployments, emerges as the go-to provider for fire watch, emergency response, and armed guard services. This need is particularly acute during high-risk periods when the reliability of security services can critically impact operations. Fast Guard Service has proven indispensable for property managers, construction firms, event organizers, and retail centers, especially in scenarios where traditional providers fail to deliver.

The increasing frequency of natural disasters and infrastructure challenges has spotlighted the importance of fire watch and emergency services. Fast Guard Service's rapid deployment was notably evident in St. Louis following a tornado, where they provided essential security and support. Their ability to mobilize trained professionals from outside affected areas is a game-changer, especially when local resources are overwhelmed. Beyond emergencies, Fast Guard Service ensures readiness for any scenario, from scheduled events to last-minute coverage, embodying reliability and rapid response.

item.title: Strategic Partnership Expands Energy Efficiency Services in New England
item.description:
In a significant move to expand its services in the Northeast, Crete United, a leader in energy efficiency and MEP services, has welcomed CAM H.V.A.C. & Construction into its partner network. This partnership not only marks Crete United's first foray into Rhode Island but also enhances its technical capabilities with CAM's nearly 50 years of expertise in mechanical services, including in-house sheet metal fabrication. Mike Cox, CEO of Crete United, highlighted the strategic importance of this collaboration in strengthening the company's ability to deliver integrated, high-performance solutions across the region.

CAM, known for its excellence in mechanical construction and a strong presence in Southern New England, views this partnership as an opportunity to extend its high standards and proven expertise to a broader network while maintaining its commitment to quality service and community impact. The alliance is expected to improve project delivery and expand Crete United's regional footprint, benefiting customers with more comprehensive and efficient building solutions. Griffin Financial Group played a pivotal role as the financial advisor to CAM in this partnership.

item.title: Rangeford Investment Embraces AI to Revolutionize Wealth Management
item.description:
Rangeford Investment, a Luxembourg-based investment advisory firm with operations in Hong Kong, has unveiled its artificial intelligence (AI) integration strategy, marking a pivotal step towards modernizing its financial planning and wealth management services. This strategy involves the adoption of advanced data analytics and machine learning tools to enhance decision-making in asset management and portfolio optimization. The firm has partnered with several AI technology companies to implement innovative applications in risk analysis, retirement planning, and real-time portfolio management, showcasing its commitment at the upcoming AI Asian Summit.

Michael Casagrande, COO of Rangeford Investment, emphasized the importance of AI in advancing the firm's operational infrastructure and delivering value to clients globally. To spearhead this digital transformation, Rangeford has bolstered its IT department with AI and data science experts, aiming to transition from traditional investment models to AI-powered systems. Eamonn Gallagher, Investment Strategist, highlighted the potential of AI to offer customized investment strategies and improve risk assessments, especially in dynamic markets. Initial implementations have already shown positive impacts on portfolio performance and service agility, reinforcing the firm's dedication to innovation.

item.title: Kenny Denton Promoted to Partner at Daversa, Signaling Strategic Focus on Tech Leadership Talent
item.description: Daversa, technology's premier executive search firm, has announced the promotion of Kenny Denton to Partner, recognizing his exceptional contributions in identifying and recruiting top-tier talent for early-stage and high-growth tech companies. Denton, known for his strategic acumen in building senior leadership teams, has played a pivotal role in scaling companies like OpenAI, Doppel, and Brex. His expertise in sales, marketing, and customer success has made him a key asset for Daversa, as highlighted by CEO Paul Daversa. The firm, with a global presence across two continents, prides itself on its ability to connect entrepreneurs and executives, ensuring the right talent is in place to drive material impact. For more details, visit daversapartners.com.

item.title: Ocean Power Technologies Strengthens Leadership with Appointment of Jason Weed as SVP of Commercial Sales
item.description:
Ocean Power Technologies, Inc. (OPTT), a pioneer in low-carbon and AI-driven maritime services, has announced the appointment of Jason Weed as Senior Vice President – Commercial Sales. Weed, a retired U.S. Navy Captain with a rich background in maritime and technology leadership, including roles at Leidos’ Maritime Systems Division and as Commodore of the Navy’s first Uncrewed Undersea Vehicle Squadron, brings over 15 years of executive experience to OPT. His expertise in AI/ML technologies and strategic planning is expected to bolster OPT's expansion in the defense and security market. Philipp Stratmann, OPT's President and CEO, highlighted Weed's defense leadership and maritime operations knowledge as key to accelerating the company's strategic goals in this sector. The appointment follows the departure of Matt Burdyny, with Weed receiving a significant inducement award as part of his hiring package.

OPT specializes in providing intelligent maritime solutions for safer, cleaner, and more productive ocean operations across various markets, including defense, oil and gas, and offshore wind. Their offerings include the PowerBuoy® platforms for remote maritime applications and WAM-V® autonomous surface vessels. Headquartered in Monroe Township, New Jersey, OPT continues to innovate in the maritime domain, with Weed's appointment signaling a strengthened focus on defense and security advancements.

item.title: Woodbridge Pacific Group Expands Luxury Housing Options in Boise Metropolitan Area
item.description: Woodbridge Pacific Group (WPG) Idaho is making waves in Boise's metropolitan area with its premium homes and neighborhoods, catering to a growing demand for quality living spaces. Jim Perry, Vice President and Managing Director of WPG Idaho, emphasizes the company's commitment to quality and design, which has attracted a diverse range of buyers, including Idaho residents and those from other regions. WPG Idaho's offerings include Sagewater in Nampa, known for its unique home designs and convenient location, and several luxury communities in Eagle such as Stags Crossing, Kingswood Estates, and Bald Eagle Point, each offering distinct amenities and settings. Haven in Star adds to the portfolio with its high-end homes and access to local amenities. WPG's approach combines leisure and convenience, with properties near recreational areas and essential services, underscored by responsive customer service and financial incentives like reduced interest rates through preferred lender Jeff Weirsma. Prospective buyers can explore options via https://woodbridgeidaho.com, featuring virtual tours and interactive tools for a comprehensive viewing experience.

item.title: Adageis Revolutionizes Healthcare with AI-Driven ProActive Care Platform
item.description:
Adageis, a pioneering healthcare technology company, is revolutionizing the shift towards value-based care with its AI-powered ProActive Care Platform. This innovative solution is designed to help healthcare providers, systems, ACOs, and CINs identify and act on high-value opportunities within their operations, ensuring quality care while optimizing efficiency. The platform's standout feature is its user-friendly interface, offering clear, actionable insights to enhance patient outcomes and operational performance. For more details on Adageis's groundbreaking technology, visit their website.

The announcement was highlighted by AINewsWire, a leading communications platform specializing in AI advancements, showcasing Adageis's role in driving innovation in healthcare technology. AINewsWire, part of the Dynamic Brand Portfolio at IBN, provides comprehensive coverage and distribution services to amplify the reach of such transformative news. Discover more about Adageis's contributions to healthcare technology and the full article at https://ibn.fm/tXVnj.

item.title: FAVO Capital Inc. Revolutionizes SMB Financing with AI-Driven Lending Solutions
item.description:
FAVO Capital Inc. (OTC: FAVO), a Fort Lauderdale-based private credit company, is making waves in the financial sector by offering fast, efficient, and personalized funding solutions to small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs). With over $138 million in total funding supporting more than 10,000 businesses, FAVO Capital leverages AI-powered analytics to streamline the funding process, ensuring quicker and smarter decisions. The company's commitment to transparency and investor confidence is underscored by its public listing and regulatory compliance. Operating in 45 states and the Dominican Republic, FAVO Capital's innovative fintech solutions enable funding to be delivered within hours, showcasing its strategic expertise and flexibility. For more insights, visit https://ibn.fm/fYIgh.

InvestorWire, a specialized communications platform, highlights FAVO Capital's achievements and its role within the Dynamic Brand Portfolio of IBN, emphasizing the company's broad reach and tailored corporate communications solutions. This partnership underscores the importance of advanced wire-grade press release syndication and social media distribution in today's competitive market. Discover more about FAVO Capital and its innovative approach to alternative finance at www.FavoCapital.com.

item.title: Rothschild & Co Strengthens North American Advisory Team with Strategic Hire
item.description:
Rothschild & Co, a leading global financial services firm, has announced the appointment of Ralph Lerman as a Managing Director in its North American Global Advisory business, specifically within the Business Services team. Based in New York, Lerman brings nearly two decades of investment banking experience, with a strong focus on M&A transactions in the business services sector. His previous role as Executive Director at Moelis & Company saw him leading deals in professional services, human capital management, and tech-enabled verticals. This move is part of Rothschild & Co's strategy to expand its U.S. Business Services practice, offering top-tier advisory services to both corporate and sponsor-backed clients. Jonathan Kaye, Global Co-Head of Business Services, praised Lerman's deep industry knowledge and client relationships, highlighting his potential to bolster the firm's presence in key North American markets. Lerman expressed enthusiasm about joining Rothschild & Co, citing the firm's global reputation for independent, high-impact advice and its current momentum in the business services sector.

Rothschild & Co's Global Advisory division is renowned for its strategic M&A and financing solutions, serving a diverse clientele including corporations, private equity firms, and governments. With a vast network of specialists across 47 countries, the firm offers unparalleled market intelligence and advisory services. This appointment underscores Rothschild & Co's commitment to strengthening its advisory capabilities and expanding its footprint in the competitive business services landscape.

item.title: Blue Water Autonomy Strengthens Leadership with Appointment of Naval Shipbuilding Veteran Tim Glinatsis as COO
item.description:
Blue Water Autonomy, Inc., a pioneering technology company focused on developing autonomous ships for the U.S. Navy, has announced the appointment of Tim Glinatsis as its new Chief Operating Officer (COO). With a rich background in naval shipbuilding and operational transformation, Glinatsis's expertise is expected to propel the company towards scaling its operations and delivering groundbreaking autonomous maritime solutions. His previous roles at General Dynamics, including Vice President of Engineering and Chief Information Officer, highlight his capability to manage complex naval programs and drive operational excellence.

Glinatsis's appointment is a strategic move by Blue Water Autonomy to enhance its operational strategy and program execution, aiming for sustainable growth and the rapid deployment of autonomous ships. The company's innovative approach integrates hardware, software, and AI to enable unmanned vessels to operate on the open ocean for extended periods. This development marks a significant step forward in maritime technology, with potential implications for naval operations and commercial shipping. For more details on Blue Water Autonomy's mission and technology, visit www.blw.ai.

item.title: Merchant Appoints Rich Policastro as Managing Director to Strengthen Financial Services Ecosystem
item.description:
Merchant, a global operating company specializing in providing growth capital and strategic resources to independent financial services firms, has announced the appointment of Rich Policastro as Managing Director. With over 30 years of experience in the financial services industry, including senior roles at Schwab Advisor Services and Fidelity Institutional, Policastro is set to enhance Merchant's ecosystem of service partners. This move underscores Merchant's commitment to offering wealth management advisors access to top-tier resources and expertise. Merchant's ecosystem includes notable partners like AdvisorAssist, Republic Capital Group, Fin.Link, TAG Intel, Mosaic Advanced Planning, and Venning Advisors, covering a wide range of services from compliance to geopolitical analysis.

Tim Bello, Co-Founder and Managing Partner at Merchant, highlighted the importance of Policastro's appointment, emphasizing the value of his insight and execution mindset. Merchant's strategy focuses on supporting advisors not just with capital but with a comprehensive infrastructure to grow and protect their firms. The company's recent initiatives include launching outsourced CFO services and a cybersecurity solution, with plans to expand into trust services and enhanced valuation capabilities. Merchant's ecosystem now spans over 100 partner firms across six countries, managing more than $230 billion in assets.

item.title: Moutray McLaren Promoted to Executive Vice President, Public Policy at ICSC
item.description:
ICSC, the leading membership organization for the commercial real estate and retail industries, has announced the promotion of Moutray McLaren to Executive Vice President, Public Policy. McLaren, who previously served as Senior Vice President, Public Policy, steps into this pivotal role following the retirement of Betsy Laird. With a rich background in public policy, including roles as Chief of Staff to United States Rep. William Timmons and in the Office of the General Counsel at the Office of Management & Budget, McLaren is poised to lead ICSC's advocacy efforts. His expertise is expected to be instrumental in navigating the current political landscape, focusing on tax policy and other legislative priorities that impact the industry. Tom McGee, President and CEO of ICSC, praised McLaren's dedication and leadership, highlighting his contributions to the organization's advocacy strategy since 2022.

The transition marks a significant moment for ICSC as it continues to advocate for policies that support the growth and stability of the commercial real estate and retail sectors. McLaren's appointment comes at a time when the industry faces challenges such as tax reform and Organized Retail Crime. His deep relationships across Capitol Hill and his experience in public policy are seen as assets that will benefit ICSC members and the broader industry. For more information about ICSC and its initiatives, visit www.ICSC.com.

item.title: Nutriband Inc.'s AVERSA Technology: A Game-Changer in the Fight Against Drug Abuse
item.description:
Nutriband Inc. (NASDAQ: NTRB), a biotech company listed on the Nasdaq in 2021, has been making waves with its AVERSA abuse-deterrent patch technology, which is on its way to FDA approval and boasts a potential market value of up to $800 million annually. The company's stock has been performing well, trading above its IPO price and reaching an all-time high of $11.78 in January. Serguei Melnik, the Founder and President of Nutriband, recently shared insights on The Smart Money Circle Show, highlighting the company's innovative approach to preventing the misuse of transdermal patches, especially fentanyl, through its AVERSA technology. This breakthrough is part of Nutriband's broader mission to innovate within the biotech space while focusing on long-term shareholder value.

For those interested in learning more about Nutriband's journey and its groundbreaking technology, additional details can be found by visiting Read More>>. Investors can stay updated with the latest news on NTRB through the company's newsroom at https://ibn.fm/NTRB. item.description:
Aegis Capital, a seasoned financial services firm, has successfully closed a $1.25 million public offering for Cemtrex, Inc., a leader in advanced security technology and industrial services. The offering, which included 1,250,000 shares at $1.00 each, also granted Aegis an option to purchase additional shares to cover over-allotments. The proceeds are earmarked for general corporate purposes, marking a significant milestone for Cemtrex. This financial maneuver underscores the confidence in Cemtrex's market position and future growth prospects. For more details, the full press release can be viewed here.

item.title: Travis Jordan Appointed President of Merchant Focus to Drive Embedded Payments Innovation
item.description: Merchant Focus, a leader in secure, customized payment processing solutions, has announced the appointment of Travis Jordan as its new President. This move is aimed at bolstering the company's leadership team and accelerating growth in embedded payments, particularly for Independent Software Vendors (ISVs). Travis Jordan, with over a decade of experience in the payments industry, including significant roles at Merchant Focus, is set to drive innovation and expansion. His recent recognition as a 2025 ETA Forty Under 40 award recipient underscores his industry impact. CEO John Waldron highlighted Travis's client-first mindset and expertise as key to guiding the company's next growth phase. As President, Travis will focus on enhancing embedded payment capabilities, aiming to deliver seamless, integrated experiences for software platforms and their users. His vision includes leveraging technology to simplify payment workflows, enhance security, and offer scalable solutions across industries. Merchant Focus, with over 20 years of experience, provides a comprehensive suite of payment processing tools, emphasizing security and support. For more details, visit www.merchantfocus.com.

item.title: IDB Appoints Laura Alfaro as New Chief Economist to Drive Economic Innovation in Latin America and the Caribbean
item.description:
The Inter-American Development Bank has announced the appointment of Laura Alfaro as its new Chief Economist and Economic Counselor. This decision comes after a rigorous selection process, highlighting Alfaro's profound expertise in economic research and public policy, particularly in Latin America and the Caribbean. Her role is expected to bolster the IDB's Research Department, focusing on critical regional issues such as productivity, competitiveness, and inequality, aligning with the IDBImpact+ vision to integrate economic analysis more deeply into the Bank's operations and strategies.

Laura Alfaro, a distinguished economist with a rich background including a professorship at Harvard Business School and a tenure as Costa Rica's Minister of National Planning and Economic Policy, expressed her enthusiasm for the opportunity to contribute to the region's development. Her appointment is seen as a pivotal moment for the IDB, reinforcing its commitment to leveraging research and knowledge to address the pressing challenges facing Latin America and the Caribbean. Alfaro's dual citizenship and academic credentials underscore her unique position to bridge gaps and foster collaboration for sustainable development in the region.

item.title: Venable LLP Strengthens Litigation Division with Addition of Esteemed Attorney Samidh Guha
item.description:
Venable LLP, a prominent American Lawyer Global 100 law firm, has bolstered its Litigation Division with the addition of Samidh Guha as a partner in its New York office. Guha, a distinguished trial attorney with over 20 years of experience, specializes in white-collar criminal defense, internal investigations, and complex commercial litigation. His expertise is particularly valuable to clients in the financial services and technology sectors, where he navigates multi-agency investigations and regulatory matters with strategic insight and courtroom prowess. Edward Boyle and Kan Nawaday, co-chairs of Venable's Litigation Division and Investigations and White Collar Defense group respectively, have expressed their enthusiasm for Guha's arrival, highlighting his proven track record and the depth he adds to the firm's capabilities. Guha's academic credentials include a J.D. from the University of Pennsylvania Law School, an M.A. from Johns Hopkins University, and a B.A. from Amherst College.

This strategic hire underscores Venable LLP's commitment to providing top-tier legal services across a broad spectrum of business and regulatory law, complex litigation, and intellectual property disciplines. With over 900 professionals nationwide, Venable continues to strengthen its position as a leading law firm serving a diverse clientele globally. For more details, visit Venable LLP.

item.description:

item.title: Sustain SoCal to Host 12th Driving Mobility Event Focusing on Sustainable Transportation Innovations
item.description:
Sustain Southern California ("Sustain SoCal") is set to host its 12th edition of the Driving Mobility event on June 26 at the University of California, Irvine’s Beall Applied Innovation. This premier event will spotlight sustainable transportation solutions, featuring a professional program and an extensive clean vehicle expo. It aims to unite clean tech enthusiasts, investors, and entrepreneurs, offering a platform for networking, learning, and brand building. Topics such as legislation and incentives, vehicle-to-grid integration, autonomous vehicles, Mobility as a Service ("MAAS"), drone applications, and last-mile delivery efficiency will be explored by key industry players and leaders. item.title: FTI Consulting Strengthens Digital Transformation Expertise with New Senior Managing Director
item.description:
FTI Consulting, Inc., a global expert firm specializing in crisis and transformation, has announced the appointment of Mark White as a Senior Managing Director in its Construction, Projects & Assets practice. Based in Houston, White brings over two decades of experience in guiding clients through digital transformations to enhance enterprise value across the asset lifecycle. His role will focus on assisting engineering and construction clients in planning and executing digital transformations, including the adoption of software tools and technologies.

Garrett Fultz, Global Leader of the Construction, Projects & Assets practice at FTI Consulting, praised White's client collaboration skills and his ability to drive transformative change. White's previous roles include Senior Vice President positions at Hexagon Asset Lifecycle Intelligence and Faithful+Gould, where he led product strategy and IT consulting, respectively. White expressed enthusiasm about joining FTI Consulting, highlighting the opportunity to simplify the technology landscape for clients and reduce risk in their digital transformation efforts.

FTI Consulting, with over 8,100 employees across 33 countries, reported revenues of $3.70 billion in fiscal year 2024. The firm's expertise in navigating complex challenges makes White's appointment a strategic addition to its team of digital transformation and AI experts.

item.title: Das GreenHaus Strengthens Leadership Team to Boost Entrepreneurial Growth in Kendall County
item.description:
Das GreenHaus, a Boerne, Texas-based 501(c)(3) public-private non-profit, has announced Samantha Morganroth as its new Program Manager, a role she officially assumed in May 2025. Morganroth, a Trinity University graduate with both a Bachelor and Master of Arts, has been pivotal in developing the organization's programs since joining in 2024. Board Member Amy Story praised Morganroth's operational skills and dedication to fostering entrepreneurship in Kendall County. Additionally, Melody Mabry Touchon has joined the team, bringing her entrepreneurial and nonprofit expertise to support daily operations, marketing, and member engagement.

Das GreenHaus, launched through a collaboration between the Boerne Kendall County Economic Development Corporation and the Boerne Kendall County Angel Network, alongside the City of Boerne and Kendall County, aims to support startups with space, services, and education. The 4,800 square-foot facility offers private offices, flexible workspaces, and conference rooms, alongside business mentorship and networking events, to stimulate economic growth in the area.

item.title: Plantista's Vertical SaaS Platform Revolutionizes the Green Industry with Silicon Valley Innovation
item.description: Ashley Wright, CEO and co-founder of Plantista, is revolutionizing the green industry with a vertical SaaS platform designed to empower independent garden centers, nurseries, and landscape designers. With a background that spans McKinsey, General Mills, and startups, Wright combines her deep industry roots with Silicon Valley innovation to address the digitization gap in the green industry. Plantista leverages AI to scale the expertise of green industry professionals, offering tools like custom landscape design and plant care reminders via text message. The platform aims to modernize the industry without disrupting its core values, focusing on enhancing the customer experience and operational efficiency. Wright's strategy includes raising capital from industry insiders to ensure the product meets the specific needs of its primary customer base. Early feedback from multigenerational garden centers highlights Plantista's potential to scale expertise and streamline operations. Looking ahead, Plantista plans to expand its AI capabilities and support ecommerce, aiming to become the leading vertical SaaS player in the green industry.

item.title: Reservoir Farms Initiative Launches in Salinas to Pioneer AgTech Innovation
item.description:
The Reservoir, a California-based nonprofit, has partnered with Tanimura & Antle, a leading family-owned produce grower, to establish Reservoir Farms, a nonprofit on-farm startup incubator on 40 acres of farmland in Salinas, California. This collaboration aims to create a world-class hub for scalable, farmer-driven technology solutions in agriculture. Located near Silicon Valley, the site is ideal for developing next-generation agtech solutions, offering startups a real-world proving ground for innovations in robotics, automation, and sustainable practices. The initiative, developed with Western Growers, seeks to bridge the gap between promising prototypes and their real-world deployment, addressing challenges like labor shortages and environmental sustainability.

Reservoir Farms will dedicate 10 acres for test plots, focusing on strawberries, leafy greens, and vegetables, with plans to support over 50 new companies and create 500 jobs in the Salinas Valley. The project underscores the region's leadership in agricultural innovation, aiming to improve food security, environmental stewardship, and rural economic development. The groundbreaking is scheduled for late summer 2025, marking a significant step forward in agtech innovation.

item.title: LaFleur Minerals Inc. Advances Swanson Gold Project with Major Drill Program and Strategic Leadership
item.description:
LaFleur Minerals Inc. (CSE: LFLR) (OTCQB: LFLRF) (FSE: 3WK0) has announced an ambitious 5,000-meter diamond drill program at its Swanson Gold Project in Québec's Abitibi Gold Belt, aiming to capitalize on promising exploration results. The project, supported by over 50 identified drill targets from geophysical surveys and high-grade grab samples, marks a significant step towards restarting its 100%-owned Beacon Gold Mill by early 2026. The company has also welcomed Peter Espig, a seasoned mining executive, as a Strategic Advisor to bolster project funding and expansion efforts. With advanced discussions with institutional and private equity groups underway, LaFleur is poised to finance the Beacon restart, estimated at C$5–6 million, targeting near-term cash flow through bulk sampling and toll milling.

LaFleur Minerals is dedicated to developing district-scale gold projects in the Abitibi Gold Belt, with the Swanson Gold Project and the Beacon Gold Mill at the forefront of its mission. The Swanson Gold Project, encompassing 16,600 hectares, is rich in gold and critical metals, benefiting from strategic land consolidation and accessibility. The Beacon Gold Mill, capable of processing over 750 tonnes per day, is set to play a pivotal role in processing mineralized material from Swanson and offering custom milling services to nearby projects. For more details, visit LaFleur Minerals' website.

item.title: Beeline Holdings Introduces Blockchain-Based Equity Solution for Homeowners
item.description:
Beeline Holdings (NASDAQ: BLNE) has unveiled a groundbreaking product that allows homeowners with significant equity to access cash without the need for traditional loans, interest rates, or monthly payments. This innovative solution is made possible through a partnership with RealCo, which will issue stablecoins backed by fractional deeds, offering an alternative to conventional refinancing and home equity lines of credit (HELOCs). By acquiring minority stakes in luxury properties, this blockchain-based approach not only provides homeowners with a new avenue for liquidity but also positions Beeline to achieve operational profitability by the fourth quarter of 2025. This initiative represents an expansion of Beeline's fintech-driven mortgage ecosystem, reinforcing its commitment to revolutionizing property financing. For more details, the full press release can be accessed here.

Beeline Financial Holdings, Inc., a subsidiary of Beeline Holdings, is at the forefront of mortgage fintech, offering a fully digital, AI-powered platform that simplifies and accelerates the home loan process for both primary residences and investment properties. Based in Providence, Rhode Island, the company is dedicated to making mortgage origination faster, simpler, and more transparent. Additionally, Beeline Labs, the company's innovation arm, is focused on developing next-generation lending solutions. Investors interested in the latest updates on BLNE can find more information in the company's newsroom at https://ibn.fm/BLNE.

item.title: Beeline Holdings, Inc. Introduces Innovative Home Equity Access Product Using Stablecoins
item.description:
Beeline Holdings (NASDAQ: BLNE) is revolutionizing home equity access with its innovative product that allows homeowners to tap into their equity without incurring debt or monthly payments. This groundbreaking offering, set for a beta launch in June with a full rollout in July, utilizes RealCo-issued stablecoins backed by fractional property ownership. RealCo, partially owned by Beeline's CEO, will acquire up to 49% equity in homes valued at $1 million or more, providing homeowners with cash or stablecoins at closing, repayable only upon the sale of the property. Beeline will manage origination and title services, while RealCo issues blockchain-recorded property shares. This initiative underscores Beeline's commitment to transforming property financing through technology and innovation.

For more details, visit the full press release. Beeline Financial Holdings, Inc., a subsidiary of Beeline Holdings, is at the forefront of mortgage fintech, offering a digital, AI-powered platform for faster and smarter home loans. Headquartered in Providence, Rhode Island, Beeline is redefining mortgage origination with its focus on speed, simplicity, and transparency. The company also operates Beeline Labs, dedicated to developing next-generation lending solutions.

item.title: Beeline Holdings Introduces Blockchain-Based Equity Conversion for Homeowners
item.description:
Beeline Holdings (NASDAQ: BLNE) is revolutionizing the mortgage industry by introducing an equity conversion product that leverages blockchain technology and stablecoins. In collaboration with RealCo, which is set to acquire up to a 49% stake in high-value properties, this innovative program enables homeowners to access immediate funds by selling a portion of their equity, bypassing traditional loans and interest payments. RealCo will issue stablecoins representing fractional ownership of the property, offering recipients the choice between cash or digital tokens. This strategic move by Beeline aims to cater to the growing demand from non-traditional borrowers and is expected to generate steady, interest-rate-independent revenue starting in the fourth quarter of 2025. For more details, the full press release can be accessed here.

Beeline Financial Holdings, Inc., a subsidiary of Beeline Holdings, is at the forefront of mortgage fintech, offering a digital, AI-powered platform that simplifies and accelerates the home loan process for both primary residences and investment properties. Based in Providence, Rhode Island, Beeline is committed to innovation, transparency, and efficiency in mortgage origination. Additionally, Beeline Labs, the company's innovation arm, is dedicated to developing cutting-edge lending solutions. Investors interested in Beeline Holdings can find the latest news and updates at https://ibn.fm/BLNE.

item.title: Datavault AI and GFT Rewards Partner to Revolutionize Consumer Engagement with ADIO(R) Technology
item.description:
Datavault AI Inc. (NASDAQ: DVLT) has entered into a strategic licensing agreement with GFT Rewards, a pioneer in Web3 promotions, to utilize its ADIO(R) inaudible-tone technology. This collaboration aims to revolutionize the delivery and redemption of mobile rewards in high-traffic venues such as airports, retail stores, and entertainment hubs. By embedding encrypted audio signals in digital content, brands can now offer personalized, tokenized, or cash-based rewards directly to consumers' mobile devices, enhancing the shopping experience. Datavault AI stands to benefit financially from each redemption processed through GFT's platform, positioning the company as a key player in the burgeoning $1.6 trillion mobile coupon market by 2030. For more details, visit https://ibn.fm/fWJWW.

Datavault AI is at the forefront of AI-driven asset valuation and monetization in the Web 3.0 space, offering innovative solutions through its Acoustic and Data Science Divisions. Its technologies, including WiSA(R), ADIO(R), and Sumerian(R), are setting new standards in wireless sound transmission and data monetization. The company's cloud-based platform serves a wide range of industries, from sports and entertainment to healthcare and fintech, by enabling digital twins and secure metadata attachment. Discover more about Datavault AI's groundbreaking work at www.datavaultsite.com.

item.title: Brera Holdings Celebrates SS Juve Stabia's Success and Stadium Upgrade Investment
item.description:
Brera Holdings (NASDAQ: BREA), a global sports club owner, recently celebrated the achievements of its portfolio club SS Juve Stabia Srl, which secured a fifth-place finish in the regular season and made a semifinal run in the Serie A promotion playoffs. The city of Castellammare di Stabia honored the team's players, staff, and leadership with a celebratory ceremony. Brera Holdings also highlighted a €5 million subsidy from the regional government aimed at upgrading the team's Romeo Menti Stadium. Dan McClory, Brera's Executive Chairman, expressed pride in supporting the team, referred to as "the pride of Castellammare di Stabia." This event underscores Brera Holdings' commitment to expanding its social impact through football by developing a global portfolio of emerging sports clubs, offering opportunities for tournament prizes, sponsorships, and capital appreciation.

For more details, the full press release can be viewed at https://ibn.fm/l5ikr. Brera Holdings PLC focuses on leveraging its multi-club strategy to enhance its presence in the football and sports industry, as detailed on their website www.BreraHoldings.com. InvestorWire, a specialized communications platform, played a key role in disseminating this news, showcasing its ability to provide advanced wire-grade press release syndication and comprehensive corporate communications solutions.

item.title: Fusion Fuel Green PLC Proposes Reverse Share Split to Ensure Nasdaq Compliance
item.description:
Fusion Fuel Green PLC (Nasdaq: HTOO), a leader in the energy services sector, is set to hold its Annual General Meeting on June 25, 2025, in Dublin. Shareholders will vote on six proposals, including a significant reverse share split of Class A Ordinary Shares, aiming to comply with Nasdaq's minimum bid price requirement. CEO John-Paul Backwell highlights this as a step towards long-term sustainability, leveraging growth momentum and strategic acquisitions. Fusion Fuel Green, through its subsidiaries Al Shola Gas and BrightHy, offers innovative energy engineering and advisory solutions, focusing on decarbonization in hard-to-abate industries. For more details, visit the full press release.

InvestorWire, a specialized communications platform, plays a pivotal role in disseminating such news, offering advanced wire-grade press release syndication and a suite of corporate communications solutions. item.title: J.S. Held Strengthens IP Leadership with Appointment of James E. Malackowski as Chief Intellectual Property Officer
item.description:
Global consulting firm J.S. Held has made a groundbreaking move by appointing James E. Malackowski as the first Chief Intellectual Property Officer (CIPO) of a global consulting company. This strategic appointment underscores the growing importance of intellectual property (IP) in today's knowledge-based economy. Lee Spirer, J.S. Held's CEO, highlights the CIPO's role in both strategic and operational capacities, benefiting both the company and its clients.

J.S. Held is at the forefront of protecting and managing intangible assets, with a robust portfolio that includes patents, trademarks, and proprietary technologies. The appointment of Malackowski is set to enhance the company's ability to develop and deploy new methodologies while safeguarding its innovations. Furthermore, J.S. Held's comprehensive global intellectual property consulting group, Ocean Tomo, leverages decades of experience to provide unmatched IP value and risk assessment services. This move not only strengthens J.S. Held's position in the market but also offers significant benefits to its clients across various industries.

item.title: Sekur Private Data Ltd. Launches Government and Diplomatic Corps Division to Combat Cyber Threats
item.description:
Sekur Private Data Ltd., a leading cybersecurity and internet privacy provider, has announced the launch of a new Government and Diplomatic Corps division in Washington, D.C. This strategic move comes in response to the increasing number of cyberattacks targeting government officials and diplomats amidst rising geopolitical tensions. The company's Swiss-hosted encrypted communications suite, which includes secure email, messaging, and VPN services, is specifically designed to protect high-value targets from sophisticated threats such as phishing, AI hacks, and chat compromises. With recent security breaches affecting thousands of D.C. staffers and top U.S. officials, Sekur's proprietary platform is poised to meet the growing global demand for secure communication solutions. The service is being marketed through The Washington Diplomat, with expectations of rapid adoption.

For more details on this development, interested parties can view the full press release at https://ibn.fm/Z4jYu. Sekur Private Data Ltd. continues to expand its reach, offering Swiss-hosted solutions for secure communications and data management to consumers, businesses, and governments worldwide. Visit www.Sekur.com for more information about their services.

item.title: Evercore Strengthens Private Capital Advisory with Mike Addeo Appointment
item.description:
Evercore, a premier global independent investment banking advisory firm, has announced the addition of Mike Addeo as a senior managing director in its Private Capital Advisory (PCA) group. Based in New York, Addeo brings 15 years of credit investing experience, most recently from Blackstone Credit & Insurance, where he led restructuring and liability management efforts. His expertise is expected to bolster Evercore's capabilities in private credit secondaries, a market with significant growth opportunities. Nigel Dawn, global head of Evercore’s PCA group, highlighted Addeo's deep experience in private credit and complex transactions as key to strengthening the firm's advisory services. Addeo expressed enthusiasm about joining Evercore's PCA team, known for its leadership in private capital advisory, and looks forward to navigating the sophisticated secondary market, especially in private credit where demand for flexible liquidity solutions is on the rise.

Addeo's career spans roles in equity research at Wolfe Research and private wealth management at Deutsche Bank, alongside his recent tenure at Blackstone. A graduate of Georgetown University’s McDonough School of Business and a CFA charterholder, Addeo's appointment underscores Evercore's commitment to enhancing its advisory services in the evolving private credit market. For more details, visit www.evercore.com.

item.title: YETI Holdings Strengthens Investor Relations with Appointment of Arvind Bhatia as Vice President
item.description: YETI Holdings, Inc., a renowned global designer and retailer of outdoor products, has announced the appointment of Arvind Bhatia as Vice President of Investor Relations. Bhatia, with over 25 years of experience in investor relations and equity research, is set to lead YETI's investor relations strategy, aiming to enhance shareholder value and foster strong relationships with the investment community. Reporting to Mike McMullen, YETI's CFO, Bhatia's role is pivotal as the company continues to innovate and expand its product line, including coolers, drinkware, and apparel, designed for outdoor enthusiasts. Bhatia's previous experience includes leading investor relations at SharkNinja during its transition to a public company and similar roles at other notable firms. His academic credentials include a Bachelor of Commerce from the University of Delhi and an MBA from Pittsburgh State University, alongside being a Chartered Financial Analyst. YETI's commitment to quality and innovation has garnered a loyal global following, making Bhatia's appointment a strategic move to further the company's growth and market presence. For more details, visit www.YETI.com.

item.title: NMTC's 2025 Progress Report Highlights Significant Economic Impact Across the U.S.
item.description: The NMTC Coalition has unveiled its 2025 New Markets Tax Credit (NMTC) Progress Report, showcasing the program's significant impact in 2024. This 21st edition highlights the NMTC's role in funneling billions into underserved communities, creating over 61,000 jobs, and supporting 350 projects nationwide. Key figures like Phil Glynn, NMTC Coalition Board Chair, emphasize the NMTC's efficiency in job creation and economic stabilization, particularly in low-income areas. The report details the program's reach across 44 states, the District of Columbia, and Puerto Rico, with a focus on severely distressed communities and non-metropolitan counties. Notable achievements include supporting 114 manufacturing businesses and expanding healthcare and education access through 75 projects. The NMTC's success over two decades underscores its potential to transform communities by providing flexible capital to a variety of sectors.

item.title: Odyssey Reinsurance Company Strengthens London Leadership with Key Appointment
item.description:
Odyssey Reinsurance Company, a globally diversified underwriter of property and casualty reinsurance products, has announced the appointment of Matthew Sheppard as Deputy Chief Underwriting Officer for its London branch. Sheppard, who brings over 20 years of experience to the role, will work alongside Chief Underwriting Officer Andre-Francois Rocque to oversee the company's London Market reinsurance business. Having joined Odyssey Re in 2010 and led the Property Treaty & Retrocession unit since 2017, Sheppard's promotion reflects his outstanding underwriting acumen and leadership. Bob Pollock, OdysseyRe's Chief Executive Officer of the London branch, expressed enthusiasm for Sheppard's new role, marking a significant step in the company's leadership structure.

OdysseyRe, part of the Odyssey Group Holdings, Inc., operates a global network of 14 branch and representative offices across five regions, including London. The company is recognized for its strong financial ratings by A.M. Best and Standard & Poor's, underscoring its position as a leading global provider of reinsurance and specialty insurance. This strategic appointment underscores OdysseyRe's commitment to strengthening its leadership team and enhancing its reinsurance offerings in the London Market, a key hub for global reinsurance activities.

item.title: Microblink Strengthens Leadership with New Vice President of Engineering to Combat Fraud and Enhance Identity Verification
item.description:
Microblink, a pioneer in document scanning and verification technology, has announced the appointment of Radu Tudoran as its new Vice President of Engineering. Tudoran, with over 15 years of experience in technology innovation from institutions like INRIA and companies such as Microsoft and Amazon, is set to lead the engineering team. His role will focus on enhancing Microblink's fraud and identity verification solutions, leveraging his expertise in cloud services, SaaS platforms, and machine learning. Hartley Thompson, Microblink's President and COO, expressed confidence in Tudoran's ability to drive the company's strategic goals forward, highlighting his background in enterprise-grade platforms and AI-based identity solutions. Tudoran himself is excited to contribute to Microblink's innovative solutions aimed at combating fraud and deepfakes in the identity industry.

Microblink's technology is crucial for businesses worldwide, processing over 12 billion documents from more than 180 countries to improve digital customer experiences, streamline KYC/AML workflows, and reduce fraud. This appointment underscores Microblink's commitment to leading the charge in secure and efficient online interactions.

item.title: OptimumBank Holdings Reports 63% Surge in Q1 2025 Net Income Amid Strong Financial Performance
item.description:
OptimumBank Holdings (NYSE American: OPHC) has reported a significant 63% increase in net income for the first quarter of 2025, achieving $3.9 million or $0.33 per basic share. This remarkable growth is attributed to higher net interest income and a reversal of credit losses, with net interest income rising by 21.7% to $9.43 million and the net interest margin improving to 4.06%. The bank's total loans and deposits have seen substantial growth, reaching $800.2 million and $852.93 million respectively, showcasing its strong customer base and funding stability. Additionally, OptimumBank successfully resolved a major non-performing loan, recovering the full $5.6 million carrying value, which significantly reduced its non-performing assets by approximately 75%. For more details, the full press release can be viewed here.

Founded in 2000 and based in Ft. Lauderdale, Florida, OptimumBank specializes in traditional banking services for businesses and consumers in South Florida, offering a competitive alternative to larger financial institutions with its expertise in real estate and commercial lending. The bank's impressive growth trajectory is a testament to its strong market position and operational efficiency. More information about OptimumBank can be found on their website.

This news was disseminated by CurrencyNewsWire (CNW), a leading digital platform for financial market news, part of the Dynamic Brand Portfolio by IBN. CNW provides comprehensive coverage on currencies, cryptocurrencies, blockchain technologies, and global economic trends, among others. For further information, visit CurrencyNewsWire.

item.title: Massimo Group Embraces Nearshoring to Strengthen Supply Chain and Sustainability Efforts
item.description:
Massimo Group (NASDAQ: MAMO) has announced a strategic pivot towards nearshoring its manufacturing operations, aiming to reduce its dependency on East Asia and bring production closer to its primary North American markets. This decision is part of Massimo's broader strategy to address global shipping vulnerabilities, enhance inventory management, and boost gross margins. The initiative is also expected to support the company's launch of next-generation electric and climate-controlled UTVs and ATVs. CEO David Shan emphasized that this move underscores Massimo's dedication to operational flexibility and sustainable growth, promising improvements in lead times, environmental, social, and governance (ESG) performance, and dealer network responsiveness. For more details, the full press release can be accessed here.

Massimo Group, known for its diverse range of powersports vehicles and pontoon boats, is making strides in innovation with the development of electric versions of its popular models. The company's commitment to quality and customer service is evident in its expansive 376,000 square foot facility located in Garland, Texas. Investors and enthusiasts can learn more about Massimo's offerings and updates by visiting massimomotor.com and massimomarine.com.

item.title: Metafoodx Harnesses AI to Combat Food Waste in Commercial Kitchens
item.description:
Fengmin Gong, co-founder and CEO of Metafoodx, is tackling the food industry's waste problem head-on with an AI-powered platform designed to give commercial kitchens real-time visibility into food consumption. Metafoodx leverages 3D vision technology to accurately track food from prep to plate, enabling kitchens to reduce overproduction by up to 90%. The platform's innovative approach not only addresses the $382 billion annual food waste issue in the U.S. but also aligns with global efforts to combat hunger by ensuring more efficient food production and distribution. With recent recognition from the Kitchen Innovation Award and a $9.4 million funding round, Metafoodx is set to expand its impact across various sectors, including university dining and healthcare.

The core of Metafoodx's solution lies in its ability to provide a continuous feedback loop for kitchens, moving beyond traditional waste tracking to proactive planning. By capturing detailed data on food production, consumption, and leftovers, the platform empowers kitchen operators to make informed decisions, significantly cutting costs and waste. This breakthrough comes at a critical time, as the world grapples with the dual challenges of food waste and hunger, highlighting the importance of technology in creating sustainable food systems.
