This move underscores SmartBear's commitment to innovation and quality in the software development lifecycle, aiming to support developers worldwide in creating superior software products.

The appointments are part of SmartBear's strategic initiative to strengthen its position in the market, focusing on AI-driven development and ethical AI practices. With over 16 million developers and 32,000 organizations relying on SmartBear's solutions, the company is poised for significant growth under the new leadership. The addition of Wenzel and Musierowicz is a testament to SmartBear's dedication to excellence and its vision for the future of software development, where quality and speed are paramount.

item.title: Lash Therapy Australia Expands into Costco Canada, Marking a New Chapter in Global Beauty Retail
item.description: Lash Therapy Australia, an award-winning beauty and wellness brand, has made a significant leap into the Canadian market by launching its products in Costco Canada. This expansion introduces Canadian consumers to the brand's acclaimed Lash & Brow Serum, available in select Costco locations and online. The partnership underscores the brand's commitment to providing cruelty-free, vegan, and scientifically backed beauty solutions. Emma Spiliopoulos, co-founder of Lash Therapy Australia, expressed excitement about the collaboration, highlighting shared values with Costco. The brand's success is attributed to its clean, effective formulas that have garnered millions of sales and 5-star reviews. Additionally, Lash Therapy Australia's global presence was further cemented through high-profile events in the U.S., including an editorial and influencer event in NYC and appearances at Coachella. The brand, known for its scientifically formulated lash and brow treatments, continues to empower confidence through self-care. Global Victoria Australia plays a pivotal role in supporting Australian beauty brands like Lash Therapy Australia in achieving international success.

item.title: ProtoSpace Mfg Sponsors International Rocket Engineering Competition 2025 to Foster Aerospace Innovation
item.description:
ProtoSpace Mfg, a global leader in rapid manufacturing for aerospace, has announced its sponsorship and active participation in the International Rocket Engineering Competition (IREC) 2025, hosted at Midland International Air and Space Port in Texas. This event, organized by the Experimental Sounding Rocket Association (ESRA), is a premier international collegiate rocketry competition, attracting over 2,000 students worldwide. ProtoSpace Mfg's involvement includes manufacturing support, such as designing new launch pads and providing payload form factor templates, alongside a keynote address by Dr. Doug Milburn, Co-Founder and Vice President of ProtoSpace Mfg, on the importance of rapid prototyping in aerospace innovation.

The competition emphasizes hands-on engineering skills, with students completing the full engineering cycle under tight deadlines. ProtoSpace Mfg's sponsorship offers teams access to custom-manufactured rocket components, highlighting the company's commitment to fostering the next generation of aerospace talent and innovation. The event will be live-streamed on the ESRA YouTube channel, offering a unique opportunity for global engagement with the future of aerospace engineering.

item.title: Lane42 Investment Partners Strengthens Leadership Team to Navigate Dynamic Investment Landscape
item.description:
Lane42 Investment Partners, LLC, a prominent alternative asset management firm, has recently expanded its Senior Leadership team to bolster its platform and strategic growth. Joining Founder and CEO Scott Graves are Cass Traub, Co-Founder, COO, and CFO; Anna Spector, Partner and Chief Compliance Officer; Alexis Otto, Partner in Marketing and Investor Relations; and Donal Long, Managing Director and Head of Business Operations. This team, alongside the previously announced Capital Opportunities strategy investment team, is set to drive Lane42's mission of creating value in a dynamic investment landscape. The firm, backed by a $2 billion capital commitment from Millennium Management LLC, aims to leverage inefficiencies in public and private markets for superior returns.

The new leaders bring a wealth of experience from top-tier firms like Oaktree Capital Management, CVC, and KKR, underscoring Lane42's commitment to excellence and innovation in asset management. Their diverse backgrounds in finance, compliance, marketing, and operations are expected to enhance Lane42's capabilities in identifying and capitalizing on investment opportunities across asset classes.

item.title: Hybrid Vehicles Outpace BEVs and PHEVs in U.S. Market Amid Policy Uncertainties
item.description:
Recent analysis by Wards Intelligence highlights a significant shift in the U.S. automotive market, with hybrid vehicle sales continued to rise, while battery electric vehicles (BEVs) and plug-in hybrid vehicles (PHEVs) have seen stagnant growth. This trend underscores a growing preference among American consumers for more affordable hybrid options over premium BEVs and PHEVs, especially in light of potential changes to federal EV tax credits under the Trump administration. Companies like Mullen Automotive Inc. (NASDAQ: MULN) face new challenges as market dynamics evolve. GreenCarStocks, a specialized communications platform, provides in-depth coverage and updates on the green energy sector, offering valuable insights into these developments.

For investors and enthusiasts keen on the latest trends in the EV and hybrid markets, GreenCarStocks serves as a critical resource, delivering breaking news and analysis. The platform's comprehensive coverage includes updates on companies like Mullen Automotive, ensuring readers stay informed about significant shifts in the industry. With the potential halt of federal EV tax credits, the automotive landscape is poised for further changes, making platforms like GreenCarStocks indispensable for those looking to navigate the future of green transportation.

item.title: Anthropic CEO Warns of AI's Potential to Disrupt Job Market, Urges Preparation for Future
item.description:
Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei has issued a dire warning about the future of white-collar employment, predicting that AI could eliminate half of all entry-level roles, potentially pushing unemployment rates to 20% in the coming years. This alarming forecast underscores the rapid advancements in AI technologies, with companies like Thumzup Media Corp. at the forefront of innovation. The discussion around AI's impact on the job market is gaining momentum, highlighting the urgent need for strategies to mitigate potential disruptions.

The news was disseminated by AINewsWire, a leading communications platform specializing in AI advancements. AINewsWire, part of the Dynamic Brand Portfolio under IBN, offers comprehensive services including press release enhancement and social media distribution, ensuring wide-reaching impact. This platform serves as a critical conduit for information on AI trends, technologies, and the companies driving innovation, making it an invaluable resource for investors, journalists, and the general public alike.

item.title: Qlik Strengthens Leadership with New Chief Revenue Officer to Drive Enterprise AI Solutions
item.description:
Qlik, a prominent player in the data integration and analytics sector, has announced the appointment of Brian Hamel as its new Chief Revenue Officer. This strategic move comes at a time when businesses are increasingly focusing on leveraging AI and data for making informed decisions. Hamel, with his extensive experience from tech giants like IBM and Oracle, is set to lead Qlik's global sales efforts, aiming to meet the growing demand for enterprise-ready solutions that transform data into actionable insights. His leadership is expected to propel Qlik's growth further, especially in the realm of enterprise AI, where the company is already a leader.

The announcement follows a landmark year for Qlik, highlighted by significant innovations such as the Qlik’s agentic AI experience and Qlik Open Lakehouse. These advancements underscore Qlik's commitment to providing scalable and efficient AI solutions across various industries. Hamel's role will be crucial in expanding Qlik's global partner ecosystem and enhancing its go-to-market strategies, ensuring that the company continues to deliver value to its customers in an ever-evolving digital landscape.

item.title: APUS Appoints Dr. Nicholas Wernicki as Dean to Lead School of Arts, Humanities, and Education
item.description:
The American Public University System (APUS) has announced the appointment of Dr. Nicholas Wernicki as the Dean of its Arts, Humanities, and Education School, effective May 22. Dr. Wernicki, with his vast experience in academic leadership and workforce development, is set to join the university's Academic Senior Leadership Team. His appointment is seen as a strategic move to bolster the university's commitment to preparing students for future challenges.

Dr. Elizabeth Johnson, Provost of APUS, highlighted Dr. Wernicki's unique blend of academic operations and affairs experience as key to his selection. His previous roles include significant positions at Santa Fe Community College, Albright College, and Delaware County Community College, where he contributed to academic excellence and workforce development initiatives. Dr. Wernicki expressed his honor in joining APUS and his eagerness to contribute to the university's mission of student success and scholarly advancement.

APUS, known for its affordable and high-quality online education, continues to strengthen its leadership team with this appointment. The university's commitment to workforce-relevant education and its recognition for quality online learning underscore the importance of this leadership addition. For more details on the School of Arts, Humanities, and Education, visit here for more info.

item.title: Vivakor Expands Crude Oil Operations in Key U.S. Basins to Meet Growing Energy Demands
item.description:
Vivakor (NASDAQ: VIVK), an integrated energy services provider, is making significant strides in the Permian and Eagle Ford Basins by expanding its crude oil storage, logistics, and marketing operations. With 10 pipeline injection stations in the Permian Basin, Vivakor connects to major pipelines like Centurion, Plains Basin Pipeline, and the West Texas System, positioning itself as a crucial logistics hub. Chairman and CEO James Ballengee highlights the company's role in supporting the Permian Basin, which accounts for over 40% of U.S. oil output, ensuring producers have market access while optimizing revenue. Vivakor's mission extends to sustainable energy transportation, storage, and remediation, boasting one of the largest fleets of oilfield trucking services in the U.S. and plans for oilfield waste remediation facilities.

For more details, visit the full press release at https://ibn.fm/eK4vH. InvestorWire, a platform within the Dynamic Brand Portfolio @ IBN, provides comprehensive communication solutions for companies like Vivakor, ensuring wide-reaching investor and public engagement. Discover more about InvestorWire's services at InvestorWire.

item.title: ECGI Holdings Inc. Invests in TrueToForm to Revolutionize E-Commerce with AI and 3D Computer Vision
item.description:
ECGI Holdings (OTC: ECGI), a diversified holding company, has made headlines with its investment arm, Uplist Ventures, backing TrueToForm, an AI and 3D computer vision startup. This startup, supported by notable entities like MassChallenge and Dartmouth Angels, is tackling the $38 billion issue of e-commerce apparel returns through its patented AI body scanning platform. TrueToForm's technology creates highly accurate digital avatars, boasting a 97% accuracy rate, which is already being utilized by ECGI's Pacific Saddlery brand for custom fittings. With a growing client base and a promising pipeline, TrueToForm is rapidly expanding. This investment underscores ECGI's commitment to fostering innovation in AI, blockchain, and health tech sectors.

ECGI Holdings Inc. stands out with its unique portfolio that spans viticulture and luxury fashion, including a five-acre vineyard in California and the Pacific Saddlery brand. The company's strategic investments reflect its dedication to merging technology with traditional industries, offering a glimpse into the future of luxury and lifestyle. For more details on ECGI's ventures and the full press release, visit https://ibn.fm/ZXXiX.

item.title: Energy Fuels Inc. Achieves Record Uranium Production, Strengthening U.S. Nuclear Energy Sector
item.description:
Energy Fuels Inc. (NYSE American: UUUU) (TSX: EFR), a prominent U.S. producer of uranium and rare earth elements, has announced a record production of 258,745 pounds of U₃O₈ from its Pinyon Plain mine in Arizona, marking a 71% increase from April. The company has also updated the Technical Report for its Bullfrog Project in Utah, revealing significant increases in Indicated and Inferred uranium resources and introducing first-time project economics with a 15-year mine life. Additionally, Energy Fuels is advancing its Roca Honda project in New Mexico and has resumed operations at its EZ Complex in Arizona, aligning with President Trump's Executive Orders to bolster the domestic nuclear fuel industry. For more details, visit https://ibn.fm/22DHL.

Energy Fuels is not only a leader in uranium production but also focuses on rare earth elements, heavy mineral sands, vanadium, and medical isotopes, with operations spanning the U.S., Kenya, Madagascar, Brazil, and Australia. The company's White Mesa Mill in Utah stands as the only fully licensed conventional uranium processing facility in the U.S., poised to contribute to cancer treatments through medical isotope recovery. Explore more at www.EnergyFuels.com.

item.title: Mariner Expands Wealth Management Portfolio with Taurus Asset Management Acquisition
item.description:
Mariner, a national financial services firm, has significantly bolstered its portfolio by acquiring Taurus Asset Management, a New York City-based wealth management firm with approximately $1.4 billion in assets under advisement. This strategic move not only expands Mariner's footprint in the financial services sector but also enhances its capability to serve professional athletes and high-net-worth individuals with tailored wealth planning and investment management services. Founded in 2004 by Brad Peck, Taurus Asset Management brings to Mariner a wealth of experience in managing complex financial needs, including estate planning, tax preparation, and personal finance, making it a perfect fit for Mariner's client-first approach.

The acquisition, which closed on May 31, 2025, marks a new chapter for both firms, with Taurus Asset Management adopting the Mariner name and branding while continuing to operate from its Madison Avenue location. The deal was facilitated by Houlihan Lokey, acting as the exclusive financial advisor to Taurus Asset Management. This partnership is set to elevate the level of service provided to ultra-high-net-worth families, leveraging Mariner's scale and in-house expertise to meet the sophisticated needs of its clients. Learn more about this transformative acquisition at Mariner's website.

item.title: BMP AI Announces Beta Launch of Enhanced Workflow and Business Chatbot Platform
item.description:
NEURALBASE AI Ltd., under its enterprise brand BMP AI, is set to launch an enhanced workflow and business chatbot platform, marking a significant step in enterprise AI solutions. The platform, distinct from general-purpose AI like ChatGPT, is tailored for secure, internal enterprise environments, focusing on automating workflows and enhancing decision-making. With features such as workflow-centric architecture, persistent context awareness, and plug-and-play integrations, BMP AI aims to revolutionize industries like healthcare, education, and financial services. The company also unveiled a redesigned website, www.neuralbase.ai, offering insights into its technology and vision. Vighnesh Dobale, Chairman and CEO, emphasizes the platform's role in eliminating silos and boosting productivity.

For more details, visit the original release on www.newmediawire.com.

item.title: Krasdale Foods Strengthens Leadership Team to Drive Innovation and Growth
item.description:
Krasdale Foods, a venerable family-owned business with a 117-year history of supporting independent supermarkets through grocery distribution, merchandising, marketing, and financing, has recently announced significant leadership changes. These include two promotions and one new hire, signaling a strategic push towards innovation and growth. Guillermo Fisher, with over 40 years at Krasdale, steps up as General Manager of Warehouse Operations, focusing on integrating cutting-edge technology like cloud-based systems and artificial intelligence to enhance efficiency. Rob Gangemi, promoted to Vice President of Finance, brings a track record of financial streamlining and strategic insight. John Aleksandrowicz joins as Director of Business Initiatives, tasked with identifying growth opportunities and improving retail execution. President Gus Lebiak expressed pride in the team, highlighting their potential to drive future successes.

Krasdale's commitment to empowering independent food markets across the Northeast and Florida, under banners such as C-Town and Bravo, remains unwavering. These leadership changes underscore the company's dedication to innovation, strategic growth, and maintaining high standards of service and compliance. For more details, visit the source.

item.title: Advyzon Strengthens Leadership Team with New Vice President of Client Success
item.description:
Advyzon, a leading technology platform for financial advisors and investment managers, has announced the appointment of Clark Richards as Vice President of Client Success. Richards, with over 14 years of experience in the financial technology sector, will lead Advyzon's client-facing teams, focusing on enhancing customer service and relationship management. This move highlights Advyzon's commitment to innovation and excellence, aiming to provide a seamless experience for its growing client base of over 2,100 advisory firms. Richards' previous roles at Envestnet | Tamarac and Juniper Square have equipped him with the expertise to drive Advyzon's client success strategies forward.

Advyzon's dedication to client service and innovation has been recognized by being named one of the Best Places to Work in Fintech 2025 by American Banker. The company, founded by CEO Hailin Li, offers a unified wealth management platform that integrates various financial services, catering to a wide range of clients from RIAs to ultra-high-net-worth individuals. With a strong focus on product development and user feedback, Advyzon continues to expand its offerings and enhance its platform to meet the evolving needs of the financial services industry.

item.title: AMG Strengthens Leadership Team with Appointment of Thomas M. Wojcik as President
item.description:
In a significant leadership update, AMG, a global strategic partner to independent investment management firms, has announced the appointment of Thomas M. Wojcik as President, effective June 3, 2025. Wojcik, who will continue his role as Chief Operating Officer, has been instrumental in AMG's growth strategy since joining in 2019. Jay C. Horgen, transitioning from President and CEO to solely CEO, praised Wojcik's contributions to AMG's evolution and strategic success. The company has notably expanded into private markets and liquid alternative strategies, now accounting for half of its earnings. Wojcik's extensive background, including leadership roles at BlackRock, Inc., and investment positions at alternative asset managers, positions him as a key figure in AMG's future. For more details, visit AMG.

AMG's strategy focuses on investing in high-quality, independent partner-owned firms to generate long-term value. With assets under management totaling approximately $712 billion as of March 31, 2025, AMG supports its affiliates' independence and growth. This leadership transition underscores AMG's commitment to leveraging its team's strength and unique opportunities in the investment management sector. Discover more at www.amg.com.

item.title: Scott Bartnick Joins Oceans Equity as Managing Partner to Drive Growth and Innovation
item.description:
Miami-based private equity firm Oceans Equity has announced the appointment of Scott Bartnick as Managing Partner. Bartnick, who brings a wealth of experience in driving growth across various industries, will co-lead the firm's operations, investment activities, and portfolio oversight. His previous role at Boyne Capital saw him play a pivotal role in sourcing and executing investments, as well as working closely with management teams to foster long-term value creation.

Josh Bilmes, Managing Partner of Oceans Equity, expressed his enthusiasm for Bartnick's joining, highlighting their long-standing friendship and shared vision for the firm. Bartnick himself is excited to contribute to the firm's momentum, which includes securing commitments from top institutional investors and closing its first platform investment. Oceans Equity, known for its focus on service businesses and niche product companies, continues to build a deep pipeline of actionable opportunities under its new leadership.

item.title: SEO 101 Podcast Celebrates 500th Episode, Marking 15 Years of Digital Marketing Leadership
item.description:
WMR.FM, the world's largest podcast network on internet marketing, celebrates a monumental milestone with the 500th episode of the "SEO 101 Podcast." Hosted by Ross Dunn and Scott Van Achte, this podcast has been a beacon of digital marketing education since 2009, offering expert insights into SEO trends, Google updates, and best practices. The episode reflects on the podcast's journey, including the transition of co-hosts and the evolution of SEO topics, from Google algorithm updates to the impact of AI in search. With nearly 5 million downloads, the podcast has become a vital resource for marketers worldwide.

The "SEO 101 Podcast" has covered pivotal moments in SEO history, including the introduction of Google's Panda and Penguin updates, the shift to mobile-first indexing, and the rise of generative AI in search. The 500th episode is a testament to the podcast's enduring relevance and the strong community it has built. Available on WMR.FM and major podcast platforms, this milestone episode invites listeners to join in celebrating the podcast's legacy and its contribution to the SEO industry.

item.title: Modernizing Contact Centers: A Key to Overcoming Value-Based Care Challenges
item.description:
Patty Hayward, the General Manager of Healthcare and Life Sciences at Talkdesk, is revolutionizing the healthcare industry by integrating contact center technology with EHR systems, including a pioneering AI-native integration with Epic Cheers. With over 25 years of experience, Hayward is transforming healthcare contact centers from cost centers to value centers through the use of AI agents and automation, aiming to improve patient access and navigation at scale. Her efforts are focused on enabling health systems to accelerate digital transformation, offering more coordinated and personalized care experiences. Hayward's work emphasizes the importance of equity, automation with guardrails, and maintaining the human touch in digital transformation.

The article also delves into the challenges of adopting value-based care (VBC), highlighting financial risks and data gaps as significant barriers. Hayward suggests that modernizing contact centers with AI-enabled platforms can help providers overcome these challenges by identifying care gaps in real-time during patient interactions, thereby improving outcomes and meeting VBC contract benchmarks. This approach not only enhances care coordination and reduces costs but also unlocks additional revenue for providers by improving VBC performance.

item.title: Zeal Capital Partners Secures $82 Million for Second Fund, Championing Diversity in Venture Capital
item.description:
Zeal Capital Partners, a Washington, D.C.-based venture capital firm led by Nasir Qadree, has successfully closed its second fund, raising $82 million. This significant milestone brings the firm's total assets under management to $186 million, doubling its size in just five years. The fund has attracted a diverse group of limited partners, including Citi Impact Fund, MassMutual, Wells Fargo, and Spelman College, showcasing strong support for Zeal's mission to democratize access to capital for underrepresented founders. Zeal Capital Partners, known for backing groundbreaking startups like Esusu, plans to invest in about 25 early-stage companies over the next four years, with a focus on sectors like education, economic mobility, and healthcare. The firm's commitment to fostering generational wealth among people of color and women is a cornerstone of its strategy, as highlighted by Qadree in various interviews and press releases.

Nasir Qadree, the visionary behind Zeal Capital Partners, brings a unique blend of Wall Street experience and a passion for social impact to the venture capital world. His journey from Goldman Sachs to leading a Black-led unicorn like Esusu underscores his commitment to bridging the gap in venture capital accessibility. With the closing of its second fund, Zeal Capital Partners is poised to make a lasting impact on the innovation economy, investing in companies that not only promise high returns but also aim to solve systemic challenges. The firm's investments in platforms like Seven Starling and Debbie exemplify its focus on leveraging technology for social good, making it a beacon of hope for founders of color seeking to make their mark in the tech industry.

item.title: ABVC BioPharma Announces Share Dividend in Strategic Move to Enhance Shareholder Value
item.description:
ABVC BioPharma, Inc., a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company specializing in ophthalmology, CNS, and oncology/hematology, has announced a groundbreaking move to distribute shares of its subsidiary, AiBtl BioPharma Inc., as a dividend to its shareholders. This strategic decision, marking ABVC's first dividend payment, aims to reward shareholders and bolster confidence in the company's growth trajectory and the potential of AiBtl. With ABVC holding a 57.8% stake in AiBtl, this distribution underscores the company's commitment to enhancing shareholder value and expanding its footprint in the Asian healthcare market, particularly in CNS disorders like MDD and ADHD. Dr. Uttam Patil, ABVC's CEO, highlighted this move as a testament to the company's confidence in AiBtl's long-term prospects and its dedication to shareholder rewards. AiBtl, focusing on botanical-based therapeutics for CNS disorders, represents a pivotal part of ABVC's strategy to penetrate the Asia-Pacific markets and forge partnerships with global pharmaceutical entities.

ABVC BioPharma's innovative approach, leveraging in-licensed technology from prestigious institutions, positions it as a key player in the biopharmaceutical industry. The company's pipeline, including six drugs and a medical device under development, reflects its ambition to address unmet medical needs through cutting-edge research and collaboration. This dividend distribution not only signifies a milestone for ABVC but also highlights the evolving landscape of biopharmaceutical investments, where shareholder engagement and strategic partnerships are paramount for success.

item.title: Coursera Appoints Patrick Supanc as Chief Product Officer to Drive Innovation in Online Education
item.description:
Coursera, Inc., a leading global online learning platform, has announced the appointment of Patrick Supanc as its new Chief Product Officer, starting June 2, 2025. Supanc, with over 20 years of experience in technology and education, including significant roles at Amazon, Pearson, and Blackboard, is set to lead Coursera's product strategy. His appointment is seen as a strategic move to enhance the platform's offerings, including AI-powered tools like AI translations and dubbing, Coursera Coach, and the Academic Integrity suite, aimed at making learning more accessible and personalized. Coursera, with 175 million registered learners, continues to expand its catalog and strengthen its platform to meet the global demand for trusted learning solutions.

Supanc's background in scaling customer-centric products and his commitment to expanding access to world-class education align with Coursera's mission. His leadership is expected to drive innovation and further Coursera's impact in upskilling and reskilling individuals in high-demand fields. This development underscores Coursera's commitment to leveraging technology to transform education and career development worldwide.

item.title: Keystone.ai Strengthens Leadership with Appointment of Brad Miller as President of CoreAI
item.description:
Keystone.ai, a leading technology and services firm specializing in enterprise AI, has announced the appointment of Brad Miller as President of CoreAI. Miller, with a rich background in transforming technical complexity into strategic advantage, joins from Moderna where he was Chief Information Officer. At Moderna, he was instrumental in deploying ChatGPT through the creation of mChat, a secure GenAI platform, and led the company's AI transformation. His leadership at Keystone.ai will focus on embedding AI as the scientific engine behind every critical decision, aiming to bring clarity, precision, and measurable impact to businesses. Miller's extensive experience includes roles at Capital One, Mastercard, Citibank, Amazon, and Microsoft, making him a pivotal figure in the enterprise AI space.

Greg Richards, CEO and co-founder of Keystone, highlighted Miller's return as a forward-leaning partner, emphasizing his ability to help enterprises execute with AI. Miller expressed excitement about joining Keystone's extraordinary team of AI scientists, economists, and engineers, aiming to drive decisions by science, grounded in data, and accelerated by intelligence. For more information about Keystone and its innovative solutions, visit www.keystone.ai.

item.title: BILL Strengthens Leadership Team with Appointment of Rohini Jain as CFO to Drive Fintech Innovation
item.description:
BILL, a leading financial operations platform for small and midsize businesses (SMBs), has announced the appointment of Rohini Jain as its new Chief Financial Officer (CFO), effective July 7th. Jain, a global finance executive with over 20 years of experience at companies like PayPal, Walmart, and General Electric, will lead BILL's finance strategy, reporting directly to CEO and Founder René Lacerte. Concurrently, John Rettig, the current President, will expand his role to include Chief Operating Officer responsibilities, aiming to accelerate BILL's growth and enhance its category leadership. This strategic move underscores BILL's commitment to leveraging AI and innovative technology to provide intelligent financial capabilities for SMBs.

Rohini Jain's appointment is a testament to BILL's ambitious mission to transform the financial operations landscape for SMBs. With her extensive background in fintech, payments, and e-commerce, Jain is poised to drive BILL's next phase of growth. Her vision aligns with BILL's goal to automate the future of finance, enabling businesses to thrive by efficiently managing payables, receivables, and spend and expense management. BILL's platform, trusted by hundreds of thousands of businesses, continues to be a pivotal resource for SMBs looking to streamline their financial operations.

item.title: Theoria Medical Strengthens Leadership Team to Transform Post-Acute and Senior Living Care
item.description:
Theoria Medical, a pioneering physician-led organization dedicated to revolutionizing post-acute and senior living care, has announced significant additions to its senior leadership team. These strategic appointments include Brendan McNamara as Chief Operating Officer, Svetlana Vinokur as Chief Financial Officer, Manny Raposo as Chief Growth Officer, Kevin Murphy as Chief of Value-Based Care, and Marcia Siguenza as Chief Human Resources Officer. Each brings a wealth of experience and a proven track record in their respective fields, from operational leadership and financial strategy to growth initiatives and human resources management. This move underscores Theoria's commitment to elevating care standards, unifying clinical operations, and achieving meaningful outcomes for patients, partners, and payers.

With its expanded executive team, Theoria is set to enhance its mission of integrating care across the post-acute spectrum, from hospital discharge to home-based settings. Leveraging a physician-led model and cutting-edge technology, the company aims to improve health outcomes for a complex patient population through better care coordination and patient satisfaction. Dr. Justin Di Rezze, CEO of Theoria Medical, emphasizes the organization's focus on a high-touch, evidence-based care model that prioritizes patient well-being and innovative, value-based solutions.

item.title: Riot Platforms Strengthens Leadership Team with Appointment of Jonathan Gibbs as Chief Data Center Officer
item.description:
Riot Platforms, a leader in Bitcoin-driven infrastructure, has announced the appointment of Jonathan Gibbs as Chief Data Center Officer (CDCO) to spearhead the development of a new data center platform. This strategic move aims to diversify Riot's revenue streams by expanding into non-bitcoin-related data centers, catering to hyperscale and enterprise tenants. With over 15 years of experience, Gibbs is set to leverage Riot's extensive power portfolio to meet the growing demand for digital infrastructure, driven by cloud computing and AI applications.

The initiative underscores Riot's commitment to maximizing asset value and generating long-term returns for investors. Gibbs' expertise in developing over one gigawatt of data center capacity across North America, Europe, and Asia positions Riot to capitalize on the surging demand for high-performance computing. The company's immediate access to 1.7 gigawatts of power near major markets further enhances its competitive edge in the digital infrastructure space.

item.title: Timken Company Appoints Timothy A. Graham as President of Industrial Motion to Drive Growth and Innovation
item.description:
The Timken Company, a global leader in engineered bearings and industrial motion, has announced the appointment of Timothy A. Graham as the new president of Industrial Motion, effective immediately. Graham, who previously served as vice president of operations for Engineered Bearings, brings a wealth of experience from his tenure at Timken, including leadership roles in global operations, supply chain, and sustainability. He succeeds Christopher A. Coughlin, who is retiring after a distinguished career with the company. Richard G. Kyle, Timken's president and CEO, praised Graham's operational expertise and global experience, highlighting his potential to drive profitable growth for the Industrial Motion business. Graham expressed his enthusiasm for leading the team and advancing Timken's strategy in the Industrial Motion sector.

Timken, with over 125 years of innovation in engineered bearings and industrial motion, continues to strengthen its position as a technology leader. The company, which reported $4.6 billion in sales in 2024, operates globally with a workforce of approximately 19,000 people across 45 countries. Graham's appointment underscores Timken's commitment to leadership and innovation in the industrial motion space, promising to deliver exceptional value to customers worldwide.

item.title: Northern Trust Strengthens OCIO Strategy with Appointment of Industry Veteran Katherine McCabe
item.description: Northern Trust, a global leader in wealth management and asset servicing, has announced the appointment of Katherine McCabe to spearhead the Outsourced Chief Investment Officer (OCIO) strategy within its Asset Servicing division. This strategic move underscores Northern Trust's commitment to enhancing its services for the OCIO community, leveraging McCabe's extensive 30-year experience in the asset owner space. McCabe, who previously held leadership roles at State Street Bank & Trust Company and Bank of New York Mellon, will focus on developing strategic relationships and crafting innovative solutions tailored to the unique needs of OCIOs and their clients. Northern Trust's dedication to the asset owner segment is aimed at empowering clients to maximize investment returns, thereby enabling them to better serve their communities and the broader world. For more insights, visit northerntrust.com.

item.title: Alight, Inc. Appoints Donna Dorsey as Chief Human Resources Officer to Lead Global People Strategy
item.description: Alight, Inc., a prominent cloud-based human capital and technology services provider, has announced the appointment of Donna Dorsey as its new Chief Human Resources Officer (CHRO). Dorsey, who joins from International Motors, brings a wealth of experience in HR leadership, coaching, and legal expertise. Her role will focus on leading Alight's global people strategy, enhancing talent development, organizational effectiveness, and fostering a culture that prioritizes employee experience. CEO Dave Guilmette expressed enthusiasm for Dorsey's alignment with Alight's strategic goals and culture, highlighting her potential to strengthen the company's position as a top talent destination. Dorsey herself is excited to contribute to Alight's growth, emphasizing the company's people-first reputation and her commitment to building a workplace where every employee can thrive. Recognized for her strategic vision and inclusive leadership, Dorsey's appointment is a significant step for Alight as it continues to innovate in human capital solutions. Learn more about Alight's offerings at alight.com.

item.title: Donaldson Company Elevates Richard Lewis to Chief Operating Officer Role
item.description: Donaldson Company, a global leader in filtration products and solutions, has announced the appointment of Richard Lewis as its new chief operating officer, effective August 1, 2025. Lewis, who currently serves as president of the company's Life Sciences segment, will oversee Donaldson's three main segments, enterprise operations, supply chain, and corporate technology functions, reporting directly to Tod Carpenter, the company's chairman, president, and CEO. With over 23 years at Donaldson, Lewis brings a wealth of experience and a deep understanding of the company's global portfolio, end markets, and customer needs. His appointment is seen as a strategic move to strengthen the execution of Donaldson's strategy and drive value creation for stakeholders. Lewis expressed his honor in stepping into the COO role and his eagerness to work with the leadership team to deliver innovative solutions worldwide. Donaldson, founded in 1915, operates in over 140 locations across six continents, offering filtration solutions through its Mobile Solutions, Industrial Solutions, and Life Sciences segments. More information can be found at www.Donaldson.com.

item.title: Grant Thornton Appoints Rick Surett as New CFO to Spearhead Financial Strategy Amid Global Expansion
item.description:
Grant Thornton, a leading provider of audit, assurance, tax, and advisory services in America, has announced the appointment of Rick Surett as its new chief financial officer (CFO), succeeding Muhammad Bhayat who is retiring after over two decades of service. Surett, who officially assumes the role on June 2, brings nearly 30 years of financial leadership experience from roles at Transportation Equipment Network, Ports America, and Avaya. His appointment is seen as a strategic move to bolster Grant Thornton's financial strategy and support its expansion across Europe and the Middle East. CEO Jim Peko praised Surett's fresh perspective and Bhayat's foundational contributions to the firm.

Surett's background includes significant achievements in improving operational efficiency and scalability, making him a valuable asset for Grant Thornton's continued growth and innovation. The firm, which operates through Grant Thornton LLP and Grant Thornton Advisors LLC, has recently expanded its multinational platform to include Ireland and the UAE, enhancing its service offerings with a team of nearly 13,000 professionals. This strategic expansion and leadership transition underscore Grant Thornton's commitment to delivering exceptional client experiences and fostering a culture of professional growth.

item.title: JBT Marel Corporation Strengthens Leadership with Appointment of James Pelletier as Executive Vice President and General Counsel
item.description:
JBT Marel Corporation, a global leader in providing technology solutions to the food and beverage industry, has announced the appointment of James "Jim" Pelletier as Executive Vice President and General Counsel, starting June 30, 2025. Pelletier, with over 20 years of experience in legal and business leadership, has previously held senior roles at major companies like Masonite International and GE. His expertise in mergers and acquisitions, corporate governance, and regulatory compliance will be pivotal in his new role at JBT Marel, where he will oversee the Legal and Compliance functions and advise the executive team and Board of Directors. This move underscores JBT Marel's commitment to strengthening its legal and governance frameworks as it continues to expand globally.

Brian Deck, CEO of JBT Marel, highlighted Pelletier's extensive experience in leading legal departments at global public companies as a key asset to the leadership team. JBT Marel, formed from the merger of JBT and Marel, is dedicated to transforming the future of food through innovative technology and systems. The company operates in over 30 countries, focusing on improving food safety, quality, and efficiency across the supply chain. For more details, visit JBT Marel Corporation.

item.title: Treliant Strengthens Financial Crimes and Fraud Solutions Team with Key Hire
item.description:
Treliant, a leading consulting firm in the financial services sector, has announced the appointment of Bobbie Paul as Managing Director within its Financial Crimes and Fraud Solutions team. This strategic move underscores Treliant's dedication to assisting financial institutions, fintechs, and digital asset companies in combating the escalating threats of fraud and financial crime. Bobbie Paul brings over 20 years of expertise in risk and compliance, with a notable background in developing fraud and identity programs that enhance operational efficiency and regulatory compliance. Her previous roles include Head of Fraud and Identity at MVB and leading the Fraud and Identity Advisory Services at Experian, showcasing her ability to bridge strategy and execution in fraud prevention.

John Arvanitis, Senior Managing Director at Treliant, highlighted the increasing complexity of fraud and identity threats in the financial sector, emphasizing the value Bobbie's real-world experience and strategic insight brings to their clients. Bobbie expressed her enthusiasm for helping clients develop proactive strategies that protect customers and align with regulatory expectations, further solidifying Treliant's reputation as a consulting firm with comprehensive expertise in fraud and identity risk management. For more details, visit www.treliant.com.

item.title: Withum Wealth Management Strengthens Leadership with Appointment of Henry Mercer as Chief Investment Officer
item.description:
Henry Mercer, a seasoned investment professional with over 45 years of experience, has been appointed as the Chief Investment Officer of Withum Wealth Management, a firm co-founded by Pinnacle Associates, Ltd. Mercer's illustrious career includes founding Mercer Capital Advisers, Inc. and serving as President and Founding Partner of Mercer, Bokert, Buckman & Reid, Inc. His expertise and leadership are expected to drive Withum Wealth Management's mission of providing personalized investment solutions and comprehensive financial guidance. Mercer's appointment is seen as a strategic move to bolster the firm's advisory services, leveraging his deep industry relationships and commitment to client value. The announcement was made by Scott Brown, President of Pinnacle Associates, Ltd., highlighting Mercer's alignment with the firm's goals. Mercer expressed his enthusiasm for joining Withum Wealth and contributing to its continued growth and success in helping clients achieve long-term financial objectives.

This development marks a significant milestone for Withum Wealth Management as it continues to expand its influence in the financial advisory sector. Mercer's extensive background and strategic vision are anticipated to enhance the firm's offerings and reinforce its reputation as a trusted partner for individuals, families, and institutions seeking expert financial advice. The news was first reported by citybiz, underscoring the importance of this appointment in the financial services industry.

item.title: Envestnet Strengthens RIA Support with Strategic Leadership Appointment
item.description: Envestnet, a leader in wealth management technology, has announced the strategic appointment of Sean Meighan as the Head of RIA Distribution, a newly created role aimed at strengthening the company's commitment to the Registered Independent Advisor (RIA) community. With nearly 20 years of experience in the wealth management industry, Meighan's expertise is expected to enhance Envestnet's offerings, including Tamarac, Report Studio, and managed accounts, to better serve RIAs. Andrew Stavaridis, Envestnet's Chief Relationship Officer, highlighted Meighan's unique understanding of RIAs' technology needs and operational models. Meighan himself emphasized the importance of flexible and scalable technology solutions for RIAs to meet their clients' sophisticated expectations. Envestnet's platform, trusted by over a third of financial advisors in the U.S., supports RIAs with comprehensive technology and services, managing approximately $6.5 trillion in platform assets. For more insights into Envestnet's innovative solutions, visit www.envestnet.com and follow them on LinkedIn and X.

item.title: National Restaurant Association Strengthens Leadership Team to Navigate Industry Challenges
item.description:
The National Restaurant Association has announced the appointment of Karl Dahlgren as its new Chief Product Officer (CPO) and Judy Mulcahy as its new Chief Operating Officer (COO). Dahlgren, with over 30 years of leadership experience, will focus on enhancing the Association's product portfolio, including the ServSafe program, to deliver greater value to the restaurant industry. Mulcahy, bringing more than 25 years of expertise in association leadership and organizational transformation, will oversee the Association's daily operations to ensure they align with strategic goals. Michelle Korsmo, the Association's president & CEO, highlighted the importance of their leadership in advancing the organization's mission to support the prosperity of America's restaurants.

Both appointees expressed their enthusiasm for their new roles, emphasizing their commitment to driving innovation and supporting the restaurant industry during a transformative period. The National Restaurant Association, representing over 1 million restaurant and foodservice outlets, continues to play a pivotal role in advocacy, education, and food safety within the industry. Their initiatives, including the National Restaurant Association Show and the ServSafe training program, underscore their dedication to fostering growth and resilience among restaurants nationwide.

item.title: Stradley Ronon Strengthens Litigation Team with Key Partner Appointments
item.description:
Stradley Ronon, a prominent law firm, has significantly bolstered its litigation and investigations team by welcoming Jordann Conaboy and Benjamin McCoy as partners in its Philadelphia office. Both attorneys, previously partners at Fox Rothschild, bring a wealth of experience in complex litigation, particularly in health care, managed care, and pharmaceutical disputes. Their expertise in handling large-scale cases, including fraud claims and government investigations, aligns with Stradley Ronon's commitment to providing comprehensive legal services in these sectors. Jeff Grossman, co-chair of the firm's litigation practice, highlighted the duo's ability to navigate the intricate regulatory and litigation challenges facing clients today.

Jordann Conaboy's background as an assistant U.S. attorney in the District of New Jersey, where he prosecuted significant health care fraud cases, and Benjamin McCoy's experience in representing health insurers against fraud operations, underscore their capability to handle high-stakes litigation. Their addition to Stradley Ronon is part of the firm's strategic growth in litigation and related fields, following the recent inclusion of a five-lawyer insurance/reinsurance litigation team in New York and Washington, D.C. This move not only enhances the firm's service offerings but also strengthens its position as a leader in addressing the legal complexities of the health care and managed care industries.

item.title: McCann Systems Expands Team with 11 New Hires to Boost AV Integration Services
item.description:
McCann Systems, a leader in audiovisual integration, has bolstered its team with the addition of 11 skilled professionals, signaling its commitment to delivering top-tier AV experiences and a strong presence at InfoComm 2025 in Orlando. Among the new hires is Will Amos, a Senior Account Executive known for his ability to build client relationships and deliver high-value AV solutions, who will play a key role in the growth of McCannX, the company's experiential AV division. The expansion also includes a new office in Texas, featuring AJ Flores and Pat Seymour, to support the Dallas-Fort Worth area. This strategic growth underscores McCann's dedication to enhancing its technical and operational capabilities, as highlighted by Josh Bittner, SVP of Sales and Marketing, who emphasizes the importance of organic growth and investment in talent to maintain a strong culture and client continuity.

The team's expansion is a testament to McCann Systems' reputation as a premier audiovisual integrator, offering innovative solutions across various sectors. With a focus on immersive technology and exceptional service, McCann continues to set the standard for communication and collaboration enhancements in the AV industry. For more details on their services or to connect with the team at InfoComm 2025, visit mccannsystems.com.

item.title: True Markets Secures $11 Million in Series A Funding to Revolutionize Retail Crypto Trading
item.description:
Cryptocurrency startup True Markets has successfully closed an $11 million Series A funding round, co-led by Boston-based Accomplice and New York-based RRE Ventures, with additional investments from Reciprocal Ventures, Variant, and PayPal Ventures. This funding round elevates the company's total raised capital to $20 million, with previous investments from Paxos Ventures and the Solana Foundation. The New York-based company also announced the launch of its True Markets app on Apple's App Store, offering a stablecoin-native DeFi trading experience exclusively on the Solana blockchain. The app is designed for retail users, emphasizing a non-custodial platform that enhances security by not holding client assets.

Founded by former Coinbase executives Vishal K. Gupta and Patrick McCreary, True Markets aims to revolutionize the trading experience by addressing common issues such as clunky workflows and fragmented liquidity. The platform supports Solana-native assets and utilizes Turnkey's secure key infrastructure to ensure a seamless and secure trading experience. With its innovative approach, True Markets is set to redefine the boundaries of decentralized finance, offering users a fairer, more transparent, and intuitive trading platform.

item.title: FlairAI Ltd Launches Quebius: A New Era in AI-Powered Business Communication
item.description:
FlairAI Ltd has unveiled Quebius, a groundbreaking AI communication platform set to transform business-customer interactions. Unlike conventional chatbots, Quebius employs advanced AI to foster meaningful, context-aware dialogues, enhancing customer satisfaction and cutting costs. Christ Gustafsson, CEO of FlairAI Ltd, emphasizes Quebius's ability to understand and engage, marking a departure from robotic responses to more natural, productive conversations.

The platform offers three main benefits: an improved customer experience through context-aware responses, reduced support costs by automating routine inquiries, and natural conversations that mimic human interaction. Designed for businesses of all sizes, Quebius promises to democratize sophisticated AI communication, making it accessible from startups to Fortune 500 companies. FlairAI Ltd views the launch as the start of a journey to redefine business communication, with plans to expand Quebius's capabilities further. For more details, visit FlairAI.

item.title: Huntington Fine Jewelers Hosts Exclusive Summer Estate Jewelry Trunk Show Across Oklahoma
item.description: Huntington Fine Jewelers, Oklahoma's premier jeweler, is set to dazzle the public with its Summer Estate Jewelry Trunk Show across various locations in the state throughout June. This exclusive event showcases a meticulously curated collection of one-of-a-kind estate jewelry, offering timeless pieces that combine vintage allure with exceptional craftsmanship. Attendees can enjoy significant savings, with all trunk show items available at buy one, get one FREE deals, making it a must-visit for both seasoned collectors and those in search of unique jewelry pieces. The event kicks off in Shawnee on June 3–4, moving through Oklahoma City, Yukon, Norman, Stillwater, and concluding in Midwest City on June 18–20. With limited availability, early RSVP is encouraged to secure access to these extraordinary treasures. For more details, interested parties are advised to contact their nearest Huntington Fine Jewelers location or visit their website for professional jewelry services and an extensive selection of fine jewelry.

item.title: Veritas Global Protection Expands Luxury and Exotic Car Protection Plans Across North America
item.description: Veritas Global Protection, a leader in the vehicle service contract industry, has announced the expansion of its luxury and exotic car protection plans across the United States and Canada. This move is aimed at meeting the unique demands of high-end vehicle owners, offering superior coverage for prestigious automobile brands. The new service contracts are designed for vehicles that require the highest level of performance and care, covering major mechanical and electrical components to protect against costly repairs. With features like 24-hour emergency roadside assistance and rental car coverage, Veritas ensures peace of mind for luxury vehicle owners. The company's reputation for excellence is backed by an A-rated insurer and BBB accreditation, reinforcing its leadership in the high-end vehicle service market. Veritas Global Protection's reputation for excellence is a testament to its commitment to quality and customer satisfaction.

item.title: SunKnowledge Inc. Revolutionizes Prior Authorization in U.S. Healthcare with AI-Driven Solutions
item.description:
SunKnowledge Inc. emerges as a beacon of innovation in the healthcare sector, particularly in Prior Authorization (PA) services, as detailed in their latest industry insight, Prior Authorization Outsourcing: What's Next in 2025 & Beyond. With a focus on AI-driven decision support and payer-provider interoperability, SunKnowledge is revolutionizing PA processes, ensuring same-day authorization initiation and significantly improving approval rates across various medical specialties. The company's spokesperson, Ronnie Hastings, highlights their proactive approach to industry changes, offering scalable and cost-effective solutions that set them apart from competitors.

SunKnowledge's comprehensive suite of services includes real-time PA status updates, a 99.9% accuracy rate, and a remarkable 80% reduction in operational costs, making them a trusted partner for over 100 healthcare clients nationwide. Their expertise extends beyond PA to encompass complete revenue cycle management, medical coding, and virtual medical assistant services, positioning them as a one-stop solution for healthcare providers aiming to enhance administrative efficiency and compliance in an increasingly complex healthcare landscape.

item.title: Laconiko's Olive Oil Triumphs at 2025 Athena International Olive Oil Competition
item.description:
Laconiko, a family-owned producer of premium extra virgin olive oil (EVOO), has achieved remarkable recognition at the Athena International Olive Oil Competition (AIOOC), securing titles such as 'The Best in Greece' and 'Best Koroneiki Olive Oil in the World' for their estate olive oil. The company, known for its single-origin, first-press, early harvest EVOO, also celebrated 15 awards at the 2025 AIOCC, highlighting their excellence in producing both traditional and flavored olive oils like the Laconiko Citrus Habanero Olive Oil. Dino Pierrakos, co-owner, expressed gratitude towards their customers for inspiring innovation and quality. The Koroneiki olive, central to Laconiko's products, is praised for its health benefits, including high polyphenol content that supports heart health and reduces inflammation.

Laconiko's commitment to sustainable practices and blending Greek heritage with American market needs has positioned them as a leader in the olive oil industry. Their story, rooted in family tradition and passion for quality, is a testament to their success. For more information, visit www.laconiko.com.

item.title: Punyam Academy Marks World Accreditation Day 2025 with Exclusive Training Discounts
item.description:
Punyam Academy, a leading online training provider, is celebrating WORLD ACCREDITATION DAY – 2025 by offering a special 10% discount on all System Accreditation Training Courses and documentation Ebooks. This limited-time offer, available until June 10, 2025, requires the use of coupon code WAD2025#P10 during registration. Notably, this year's promotion includes an additional free course access to ISO/IEC 17025:2017 Awareness Training for every enrollment, a benefit previously reserved for group registrations. The offer encompasses a wide range of ISO/IEC accreditation courses and Laboratory Management System courses, catering to professionals across various sectors seeking to enhance their skills in quality management and accreditation standards.

Punyam Academy's courses, including ISO Lead Auditor Training, ISO Internal Auditor Training, and ISO Lead Implementer Training courses, are designed for flexibility, allowing learners to study at their own pace from anywhere. Each course package includes comprehensive learning materials, interactive quizzes, and final exams, with certificates issued online for easy verification. This initiative not only makes professional development more accessible but also supports individuals and organizations in maintaining compliance with international standards, thereby fostering quality and excellence in their operations.

item.title: From Wall Street to Academia: Richard Linowes' Vision for a New Era in Business Education
item.description:
Richard Linowes, the president and founding professor of Clarewood University, recently shared his unique journey from investment banking to academia on Innovator's Journey. Highlighting his diverse experiences in Japan and on Wall Street, Linowes underscored the importance of experiential learning and integrity in shaping the next generation of business leaders. He also pointed out the significance of Clarewood's international student body in fostering cross-cultural exchange, equipping students for the challenges of the global workforce. The segment can be watched here.

Marquis Who's Who®, with a storied history dating back to 1899, continues to spotlight the achievements of distinguished individuals across various fields. Its publications serve as a vital resource for researchers, journalists, and others worldwide. More about their work can be found at www.marquiswhoswho.com.

item.title: Bella Vida Santa Barbara Launches Empowering 'You Are Amazing' Campaign
item.description: Bella Vida Global has launched its "You Are Amazing" campaign, a multi-media initiative under its luxury skincare line, Bella Vida Santa Barbara (BVSB), aimed at inspiring women to embrace their natural beauty. The campaign features a commercial starring Linda Summer and Antonio Lujak, showcasing BVSB's award-winning products like the Brighten Vitamin C Cream and Cocomero Watermelon Glow Serum. The campaign also includes billboard and digital placements, with influencers like Dominique Monroe and Mary Tran amplifying the brand's message of confidence and authenticity. BVSB, a clean, sustainable, and cruelty-free brand, emphasizes wellness, self-care, and environmental responsibility. Founder Erin Schmidt's personal journey and commitment to creating safe, effective skincare products underscore the brand's mission. The campaign is set to expand with a three-part television mini-series in Q4, further promoting the message of self-love and personal beauty. For more details, visit bellavidasb.com.

item.title: TRON DAO Shines at Bitcoin Vegas 2025, Highlighting Blockchain's Financial Future
item.description:
TRON DAO, a community-governed DAO focused on decentralizing the internet through blockchain technology, made a significant impact at Bitcoin 2025 in Las Vegas. As a top-tier sponsor for the America 250 VIP Reception, TRON DAO facilitated high-impact networking among over 800 guests, including key political figures and technology leaders. Justin Sun, TRON's founder, participated in a pivotal panel discussion on the future of financial products in America, highlighting the integration of blockchain with traditional finance. TRON DAO's presence at the event underscored its growing influence in the blockchain sector, especially after surpassing $77.7 billion in circulating supply of Tether (USDT), marking it as the leading blockchain for Tether globally.

The event also featured TRON DAO co-hosting Kraken's Oceanic Night Party and supporting the Bitcoin community at Ross Ulbricht's Welcome Back Luncheon. These activities not only showcased TRON DAO's commitment to fostering innovation and collaboration within the crypto industry but also reinforced its position as a dominant force in the digital asset landscape. With over 309 million user accounts and $23.5 billion in total value locked, TRON's achievements reflect its significant role in advancing blockchain technology and decentralized applications.

item.title: Trillion Energy International Inc. Announces Strategic Debt Settlement Through Share Issuance
item.description:
Trillion Energy International Inc. (CSE: TCF) (OTCQB: TRLEF) has taken a significant step towards financial restructuring by announcing a debt settlement plan. The company will issue 2,237,082 common shares to settle $101,854.10 in outstanding debt owed to consultants and an officer. This move includes 573,002 shares issued to an officer for management services, marking a related-party transaction under Multilateral Instrument 61-101. Trillion Energy is leveraging exemptions from formal valuation and minority shareholder approval, citing the transaction's value is below 25% of its market capitalization. The shares will be subject to a four-month hold period as per Canadian securities laws.

Trillion Energy is a key player in the oil and natural gas sector, focusing on production for Europe and Türkiye. Its portfolio includes a 49% interest in the SASB natural gas field and a 19.6% stake in the Cendere oil field, highlighting its strategic position in the Black Sea natural gas development and oil exploration in S.E. Türkiye. For more details, investors can visit www.sedar.com or the company’s website. The latest updates on TRLEF are available in the company’s newsroom at https://ibn.fm/TRLEF.

item.title: Innovative MedTech Ventures into AI-Driven Entertainment with Ticketbash Acquisition
item.description:
Innovative MedTech, Inc., a health and wellness services provider, has announced a strategic pivot into the AI sports and entertainment industry by acquiring assets from Ticketbash, a ticket servicing company with a proprietary AI software platform. This move signifies a bold shift from its traditional healthcare focus, aiming to leverage Ticketbash's AI technology to bring transparency and efficiency to the ticketing industry. The acquisition includes a complex financial arrangement, with initial and milestone-based payments, and royalties tied to revenue. Innovative MedTech is also considering divesting its healthcare subsidiaries, including SarahCare and its Oral Thrush product, to align with its new direction. The company's CEO, Michael Friedman, highlights the potential for rapid market expansion and new business models through this acquisition, with ongoing negotiations for service deals and joint ventures in the sports industry.

This strategic acquisition not only marks a significant transformation for Innovative MedTech but also positions the company at the forefront of applying AI in the sports and entertainment sectors. The integration of Ticketbash's AI platform is expected to open new verticals and opportunities, reflecting the company's ambition to innovate and lead in its new chosen field. With plans to change its name and symbol to mirror this new business direction, Innovative MedTech is setting the stage for a future where AI-driven solutions redefine the ticketing and entertainment landscape.

item.title: Perfect Moment Ltd. Redefines Luxury Skiwear with Record Digital Engagement and Strategic Expansions
item.description:
Perfect Moment Ltd. (NYSE: PMNT), a luxury ski apparel company, is rapidly gaining popularity among celebrities, influencers, and sports enthusiasts, positioning itself as a formidable competitor to established brands like Canada Goose and Moncler. With a focus on high-performance, stylish ski, swim, and lifestyle apparel, Perfect Moment has achieved record-breaking digital engagement and social media presence, including a 108% increase in unique visitors globally and a social audience reach of 934 million. The brand's collaboration with Johnnie Walker and its expansion into new apparel categories have further amplified its visibility and appeal. Celebrity endorsements from figures like Priyanka Chopra Jonas and strategic partnerships underscore Perfect Moment's growing influence in the luxury apparel market, which is projected to reach $2.9 billion by 2033.

The company's innovative approach to blending fashion with functionality, along with its aggressive marketing strategies, has not only captivated a global audience but also resulted in a 30% increase in wholesale pre-orders for its upcoming Autumn/Winter collection compared to the previous year. This surge in demand highlights Perfect Moment's rising status as a leading brand in performance luxury, with a strong foundation for future growth and market expansion.

item.title: Homewatch CareGivers of Houston Galleria Ranked Top Home Care Provider Nationwide
item.description:
Homewatch CareGivers of Houston Galleria has been recognized as the #1 home care provider in Houston and #7 nationwide by Activated Insights, earning the prestigious 2025 Best of Home Care® – Top 100 Leader in Experience Award. This accolade highlights their exceptional service in in-home senior care in Houston, Texas, underscoring their commitment to compassionate, nurse-guided care. The agency, led by Serhat Bolukbasi and Andrew Harris, has set a new standard in the industry with enhancements like nurse-led oversight, same-day care starts, and specialization in dementia care, post-hospital care, and chronic condition support.

Their dedication to building personal connections and maintaining a trusted reputation has made them a top choice for families in Memorial, River Oaks, West University, Bellaire, Tanglewood, and Greater Houston. With over 100 trained caregivers, Homewatch CareGivers of Houston Galleria is not just a service but a relationship, ensuring every family feels seen, supported, and genuinely cared for.

item.title: AI-Generated Documentary 'Post Truth' Set to Redefine Cinematic Storytelling
item.description:
On May 28, 2025, the groundbreaking documentary Post Truth, the first feature-length film entirely created by artificial intelligence, unveiled its official trailer and poster, sparking significant interest ahead of its theatrical release. This innovative project, spearheaded by artist Alkan Avcıoğlu, delves into the influence of algorithms and digital filters on our perception of reality, presenting a unique cinematic exploration of the post-truth era. Distributed by Baska Sinema, known for its support of independent and daring films, Post Truth is poised to make history as the first AI-generated feature film to hit cinemas, challenging conventional storytelling and opening new discussions on AI's role in creative processes.

The film has already captured the attention of both the artistic and tech communities, as well as the broader film industry, for its pioneering approach to narrative and visual storytelling. With its theatrical debut on the horizon, anticipation builds for further announcements regarding its international festival journey, marking a pivotal moment in the evolution of filmmaking and the integration of AI into creative arts.

item.title: From Truck Driver to Eco-Conscious Entrepreneur: The Story of Discard Junk Removal
item.description: Gabriel Torres, a former long-haul truck driver, transformed his life and career by founding Discard Junk Removal in Sacramento, California. This family-operated business not only offers comprehensive junk removal services but also focuses on community support and environmental sustainability. With services ranging from residential cleanouts to specialized hoarder cleanup in Sacramento, Discard Junk Removal stands out for its commitment to quality, customer satisfaction, and eco-friendly practices. item.title: LinkRocket Launches Credit-Based Backlink Exchange Platform for Home Service Businesses
item.description: LinkRocket, a pioneering platform, has unveiled its credit-based backlink exchange specifically designed for home service businesses, aiming to revolutionize local SEO strategies. This innovative solution allows businesses such as roofers, plumbers, and HVAC technicians to earn credits by creating backlinks for peers within the network, which can then be used to secure backlinks for their own sites. The platform not only facilitates a mutual backlink exchange but also offers a comprehensive local SEO toolkit, including a Rank Tracker, AI Content Writer, and a Backlink Marketplace, all tailored to simplify SEO for non-experts. By focusing on non-competing markets and relevant businesses, LinkRocket ensures that home service providers can improve their Google rankings safely and effectively. Discover more at LinkRocket.ai.

item.title: SureShotFX Revolutionizes Forex Trading with Free Live Signals Service
item.description:

This service is designed to empower traders by providing expert-generated signals that include entry prices, stop-loss levels, and take-profit targets, all based on a blend of technical and fundamental analysis. The initiative aims to democratize access to professional trading tools, enabling both novice and experienced traders to make informed decisions swiftly, without the burden of subscription costs or hidden fees.

The service stands out for its user-friendly platform, comprehensive market coverage, and 24/7 client support, ensuring traders can diversify their portfolios and enhance their trading strategies with ease. SureShotFX's commitment to accessibility and education in trading is evident in their offering, which also includes an option to upgrade to premium signals for those seeking advanced features. With over 51,000 traders trusting SureShotFX and a 4.4-star rating on Trustpilot, the company reinforces its position as a leader in the trading community, dedicated to improving trading performance through accurate signals and exceptional customer service.

This integration is a testament to the growing trend of adopting technology to gain a competitive edge in the fast-evolving real estate market. For more details, visit Mojo Sells.

Amidst a landscape where private equity firms like Goldman Sachs and TurnPoint Services are acquiring local brands, Royal Class Service stands out for its customer satisfaction, cultural alignment, and independent ownership. The report highlights the company's commitment to trust, responsiveness, and local accountability, values that are increasingly rare in an industry dominated by national investment portfolios.

Royal Class Service offers a comprehensive range of home services, including plumbing, heating, air conditioning, and indoor air quality solutions, all backed by a customer-first culture. item.title: Holdings Financial Technologies Inc. Revolutionizes SMB Financial Management with Integrated Accounting and Bookkeeping Features

item.title: Distinct Plumbing & Gas Fitting: A Model of Community-Centric Service in Salisbury
item.description:
Distinct Plumbing & Gas Fitting, a trusted plumber in Salisbury, offers fast, professional, and affordable plumbing services to both residential and commercial clients in Salisbury and the northern suburbs of Adelaide. Specializing in everything from routine maintenance to urgent plumbing emergencies, their services include dealing with blocked drains, hot water system installations, and gas fitting. The company prides itself on being fully licensed and insured, offering transparent pricing, and providing prompt and reliable service, including 24/7 emergency plumbing assistance. Their commitment to quality, safety, and customer satisfaction is reflected in their 5-star Google rating and positive client feedback.

Located at 104 Brown Terrace, Salisbury, Distinct Plumbing & Gas Fitting is conveniently situated for quick response times across the northern suburbs. They emphasize the importance of choosing a local plumber for faster response times, familiarity with local plumbing infrastructure, and building long-term community trust. Whether for residential needs like leaking tap repairs and bathroom renovations or commercial services such as grease trap maintenance and compliance audits, Distinct Plumbing & Gas Fitting stands out as a reliable choice for plumbing services in Salisbury.

item.title: Advancements in Virtual Care and RPM Highlight Need for Balance to Combat Clinician Burnout
item.description: Kent E. Dicks, a pioneer in digital health and CEO of Life365, is at the forefront of transforming healthcare through virtual-first care platforms. Life365, under Dicks' leadership, has secured a significant subcontract with the U.S. Department of Veterans Affairs to provide remote patient monitoring (RPM) services, showcasing the potential of digital health innovations. Despite the advancements in virtual care and RPM, clinician burnout remains a pressing issue, exacerbated by the increased documentation and data management demands. Patients, while generally supportive of at-home monitoring, face challenges related to the complexity and usability of these technologies, particularly among older adults and rural residents. Dicks advocates for 'invisible' healthcare technology that integrates seamlessly into care processes, minimizing friction for both patients and clinicians. The key to successful virtual care programs lies in starting small, scaling thoughtfully, and ensuring technology enhances rather than complicates care delivery. The benefits of getting virtual care right include reduced hospitalizations, lower costs, and empowered patients, ultimately leading to higher satisfaction and better health outcomes.

item.title: Blend360's Strategic AI Innovations Under Ozgur Dogan's Leadership Transform Business Outcomes
item.description:
Ozgur Dogan, President of Services and Solution Lines at Blend, shares insights into his journey and the company's innovative approach to AI, data, and technology solutions in a comprehensive Q&A. With over two decades of experience, Dogan emphasizes Blend's hands-on methodology in delivering real business impact through AI, distinguishing the company from others stuck in 'pilot purgatory.' Blend's unique framework, the Critical 7, aims to increase the success rate of AI initiatives by focusing on practical deployment and scalability. Dogan also highlights emerging trends in the industry, such as agentic systems and the convergence of digital and physical worlds, and how Blend is positioned to help clients lead these changes. The company's impact spans across industries like financial services and TMT, with a strong emphasis on building high-performing teams and fostering a culture of innovation and collaboration.

Blend's recent milestones include global expansion, strategic partnerships, and crossing 1,000 employees worldwide, underscoring its growth and commitment to delivering scalable, production-ready AI solutions. Dogan's advice to leaders focuses on the importance of aligning AI initiatives with business strategy to drive measurable value quickly, leveraging Blend's Critical 7 framework to navigate the complexities of AI implementation and scale.

item.title: Exploring the Intersection of Art and Architecture in 'Art in Residence'
item.description: Art in Residence, a captivating exploration by Nicole England, delves into the world of homes that are as much about the art they contain as their architectural design. Featuring 22 unique residences from an industrial artist's studio in New York to a modern coastal retreat in Victoria, Australia, the book showcases how art and personal collections transform living spaces into narratives of creativity and identity. Nicole England, a Melbourne-based photographer renowned for her work in architecture and interiors, brings these spaces to life through her award-winning photography and intimate interviews with the homeowners. The book also highlights the contributions of Pol Theis, founder of P&T Interiors LLC, whose bespoke residential designs reflect the eclectic yet cohesive style that makes each space uniquely personal.

The global mining industry is at a crossroads, with the urgent demands of energy transition, resource security, and decarbonization driving unprecedented changes.
