With unique features like MAXCatalyst™ and TriBsyn™, Pre-Workout MAX sets a new standard in the industry.

item.title: Summit Restoration CEO Raymond Tahhan Joins Forbes Business Council, Elevating Industry Leadership
item.description: Raymond Tahhan, CEO of Summit Restoration, has been accepted into the Forbes Business Council, a prestigious organization for successful business owners and leaders. Tahhan was chosen based on his experience and achievements, allowing him access to exclusive networking opportunities and the chance to share his expertise on Forbes.com.

item.title: Mitesco, Inc. Announces Strategic Developments and Board Appointment to Drive Growth in Data Center and AI Technologies
item.description: Mitesco, Inc. provides an update on its data center and cloud computing unit, Centcore, as well as its Vero Technology Ventures activities. The company has expanded its board of directors with the addition of Jim Clifton, who brings valuable experience in technology, software, data center hardware, and real estate. Centcore’s data center business unit has introduced a value-added reseller group to enhance its market approach, while Vero Technology Ventures focuses on cloud computing software solutions and the development of a Robo Agent A.I. application.

item.title: Amazon and The New York Times Forge Pioneering AI Content Partnership
item.description: Amazon.com and The New York Times Co. have entered into a multi-year licensing agreement, allowing Amazon to use NYT content in its AI products. This deal marks the Times’ first venture into generative AI partnerships. The agreement permits Amazon to display summaries and excerpts of NYT content to train its AI models.

item.title: Match Group's Strategic Realignments Spark Investor Confidence Amid Digital Dating Boom
item.description: Match Group (NASDAQ: MTCH), the parent company of popular dating platforms like Tinder and Hinge, is gaining investor interest with positive analyst assessments despite a revenue decline. The company reported an 18% EPS beat and analysts revised their EPS estimates upward to $3.38 for the year. With a Zacks Rank of #1, Match Group's stock is trading at $30.13 as of May 29, 2025.

item.title: Sprout Social Inc. Garners Analyst Confidence Amid Market Challenges
item.description: Sprout Social (NASDAQ: SPT), a leading provider of cloud-based social media management solutions, receives a reiterated ‘Buy’ rating from Needham analyst Scott Berg with a price target of $32.00. Despite a recent stock decline, Sprout’s Q1 2025 performance showcases resilience with a 13% revenue increase and record operating margin. The company’s innovative platform adds value to managing complex brand portfolios.

item.title: Tiny Ltd. Expands into Audio Software Industry with Strategic Acquisition of Serato Audio Research
item.description: Roth Canada acts as the exclusive financial advisor to Tiny Ltd. on the acquisition of a majority stake in Serato Audio Research. The deal is valued at US$66 million and includes a mix of cash and common shares. In addition, Roth Canada facilitates a bought deal public offering and private placement of convertible debentures to finance the transaction.

item.title: D-Wave Quantum Inc. Reports 509% Revenue Surge in Q1 2025, Marking a Milestone in Quantum Computing Adoption
item.description: D-Wave reported a significant increase in Q1 2025 revenue, reaching $15 million, a 509% year-over-year growth. The surge was attributed to the sale of an Advantage(TM) quantum system to the Jülich Supercomputing Centre in Germany. CEO Dr. Alan Baratz credited the recent quantum supremacy demonstration for influencing the sale and attracting global attention.

item.title: Irish High Court Ruling on Reddit and Tumblr Sets Precedent for Digital Platform Regulation
item.description:
The High Court in Ireland has rejected legal challenges from Reddit and Tumblr, upholding the country’s media authority's classification of them as video-sharing platform services (VSPS). This ruling may have implications for other platforms like Rumble Inc. (NASDAQ: RUM) that offer video content.

BillionDollarClub, a communications platform focusing on major companies, covers this news and provides a wide array of corporate communication solutions for clients looking to reach a broad audience.

item.title: Four Seasons Unveils Luxury Residential Project in Miami's Coconut Grove
item.description:
The first private residence of the Four Seasons in Coconut Grove, Miami, developed by CMC Group and Fort Partners, offers a unique living experience connected to nature and the history of the place. The elegant 20-story building boasts 70 residences with a design inspired by the Grove’s landscape and a focus on wellness with a European signature.

Renowned Italian designer Michele Bönan will lead the interior design, creating a home where luxury feels natural. The project celebrates the neighborhood's past as Miami’s oldest neighborhood, multicultural heritage, and vibrant cultural scene, offering a lifestyle that makes Coconut Grove unique.

item.title: Brera Holdings PLC and Toronto Blizzard Corp. Forge Global Youth Soccer Development Partnership
item.description: Brera Holdings (NASDAQ: BREA) has entered into a new advisory agreement with Toronto Blizzard Corp. to launch an international grassroots development initiative for youth players. The program will integrate Blizzard’s academy system with Brera’s professional club network across Europe, Asia, and Africa, providing global pathways to the professional ranks. Soccer Hall of Famer Giuseppe “Joe” Parolini will serve as Brera’s Academy Sports Director, North America.

item.title: Arkansas Approves Landmark Lithium Royalty Rate, Paving the Way for Domestic Production
item.description: Standard Lithium (NYSE American: SLI), in partnership with Equinor, received approval for a 2.5% lithium royalty rate for the Reynolds Unit in Phase I of its South West Arkansas Project. This milestone sets a precedent for future lithium projects in Arkansas, with a total compensation of approximately 3% to brine owners. The project aims for annual production of 22,500 tonnes of battery-grade lithium carbonate by 2028.

item.title: Vivakor, Inc. Reports Stellar Q1 2025 Financial Growth with Strategic Acquisitions Driving Revenue
item.description: Vivakor (NASDAQ: VIVK) reported a 133% year-over-year revenue increase to $37.3 million and a 345% jump in gross profit to $4.8 million for the first quarter of 2025, driven by contributions from its recently acquired Endeavor Entities. Despite a net loss of $7.5 million, the company posted positive adjusted EBITDA of $319,000 and maintains strong momentum in its core logistics and terminaling businesses. CEO James Ballengee anticipates a record year in 2025 as contracted assets reach peak revenue levels and expansion plans are underway.

item.title: SKYX Platforms Corp. Set to Transform Smart Home Technology with Major Miami Project and Stock Market Inclusion
item.description:
SKYX Platforms (NASDAQ: SKYX) will deploy over 500,000 smart home devices in a $3 billion mixed-use development in Miami’s Little River District as the exclusive smart home infrastructure provider. The company is set to be included in the Russell 2000(R) and Russell 3000(R) Indexes. SKYX reported record Q1 revenue of $20.1 million and reaffirmed its outlook for second-half cash flow positivity.

SKYX Platforms Corp. focuses on making homes and buildings safe, advanced, and smart with disruptive platform technologies. The company holds over 97 U.S. and global patents and aims to enhance safety and lifestyle. For more information, visit their website at https://skyplug.com or follow them on LinkedIn.

item.title: Ucore Rare Metals Inc. Launches Strategic Metals Complex in Louisiana to Bolster Domestic Rare Earth Production
item.description: Ucore Rare Metals (TSXV: UCU) (OTCQX: UURAF) will host a ground-breaking ceremony for its Louisiana Strategic Metals Complex, using RapidSX(TM) technology to produce rare earth oxides critical for various applications. Supported by a US$18.4 million U.S. Department of Defense grant and a US$15+ million Louisiana incentive package, this project is a significant step towards developing a secure domestic rare earth supply chain.

item.title: Jive PR + Digital Expands Portfolio with High-Profile Clients, Showcasing Innovative Marketing Strategies
item.description:
Jive PR + Digital, an award-winning agency, announces new client accounts and culture-driving campaigns. Their approach combines storytelling with Performance PR, cultural relevancy, and digital authority, driving real business results. Recent signings include Benestar Brands' Mac's Pork Rinds, Splitsville, Herbal Magic, and Caitlyn Minimalist, aligning with Jive's focus on integrated campaigns that increase revenue and shape culture.

Jive PR + Digital's key achievements include securing over 200 media placements for Edelman Fossil Park & Museum, achieving a 640% ROI for Activate's Austin launch, and lifting brand recall for Mac's Pork Rinds across the Southwest. These results highlight the importance of Performance PR, cultural relevance, and digital authority in driving measurable results across the full funnel.

For more information, visit jiveprdigital.com.

item.title: ECGI Holdings Launches Uplist Ventures to Support Sustainable Startup Growth
item.description:
ECGI Holdings (OTC: ECGI) has launched Uplist Ventures, a new initiative targeting overlooked, revenue-generating startups with long-term public market potential. The focus is on companies with solid fundamentals but bypassed by traditional venture firms seeking unsustainable growth. The initiative offers a strategic path to liquidity, regulatory support, and operational guidance, with initial sector targets including AI, SaaS, healthcare tech, vertical software, and blockchain.

ECGI Holdings Inc., a diversified holding company, owns a vineyard specializing in Petite Sirah wine and has investments in luxury fashion. The company aims to transform startups into future public entities aligned with shareholder value creation. Uplist Ventures leverages ECGI's public company status to provide support and guidance for startups looking to enter the public market.

item.title: Perfect Moment Ltd. and BWT Alpine Formula One Team Unveil High-Speed Racing and Alpine Sports Clothing Collection
item.description: Formula 1's popularity is skyrocketing in the US, with a 10.5% fanbase growth between 2023 and 2024, thanks to media exposure and cultural relevance. The U.S. now has over 52 million F1 fans, making it the fastest-growing market worldwide. Perfect Moment Ltd. is collaborating with BWT Alpine Formula One Team to launch a special-edition collection blending ski lifestyle with racing performance.

item.title: Troy University Partners with TheLinkU to Empower Student-Athletes in the NIL Era
item.description:
TheLinkU partners with Trojans Together Collective and Troy University to maximize NIL opportunities for student-athletes. The partnership includes access to a suite of services such as brand partnerships, revenue modeling software, NIL marketplace, and more. TheLinkU also fosters sustainable revenue generation for universities through strategic business partnerships.

Founders Chuck Carson and Jason Jones express gratitude for the support provided to Troy University student-athletes. TheLinkU's founder, Austin Elrod, emphasizes the goal of equipping student-athletes and athletic departments for success in the NIL space. The partnership aims to enhance student-athletes' personal brands and diversify NIL offerings to attract top recruits.

item.title: Beeline Holdings Introduces AI Sales Agent to Revolutionize Mortgage Lead Conversion
item.description: Beeline Holdings announced the launch of MagicBlocks’ One-Click AI Sales Agent tool for mortgage lenders and brokers, enabling quick deployment of intelligent sales agents on websites. The AI assistant engages visitors, qualifies leads, and boosts conversions without technical expertise. Beeline expands its offerings to support top-of-funnel growth for the mortgage industry beyond origination.

item.title: Mullen Automotive Announces 1-for-100 Reverse Stock Split to Maintain Nasdaq Listing
item.description:
Mullen Automotive (NASDAQ: MULN) announced a 1-for-100 reverse stock split to regain compliance with Nasdaq's bid price requirement. The split will reduce outstanding shares from 80 million to 800,000, with trading under the same ticker symbol.

About Mullen Automotive Inc.: A Southern California-based company building commercial EVs, Mullen received IRS approval for federal EV tax credits on its vehicles and expanded its dealer network.

About GreenCarStocks: A platform focused on EVs and green energy, offering various communication solutions for companies to reach a wide audience.

item.title: Strategic Partnership Aims to Boost Green Hydrogen Production in Iberia
item.description:
Fusion Fuel Green (Nasdaq: HTOO) announced a strategic agency and partnership agreement with Sungrow Hydrogen through its subsidiary, BrightHy Solutions, to accelerate green hydrogen production in Iberia. BrightHy will act as an agent for Sungrow's electrolysis equipment, combining regional engineering capabilities with Sungrow's innovations to provide tailored hydrogen solutions for industrial and energy applications.

This partnership builds on existing joint projects and aims to drive the deployment of green hydrogen production technologies across Iberia. To view the full press release, visit here.

item.title: NANO Nuclear Energy Inc. Secures $105 Million to Fuel Microreactor Development and Space Applications
item.description:
NANO Nuclear Energy (NASDAQ: NNE) has secured a $105 million private placement deal with institutional investors, selling nearly 4 million shares of common stock at $27.00 each. The financing involves participation from key institutions, raising the company's cash position to over $200 million for advancing micro nuclear reactor programs and other energy ventures.

The company's developments include a range of advanced nuclear technologies, such as the KRONOS MMR Energy System, ZEUS solid core battery reactor, and ODIN low-pressure coolant reactor. Subsidiaries like Advanced Fuel Transportation Inc. and HALEU Energy Fuel Inc. are also working on innovative fuel transportation and fabrication projects.

item.title: ONAR Holding Corp's Innovative Marketing Strategy Targets Middle-Market Growth
item.description: ONAR (OTCQB: ONAR) CEO Claude Zdanow discussed the company's mission to help middle-market businesses with AI-powered marketing solutions in a recent TechMediaWire Podcast. Zdanow highlighted ONAR's two main verticals, Storia for digital marketing and Of Kos for B2B healthcare clients, leveraging advanced technology for client growth. The company focuses on providing tailored marketing strategies for measurable business outcomes.

item.title: Infrastructure Capital Small Cap Income ETF (SCAP) Outperforms in Turbulent Market
item.description: President Donald Trump’s Liberation Day initiative, which included new tariffs, caused a 2.7% drop in the Dow Jones Industrial Average, impacting small-cap companies disproportionately. The Infrastructure Capital Small Cap Income ETF (SCAP) by Infrastructure Capital Advisors offers a contrarian approach, outperforming the Russell 2000 index in recent months despite market volatility. Analysts suggest that a policy reversal on tariffs could lead to a small-cap rebound, making SCAP a relevant investment option.

item.title: Sky Harbour Group Reports 133% Revenue Surge in Q1 2025, Expands Aviation Infrastructure
item.description:
Sky Harbour Group Corp. (NYSE: SKYH) continues to demonstrate strong momentum in 1Q25 with expanding aviation infrastructure footprint and operational capacity. The company initiated operations at various campuses and added new facilities, positioning itself for significant long-term growth.

During 1Q25, SKYH reported total revenue growth of 133% driven by new lease commencements and acquisitions. The company expanded its infrastructure pipeline, finalized new ground leases, and progressed with construction across multiple sites. Despite some margin and profitability challenges, management reiterated its guidance for achieving breakeven cash flow and adjusted EBITDA by year-end.

item.title: VueReal and ACA TMetrix Partnership Set to Revolutionize MicroLED Technology Adoption in Canada
item.description: VueReal partners with ACA TMetrix to distribute Reference Design Kits (RDKs) and microLED evaluation platforms in Canada, accelerating the adoption of next-generation display technologies in automotive, defense, and consumer electronics markets. VueReal's MicroSolid Printing™ platform offers breakthrough solutions in microLED and micro semiconductor manufacturing, enabling high yield, scalability, and cost efficiency.

item.title: Comcast's Fiber Internet Expansion to Revolutionize Bryan-College Station Connectivity
item.description:
Comcast will connect 70,000 new homes and businesses in Bryan-College Station to fast, secure and reliable, fiber Internet. This expansion into the region will enhance digital infrastructure, promote economic growth and position residents and local businesses for success in an increasingly digital world. The multi-year network expansion brings Xfinity and Comcast Business Internet, mobile, entertainment and security services to the two cities for the first time.

The multiphase project includes building a new technology hub that will act as “the brain” of the network, supporting all Xfinity and Comcast Business services. Comcast will also install more than 1,000 miles of fiber lines – enough to span the distance from the Brazos Valley to Universal Studios in Florida. The tech leader also plans to open an interactive Xfinity retail store, which will be announced later.

"Bryan-College Station is a hotbed for innovative technology, and this investment by Comcast will help our region stay competitive,” College Station Mayor John Nichols said. “Reliable broadband access is essential for our growing community, from the tens of thousands of Aggie students who call College Station home to our creative business community. Investing in strong connectivity ensures everyone has the advanced resources they need to thrive in a digital world."

“We are grateful that Comcast is making this multimillion-dollar fiber infrastructure investment in our community,” City of Bryan Mayor Bobby Guiterrez said. “This investment in connectivity strengthens our local economy and helps our residents thrive. Expanding reliable high-speed Internet in Bryan will open doors for students, businesses and families. It will enhance opportunities and improve quality of life.”

Residents can visit ComcastTexas.com/BCS for additional details on construction expectations and upcoming service availability. Portions of the project are currently under construction. Comcast’s most recent expansion to Bryan-College Station is part of the company’s $1.6 billion investment in technology and infrastructure in Texas over the last three years.

“Expanding fiber Internet in communities like Bryan-College Station will be a catalyst for economic growth, enhancing educational opportunities and helping residents and businesses have the tools they need to thrive in the digital age,” Nicolas Jimenez, Comcast’s General Market Manager of Bryan-College Station said. “By investing in the infrastructure and connectivity of these communities, we’re empowering individuals and businesses to succeed and pave the way for a brighter, more connected future."

A Network You Can Trust to be Reliable, Fast and Secure

Comcast’s state-of-the-art network is built to enable residents and businesses to thrive in today’s constantly connected world. Bryan-College Station joins the 64 million homes and businesses across the country to have access to a network that is trusted by essential community organizations like hospitals, schools, transportation systems and first responders, and federal agencies like the Department of Defense. It delivers multi-gigabit Internet speeds, 99.9 percent reliability and security built in from the ground up to keep customers safe from cyber threats.

Introducing Xfinity to Consumers

Comcast’s residential services are marketed under the Xfinity brand. Consumers in Bryan-College Station will be able to take advantage of the full suite of Xfinity products: Internet, video, mobile, voice and home security. Xfinity offers multi-gigabit Internet speeds, powerful WiFi that reaches every corner of the home, and super-responsive, low-lag connections. Xfinity customers can enjoy a reliable, high-speed experience—whether they’re streaming sports and entertainment, video chatting with friends and coworkers, learning from home or simply browsing online.

Comcast Business to Power Bryan-College Station’s Workforce

For local businesses, Comcast Business offers a suite of connectivity, communications, networking, mobile, security, wireless, and managed solutions to help organizations of all sizes achieve their business goals. Industry analysts and associations have consistently recognized Comcast Business as a leader and innovator in flexible, scalable options as well as one of the fastest-growing providers of Ethernet services.

Serving Everyone in the Bryan-College Station Community

Comcast’s commitment to communities goes beyond building the network and aims to increase economic mobility for the local community and its residents. That’s why Comcast created Internet Essentials, a broadband adoption program that offers eligible households low-cost, high-speed Internet and affordable computers.

Comcast Corporation (Nasdaq: CMCSA) is a global media and technology company. From the connectivity and platforms, we provide, to the content and experiences we create, our businesses reach hundreds of millions of customers, viewers, and guests worldwide. We deliver world-class broadband, wireless, and video through Xfinity, Comcast Business, and Sky; produce, distribute, and stream leading entertainment, sports, and news through brands including NBC, Telemundo, Universal, Peacock, and Sky; and bring incredible theme parks and attractions to life through Universal Destinations & Experiences. Visit www.comcastcorporation.com for more information.

Contact Details

+1 832-942-1131

Taisha_Walker@comcast.com

Company Website

https://ComcastTexas.com/BCS

item.title: Glowissima: A New Clean Skincare Brand Redefining Beauty Standards with Nature-Inspired Products
item.description: Glowissima, a new clean skincare brand, has been launched by Cynthia Bailey and Dana Hill-Robinson. The brand focuses on empowering individuals to glow naturally with formulas sourced from New Zealand. The debut collection includes Miracle Elixir Face Oil and Ultimate Radiance Face Cream.

item.title: Dubai's Car Garage Expert Enhances Vehicle Longevity with Specialized Oil Change Services
item.description:
Car Garage Expert offers top-quality car engine oil change services in Dubai, performed by skilled technicians using premium-grade oils. The goal is to enhance vehicle performance, fuel efficiency, and longevity, providing a hassle-free experience for customers.

With Dubai's driving conditions, maintaining engine health is crucial. The expert team at Car Garage Expert ensures quick, reliable, and affordable oil change services tailored to specific vehicle needs.

item.title: Dubai's Car Garage Expert Revolutionizes Automotive Care with Advanced Restoration Services
item.description: Car Garage Expert in Dubai is revolutionizing automotive care with its top-notch car body shop and detailing services, catering to a wide range of vehicle repair and enhancement needs. Led by CEO Mian Muhammad Fahad Malik, the company prides itself on using premium products and cutting-edge equipment to deliver exceptional results, from minor touch-ups to full-body restorations.

item.title: Primi Digital Launches Vendi360: A Game-Changer in Smart Vending Technology
item.description: Primi Digital introduces Vendi360, a cutting-edge platform combining Smart Vending Software and full-service support for a seamless vending experience. The system offers end-to-end payment support, custom branding, AI-driven inventory intelligence, actionable analytics, and reliable 24/7 support. Vendi360 transforms automated retail by delivering modern vending encounters that adapt to user behaviors and location needs.

item.title: UniFab Introduces AI-Powered Subtitle Generator to Streamline Global Content Creation
item.description: UniFab launches the full version of its Subtitle Generator AI, a desktop tool offering fast, accurate subtitle creation and translation. The tool supports over 30 languages and provides edit-ready subtitles for easy embedding. This release solidifies UniFab as a go-to solution for AI-powered video editing.

item.title: Illuminated and Classic Signage Trends Set to Transform Business Branding in 2025
item.description: Front Signs, a leading sign maker in Burbank, California, highlights the importance of business signage in boosting brand recognition and visibility. The company emphasizes the use of durable light-up signs like light box signs to attract customers and convey business information effectively. With advances in building signage technology, businesses can now upgrade to illuminated displays for a stylish and timeless look.

item.title: Mango AI Revolutionizes Digital Content Creation with Free Voice Cloning Tool
item.description: Mango AI introduces a free voice cloning tool powered by advanced artificial intelligence, allowing users to create highly realistic digital voice replicas with emotional nuance and clarity. This innovation eliminates the need for expensive recording studios or professional gear, making voice creation accessible to all. The AI-generated voices offer emotional depth, accent variety, and support for multiple languages, revolutionizing audio content creation.

item.title: Opus Virtual Offices Empowers Entrepreneurs to Scale Businesses with Minimal Overhead
item.description: Business coaches nationwide are leveraging Opus Virtual Offices to help clients grow efficiently. Opus, with over 650 locations, enables entrepreneurs to establish credibility and expand into new markets affordably. One attorney expanded his firm to Orlando using Opus, showcasing the platform’s effectiveness in building local presence.

item.title: Peoples Financial Corporation Announces Semi-Annual Dividend, Showcasing Financial Strength
item.description: Peoples Financial Corporation, parent of The Peoples Bank, declared a regular semi-annual cash dividend of $0.18 per common share. Chairman and CEO, Chevis C. Swetman, expressed satisfaction with the financial progress and commitment to shareholders. The Company, founded in 1896, operates 18 bank facilities along the Mississippi Gulf Coast, providing a range of banking and investment services.

item.title: ESGold Corp. Advances Montauban Project with Innovative Gravity Separation Technology
item.description: ESGold, a pre-production resource company focused on clean mining innovation, delivered its Humphrey spiral concentrators to the Montauban site in Quebec, completing the gravity separation circuit for gold and silver recovery. CEO Paul Mastantuono highlighted the milestone, with construction progressing on schedule for first production by year-end 2025. ESGold also plans to release an updated PEA and a 3D geological model. The company's progress was presented alongside strong Q1 2025 results from Canadian gold peers.

item.title: Perfect Moment Ltd Strengthens Leadership Team to Navigate Luxury Fashion's Future
item.description:
Perfect Moment Ltd is strategically positioning itself in the luxury fashion and goods segment to capitalize on potential growth opportunities despite a slowdown in demand in the industry. The company is focusing on cutting through the clutter with precision and momentum to cater to global consumer trends.

By hiring industry insiders like Chath Weerasinghe and Vittorio Giacomelli from Canada Goose International AG, Perfect Moment aims to enhance its operational efficiency and profitability. The company is also expanding its global footprint with new sales agencies in Southern Europe and Japan to ensure exclusivity in the market.

item.title: Bioadaptives Inc's Regen Dog Chews Show Promising Results in Enhancing Canine Health Through Stem Cell Stimulation
item.description: Bioadaptives (BDPT), through its premium pet wellness division PawPa(TM), announced compelling clinical results for its flagship product Regen(TM) Dog Chews, formulated to naturally stimulate stem cell release and support canine vitality, mobility, and comfort. In veterinarian-led trials, Regen demonstrated a 281.3% increase in circulating stem cells after four weeks. Crafted with all-natural ingredients including beneficial cyanobacteria and adaptogens, Regen(TM) is veterinarian-recommended, safe, and delivered in a tasty chew dogs love.

item.title: Velocity Global Strengthens Leadership with New CFO to Drive Global Expansion
item.description: Velocity Global, the leading provider of Employer of Record (EOR), announced the appointment of James Loftus as Chief Financial Officer. Loftus brings over 20 years of experience in fintech, M&A, and venture capital, previously serving as Managing Partner at PayPal Ventures. With a focus on empowering growing companies with insights on building and scaling global teams, Velocity Global aims to continue delivering seamless, compliant solutions worldwide.

item.title: AI's Transformative Role in Communications to Be Explored at Upcoming Conference
item.description: Tiffany Guarnaccia, Founder and CEO of Kite Hill, will be speaking at the AI for Communicators conference to share insights on AI’s impact on communications. The session will cover leveraging AI for earned media amplification and the importance of integrated communications and staying agile in dynamic environments. Kite Hill, an award-winning integrated communications agency, brings a unique perspective to AI in communications with experience in partnering with AI-driven startups.

item.title: Vivakor Inc. Redefines Sustainability in the Oil and Gas Industry with Record Financial Growth
item.description: Vivakor (NASDAQ: VIVK) reported remarkable growth in its 2024 full-year and fourth-quarter financial results, with Q4 revenue increasing 201% YOY. The company completed additional gathering lines and acquired Endeavor Entities, showcasing its success in environmentally conscious oilfield operations.

item.title: Newton Golf Company Reports Stellar Q1 2025 Performance with 246% Revenue Growth
item.description: Newton Golf Company (NASDAQ: NWTG) has reported a significant three-figure revenue growth in the first quarter of 2025, with revenue increasing by 246% year-over-year. The adoption of the Newton Motion shaft has surpassed 30 professionals, reflecting the success of the company's latest product offerings. The company has forecasted its revenue guidance for 2025 to range between $6.5 and $7 million.

item.title: West Lane Partners Strengthens Leadership with Addition of Rita Sallis as Senior Advisor
item.description: West Lane Partners announces the addition of Rita Sallis as a Senior Advisor, citing her extensive experience in finance, including managing New York City's pension system and navigating financial crises. Sallis brings a wealth of knowledge in institutional investment, public finance, and private equity to the firm, aligning with its mission of identifying and executing on special situations in the middle market.

item.title: Lahontan Gold Corp. Enhances Market Presence with Strategic Communications Partnership
item.description: Lahontan Gold Corp. has enlisted IBN to handle its corporate communications as it progresses with gold and silver projects in Nevada’s Walker Lane district. With a focus on extracting value from past-producing sites, Lahontan aims for near-term production through cost-effective strategies. IBN will leverage its extensive distribution network to enhance visibility and engagement with investors and the media.

item.title: Senate Blocks California's Electric Vehicle Mandate, Impacting Clean Energy Goals
item.description: The United States Senate has blocked a landmark California electric vehicle mandate that would have required the state to phase out gas-powered vehicles in favor of battery electric vehicles (BEVs). Although California already has the largest fleet of BEVs in the U.S., the mandate aimed to accelerate electrification by pressuring carmakers to develop more EV models. This decision may impact green energy ecosystem players like SolarBank Corp. (NASDAQ: SUUN) (Cboe CA: SUNN) (FSE: GY2) as they rethink their market strategies.

item.title: Klarna Reevaluates AI Strategy After Customer Support Shortfalls
item.description:
Klarna’s CEO, Sebastian Siemiatkowski, admits heavy reliance on AI for customer support led to a drop in service quality. D-Wave Quantum Inc. is mentioned as an AI firm in the news.

AINewsWire focuses on AI advancements and is part of the Dynamic Brand Portfolio by IBN, providing various corporate communication solutions.

item.title: Newton Golf Regains Nasdaq Compliance Amidst Record Financial Performance
item.description: Newton Golf Company (NASDAQ: NWTG) announced it has regained compliance with Nasdaq Listing Rule 5550(b)(1) after reporting $6.2 million in stockholders’ equity in its Q1 2025 10-Q filing. The Nasdaq confirmation closes a compliance matter originally raised in April. Executive Chairman Greg Campbell credited the resolution to the company’s financial strength and growing market traction. Newton Golf posted 246% year-over-year revenue growth in Q1 2025, with gross margins reaching 70%, driven by rising adoption of its Newton Motion shaft across retail channels and pro tours.

item.title: Iteris Inc. Pioneers Connected Vehicle Technology with AI-Powered Solutions
item.description: In a world where connected vehicles are becoming a reality, Iteris Inc. is at the forefront of shaping the movement with its advanced technology. The company's V2X Connect software application and VantageARGUS CV suite are revolutionizing traffic management and safety. With a prediction that the market for connected vehicles will reach $446.6 billion by 2033, Iteris is leading the way with hardware and software solutions that are set to transform the transportation industry.

item.title: Healthcare Triangle, Inc. Secures $1 Million in Strategic Contracts, Expands AI and EHR Integration Services
item.description:
Healthcare Triangle, Inc. (Nasdaq: HCTI) announced new multi-year strategic contracts worth $1.0 million, including partnerships with a top-tier university medical system and the largest hospital system on the East Coast. The company is expanding its AI and EHR integration services, emphasizing its role as an innovation partner in the healthcare industry.

The introduction of an AI-powered SaaS product, Readabl.ai, enhances document automation by converting unstructured clinical text into actionable data, integrated with electronic health records. This move towards recurring revenue models and community-focused EPIC workflow integrations solidifies HCTI's position as a leader in technology-driven healthcare solutions.

item.title: Nephros, Inc. to Unveil Strategic Growth Plans and Innovations in Water Safety Technologies at Virtual Investor Event
item.description: Nephros, Inc., a leading water technology company, announced an upcoming Analyst and Investor Virtual Event hosted by CEO Robert Banks and CFO Judy Krandel. The event aims to discuss emerging trends and innovations in the water safety landscape.

item.title: Benchmark Equity Research Initiates Coverage on TNL Mediagene with Speculative Buy Rating
item.description:
TNL Mediagene, a next-gen media company focused on Millennial and Gen Z audiences in Japan and Taiwan, is gaining attention from Wall Street with Benchmark Equity Research initiating coverage and setting a $3.50 per share price target. The company boasts 45 million monthly unique users and operates 25 publications across various genres.

What sets TNL Mediagene apart is its technology-first approach to advertising and marketing, leveraging AI to offer data-driven solutions for businesses. The company's dual growth strategy includes organic investments in AI and personalized content, as well as acquisitions to expand its tech prowess and audience reach.

item.title: Telvantis to Unveil Q1 Performance and Growth Strategies in Virtual Investor Call
item.description: Raadr Inc. (OTC: RDAR), known as Telvantis, a leading technology-driven telecommunications and enterprise solutions provider, has announced details of its upcoming virtual investor call scheduled for Monday, June 2, 2025, at 4:30 PM Eastern Time. The call will provide insights into Telvantis’ first-quarter performance, strategic initiatives, financial achievements, and future growth plans. Investors can register for the event and submit questions in advance.

item.title: Dubai Introduces 24/7 Roadside Assistance to Enhance Driver Safety and Convenience
item.description: Car Garage Expert has launched 24/7 rapid Roadside Assistance services in Dubai, providing immediate support for motorists facing car troubles. The service includes emergency towing, fuel delivery, and on-the-spot repairs, aiming to enhance road safety and convenience.

item.title: Dubai's Car Garage Expert Revolutionizes Vehicle Aesthetics with Advanced Paint and Upholstery Services
item.description: Car Garage Expert expands its services in Dubai with specialized car paint and upholstery options, providing unique customization for car owners in the city. Utilizing advanced technology and skilled technicians, the garage aims to enhance the visual appeal and comfort of every vehicle.

item.title: Moi Moi Fine Jewellery Unveils The Bezel Collection: A Modern Take on Ancient Techniques
item.description: Moi Moi Fine Jewellery introduces The Bezel Collection, a modern take on the classic bezel setting, featuring sleek designs with SUPERNOVA Moissanite gemstones. The collection includes rings, bands, and bracelets designed for everyday wear, emphasizing simplicity and elegance. Celebrities like Lily Collins and Zoe Kravitz have already embraced the trend, making bezel-set jewellery a popular choice.

item.title: Xeikon North America to Showcase Cutting-Edge Digital Printing Technologies at Elgin Innovation Center
item.description:
Xeikon North America will host an Open House event at its Global Innovation Center in Elgin, Illinois, themed 'Innovation in Action'. The event invites visitors to explore smarter ways to grow their print business through digital transformation, featuring live press demonstrations and insights from Xeikon leadership.

The day begins with a catered media luncheon and exclusive press briefing, followed by community access to live demos, tours, and networking. Attendees can meet the Xeikon Executive Team, including Kent Wolford and Robert Welford, and experience the latest innovations firsthand.

item.title: ByEnzo Jewelry Unveils Limited-Edition Hammer Pendant: A Symbol of Power and Legacy
item.description: ByEnzo Jewelry unveils a new Hammer Pendant, meticulously handcrafted in PT950 platinum with 18K gold detailing. The pendant symbolizes power, resilience, and timeless legacy, appealing to those who value craftsmanship and symbolism. Crafted entirely by hand, the design reflects strength and sophistication, making it a statement piece for the modern gentleman.

item.title: Ductless Plus to Showcase Innovative HVAC Solutions on 'Designing Spaces'
item.description: Ductless Plus, a leading HVAC solutions provider in Denver, will be featured on Designing Spaces, highlighting their partnership with Mitsubishi Electric and advanced ductless HVAC systems. The segment will address common misconceptions about heat pumps in cold climates and showcase Ductless Plus's tailored solutions for residential and commercial spaces.

item.title: Enago Launches DocuMark: A New Platform for Ethical AI Use in Academic Submissions
item.description: Enago announces the launch of DocuMark, a platform by Trinka AI, that shifts focus from detection to transparency in AI-assisted student submissions. The tool benefits students by guiding them to take ownership of AI contributions in their work, while providing educators with insights into the writing process.

item.title: Joseph Marino Achieves Prestigious MCMEA Designation, Elevating Truman Mox, Inc.'s National Profile
item.description: Joseph Marino of Truman Mox, Inc. has achieved the Master Certified Machinery & Equipment Appraiser (MCMEA) designation from the NEBB Institute. With over 500 valuations completed, Mr. Marino is known for his accurate and timely appraisal reports for various asset types.

item.title: New Interactive Map Reveals Geographic Distribution of Texas Attorneys
item.description: Darrow Law Firm, P.C. unveiled its 2024 Texas Attorneys Map, showcasing the distribution of lawyers across Texas' counties. The interactive tool, based on data from the American Bar Association and State Bar of Texas, aids in locating legal representation and assessing market opportunities.

item.title: New Podcast 'Threat Level RED' to Unveil Deep Insights into U.S. National Security Threats
item.description: Charles Denyer Productions announces the launch of Threat Level RED podcast, hosted by Charles Denyer. This powerful new podcast delves into the multifaceted threats facing America today, including cyber-attacks, terrorism, and more. Denyer provides expert analysis based on his extensive experience advising top government officials.

item.title: Annapurna Encounter Pvt. Ltd. Offers Up to 50% Off on Nepal Trekking Packages for Autumn 2025
item.description: Annapurna Encounter Pvt. Ltd., a leading adventure travel company based in Kathmandu, Nepal, has officially opened booking for its Autumn 2025 trekking season, offering exclusive discounts of up to 50% on selected trekking packages. Trekkers can now take advantage of discounted rates on popular trekking routes like Everest Base Camp and Annapurna Base Camp. The company ensures safety, sustainability, and personalized service for authentic Himalayan adventures.

item.title: FlipHTML5 Revolutionizes Architectural Portfolio Presentation with AI and Customization Tools
item.description: FlipHTML5, a leading digital publishing platform, offers a range of architectural portfolio templates designed to help architects and designers showcase their work effectively. These templates provide professionals with flexible, user-friendly ways to create polished portfolios that highlight their projects and expertise, catering to the needs of architects, firms, and students alike. The online editor in FlipHTML5 enhances the usability of its architectural portfolio templates, requiring no advanced technical skills, and allows for customization to adapt to various professional scenarios.

item.title: Fusion Fuel Green PLC Expands Energy Services Footprint with £50 Million UK Acquisition
item.description: Fusion Fuel Green (NASDAQ: HTOO) has signed non-binding Heads of Terms to acquire a UK-based fuel distribution business for £50 million, enhancing its energy portfolio. The target company reported FY2025 revenues of $58 million and net income of $7 million, with minimal debt. The acquisition aligns with Fusion Fuel's strategy to diversify and synergize its operations.

item.title: Fusion Fuel Green PLC Expands Energy Portfolio with Strategic UK Acquisition
item.description: Fusion Fuel Green (NASDAQ: HTOO) announced the signing of non-binding Heads of Terms to acquire a UK-based fuel distribution business for £50 million, with £40 million in debt-financed cash and £10 million in Fusion Fuel ordinary shares. The target company had FY2025 revenues of $58 million and net income of $7 million, with minimal debt. This acquisition aligns with Fusion Fuel’s strategy to diversify its energy portfolio.

item.title: Dating Apps at a Crossroads: User Exodus Signals Demand for Deeper Connections
item.description: Online dating apps are losing popularity as users turn away from them. Companies like Momo Inc. (NASDAQ: MOMO) are now challenged to provide what users really want to stay relevant in the changing landscape.

item.description: Donald Trump recently hosted a high-profile dinner event featuring the biggest investors in a crypto that shares his name, triggering criticism from political opponents and protesters alike. Analysts say the crypto industry and its established actors like BitFuFu Inc. (NASDAQ: FUFU) wouldn’t want the industry to be embroiled in further unwanted controversy at a time when they have just got…

item.title: Nancy Foran-Pinzon Joins Peapack Private Bank & Trust to Spearhead Commercial Banking Growth
item.description:
Nancy Foran-Pinzon has joined Peapack Private Bank & Trust as a Senior Managing Director and Group Director in the Commercial Banking division, focusing on expanding the bank's presence in Long Island and the Tri-State Area. With previous experience at Flagstar Bank and Fleet Bank, Nancy brings a wealth of expertise to her new role.

Peapack-Gladstone Financial Corporation, the parent company of Peapack Private Bank & Trust, offers a client-centric approach to banking, wealth management, investment banking, and personal banking solutions. Founded in 1921, the bank prioritizes high-quality products and customized services to meet the diverse needs of its clients.

item.title: SolarBank Corporation Reports Significant Financial Growth and Strategic Shift Towards Renewable Energy
item.description: SolarBank Corporation reported a 395% increase in total assets, reaching $194 million by March 31, 2025, following a strategic acquisition. Revenue from the independent power producer segment surged from $0.3 million to $6.6 million, showcasing a shift towards long-term income-generating assets. SolarBank's focus on sustainable energy projects and operational milestones during the third quarter align with this revenue strategy.

item.title: Newton Golf Revolutionizes the Game with Fast Motion Shaft Technology
item.description: Newton Golf has unveiled its new Fast Motion shaft, showcasing innovation in the golf equipment market. The product incorporates proprietary technologies and aims to set new performance standards.

item.title: Fusion Fuel Green PLC Expands Its Energy Portfolio with Strategic UK Acquisition
item.description:
Fusion Fuel Green (NASDAQ: HTOO) has entered into non-binding Heads of Terms to acquire a UK-based fuel distribution business for £50 million, with £40 million in cash and £10 million in shares. The target company reported strong financials in FY2025, and the acquisition aligns with Fusion Fuel's strategic energy portfolio goals.

The acquisition complements Fusion Fuel's existing operations, including Al Shola Gas, and supports the company's strategy to build a diversified energy portfolio. Fusion Fuel Green PLC (NASDAQ: HTOO) offers energy engineering solutions through its Al Shola Gas and BrightHy subsidiaries, catering to various industrial sectors.

item.title: SKYX Platforms Corp. Joins Russell 2000 and 3000 Indexes, Marking a Milestone in Smart Home Technology
item.description: SKYX Platforms Corp. announced its addition to the Russell 2000® and Russell 3000® indexes, effective June 27, reflecting strategic progress and raising institutional visibility. With over 97 patents, SKYX focuses on smart home technology and safe living environments.

item.title: Shala Hormone Health Launches Innovative Affiliate Program to Empower Women in Wellness
item.description: Shala Hormone Health announces the relaunch of its affiliate program, led by CEO Tori Poulter and Head of Sales Samantha Toomey Ballard. The program offers up to 30% commission, personalized storefronts, built-in training, and community support. Shala's products aim to support women's well-being with solutions for hormone balance, energy, emotional well-being, and restorative sleep.

item.title: Foremost Clean Energy Ltd. Regains NASDAQ Compliance Amid Surging Uranium Market Interest
item.description: Foremost Clean Energy (NASDAQ: FMST) (CSE: FAT) announced it has regained compliance with Nasdaq’s minimum bid price requirement after its stock maintained a closing price of US$1.00 or more from May 9 to May 22. CEO Jason Barnard attributed the 264% rebound in share price to growing investor confidence, citing the company’s exploration success, strategic partnership with Denison Mines (NYSE American: DNN), and heightened focus on uranium’s role in clean energy. He highlighted President Trump’s May 23 executive orders to quadruple U.S. nuclear capacity as a transformative moment for the industry, aligning with Foremost’s position in the Athabasca Basin and its goal of accelerating high-grade uranium production through collaboration with Denison.

item.title: KDW Celebrates 130 Years of Innovation and Leadership in Design-Build Industry
item.description: KDW celebrates 130 years of family-owned operations, evolving into Texas' premier design-builder. The firm's legacy began in 1895 with the Kingham family in Nacogdoches, shaping East Texas' infrastructure. Today, KDW continues to excel in commercial and industrial sectors with a focus on excellence and integrity.

item.title: UN Explores Regulation of AI in Military Technologies Amid Global Concerns
item.description:
The UN General Assembly is exploring the use of AI in weaponry, while companies like Thumzup Media Corp. (NASDAQ: TZUP) are leveraging AI for business growth.

AINewsWire provides insights on AI advancements, serving as a platform for innovative technologies and trends.

item.title: Silvercorp Metals Inc. Announces Semi-Annual Dividend, Reinforcing Financial Stability and ESG Commitment
item.description:
Silvercorp Metals (TSX: SVM) (NYSE American: SVM) declared a semi-annual dividend of US$0.0125 per share, payable by June 26. Future dividends will be determined based on market conditions. Silvercorp is a Canadian mining company producing silver, gold, lead, and zinc, focusing on generating free cash flow, organic growth, and responsible mining.

Rocks & Stocks, a specialized communications platform, offers insights into the mining industry. It provides wire solutions, editorial syndication, press release enhancement, social media distribution, and corporate communications solutions. Rocks & Stocks is where breaking news, insightful content, and actionable information converge.

item.title: SolarBank Corporation Advances Nova Scotia's Renewable Energy Goals with New Solar Project
item.description: SolarBank Corporation will develop the 6.9 MW DC Brooklyn solar project in Nova Scotia under Canada’s first Community Solar Program. Owned by AI Renewable Fund, the $13.9 million project will be built in partnership with local firm Trimac Engineering. SolarBank will oversee interconnection, permitting, and design through 2025, with construction expected to begin in spring 2026. The company also disclosed a shares-for-services agreement with an independent advisor valued at up to $100,000 USD per month, tied to strategic growth and advisory milestones.

item.title: Healthcare Triangle Launches QuantumNexis to Revolutionize Healthcare with Generative AI
item.description:
Healthcare Triangle, Inc. (Nasdaq: HCTI) announced the launch of QuantumNexis, a new subsidiary focusing on AI-powered SaaS solutions for the healthcare market. QuantumNexis will acquire Niyama Healthcare and Ezovion Solutions to enhance clinical efficiency and mental health accessibility.

The integration of Niyama's Gen AI mental health technology and Ezovion's hospital intelligence platform will address global healthcare demands. This move aims to accelerate growth and establish HCTI as a leader in Gen AI-powered healthcare technology.

item.title: IEA Warns of Impending Copper Shortage Threatening Global Clean Energy Transition
item.description: The International Energy Agency predicts a copper supply shortage in the next decade due to increased demand for the metal in clean energy technologies. The warning signals favorable market conditions for companies like Torr Metals Inc., which holds abundant copper reserves.

item.title: HR.com Launches Subscription Program to Boost HR Consultants' Professional Visibility
item.description: HR.com introduces a new subscription-based HR consultant branding program aimed at enhancing visibility and authority for HR professionals. The program offers three levels of subscriptions with reward points for active engagement, allowing consultants to lower their costs. With a community of over 2 million HR professionals, HR.com provides opportunities for consultants to showcase their expertise and connect with HR leaders seeking guidance and solutions.

item.title: Backus Smiles Clinches Best Orthodontic Practice Title for Fifth Consecutive Year
item.description: Backus Smiles orthodontic practice wins the 2025’s Best Orthodontic Practice award from Homewood Magazine, selected by readers. Dr. Dominique Backus expresses gratitude for the continuous support of patients and community. The practice offers expert orthodontic care for adults, kids, and teens, emphasizing patient comfort and transforming smiles in Homewood and Birmingham.

item.title: Creative Professional Reinterprets Biblical Teachings for the Modern Era in New Book
item.description: Barbara Camp, a former Playboy Bunny turned author and artist, releases a book titled ‘Your Soul: Fixer-Upper or Tear-Down?’ where she uses short stories to convey Biblical wisdom in modern metaphors. The book serves as a compass for both believers and skeptics, offering ancient to modern metaphors to guide readers on a spiritual journey.

item.title: Save Fry Oil Launches Restaurant Talk Podcast to Empower Foodservice Professionals
item.description: Save Fry Oil, a leader in sustainable fry-oil care, has launched a new podcast, Restaurant Talk by Save Fry Oil. The podcast features real conversations with industry experts, offering insights on kitchen challenges, efficiency, and oil management. Listeners can expect behind-the-scenes interviews, pro tips on fry-oil care, and success stories from the food service world.

item.title: DFW Car & Toy Museum Enhances Visitor Experience with Autonomous Cleaning Robot
item.description: At the DFW Car & Toy Museum, Fast Fred, a fully autonomous robotic floor scrubber, has become a fan favorite among guests. Named in honor of the founder's late twin brother, Fast Fred uses precision cleaning technology to keep the museum's 150,000 square feet facility spotless. The robot runs in three-hour shifts daily, captivating visitors with its efficiency and charm.

item.title: FlipinTheBird Lure Co Introduces Revolutionary 5-Inch Monster Bird Lure for Enhanced Fishing Experience
item.description: Former Super Bowl Champion and co-founder of FlipinTheBird, Sam Kennedy, introduces the new 5-inch model that mimics a real bird with lifelike features. The product is designed to be louder, larger, and more realistic, meeting the demands of avid anglers.

item.title: THE GUIDE: A Revolutionary Device Enhancing Traveler Safety Launches on Kickstarter
item.description: The launch of THE GUIDE, a revolutionary safety and convenience device, is set to transform the way travelers explore the world. This palm-sized accessory offers features like real-time location sharing, anti-theft protection, security monitoring, emergency voice assistance, and more, catering to modern travelers' needs. The Kickstarter campaign provides early-bird discounts for backers, making it the ultimate travel companion.

item.title: Mango AI Revolutionizes Pet Interaction with AI-Powered Talking Animal Videos
item.description: Mango AI introduces a tool that transforms pet images into talking animals, enhancing the emotional bond with pets. The platform supports various animals, allowing users to personalize speech with voice recordings or AI-generated voices.

item.title: Smodin Introduces Advanced AI Detection Tool to Combat AI-Generated Content Challenges
item.description:
As artificial intelligence (AI) becomes increasingly prevalent in content creation, the demand for tools that verify content authenticity has never been higher. Smodin, a leading provider of AI detection technology, is responding to this critical need with an advanced solution designed to help users identify whether content was written by a human or generated by AI.

With AI now being used to produce essays, articles, marketing content, and even computer code, the line between machine-generated and human-authored content is becoming harder to define. While these technologies offer convenience and innovation, they also raise concerns around academic integrity, misinformation, and the erosion of original human expression in professional communications.

Meeting the Growing Demand for Authentic Content

The Smodin AI Detector offers high-accuracy content verification, helping individuals and organizations ensure the originality and reliability of written material. Its applications extend across multiple industries, including education, media, and business.

Advanced Detection Capabilities: Smodin uses sophisticated algorithms to detect linguistic patterns characteristic of AI-generated content, ensuring accurate and dependable results.

Transparent Reporting: Unlike many detection tools, Smodin provides clear, understandable output, enabling users to make informed decisions.

Global Language Support: Smodin accommodates multilingual users with detection capabilities in languages such as French, German, and Spanish.

User-Centric Design: Whether used by students, educators, or professionals, Smodin’s intuitive interface ensures accessibility for all.

Continuously Updated Technology: As AI writing tools evolve, Smodin’s detection engine is regularly enhanced to remain effective and up-to-date.

Serving a Broad User Base Across Industries

Educational Institutions: Enable educators to uphold academic standards by verifying the authenticity of student submissions.

Writers and Students: Allow individuals to self-check their work and avoid issues related to unintentional AI use or plagiarism.

Corporate Teams: Help marketing and communications departments maintain originality in customer-facing materials.

Media Organizations: Equip journalists and publishers with tools to uphold editorial integrity and trust.

General Readers: Empower content consumers to better evaluate the credibility of the information they encounter online.

As digital content becomes more ubiquitous, so too does the importance of being able to assess its origin. Smodin is committed to supporting modern digital literacy by helping users navigate a content landscape shaped by AI.

About the Company

Smodin is a technology company dedicated to enhancing digital integrity through advanced AI detection tools. Serving users worldwide, Smodin empowers individuals, educators, businesses, and publishers to verify the authenticity of content in an era defined by artificial intelligence. With a focus on innovation, transparency, and user experience, Smodin continues to lead the way in promoting content authenticity across industries.

Kevin Danikowski

support@smodin.io

Company Website

https://smodin.io

item.title: Paperchase Revolutionizes Hospitality Industry Financial Management with Strategic Revenue Optimization
item.description: Paperchase, a global leader in restaurant accounting firms, is expanding its services in revenue management, restaurant bookkeeping, and outsourced accounting for the hospitality sector. With over 30 years of experience, Paperchase helps clients make data-driven decisions to manage profitability in a competitive environment. Their specialized services include daily sales reconciliation, payroll, cash flow forecasting, and strategic revenue planning.

item.title: Youspi Consulting GmbH Introduces 'Castle of Lost Magic' Workshop to Transform Business Strategy with Human-Centered Design
item.description: Youspi Consulting GmbH launches Castle of Lost Magic, a new executive workshop focusing on human-centered experience design. The program aims to help business leaders rethink corporate strategies through emotional storytelling and immersive experiences. This initiative reflects the company's commitment to transforming how organizations engage with customers in a digital world.

item.title: Emdoor Digital Unveils Cutting-Edge AI and Personal Computing Innovations at COMPUTEX 2025
item.description: The COMPUTEX 2025 event in Taipei showcased Emdoor Digital's innovative AI products, including the 959 Series AI PCs and 326 Series notebooks. The AI glasses collaboration with Emdoor VR also drew attention for its end-to-end intelligent system.

item.title: Dubai's Car Garage Expert Sets New Standards in Automotive Aesthetics with Innovative Painting Solutions
item.description:
Car Garage Expert is transforming car painting solutions in Dubai with state-of-the-art facilities and skilled professionals, setting new standards for vehicle aesthetics and paintwork quality.

Specializing in premium car painting services, they offer advanced techniques and high-quality materials for a flawless finish, catering to color customization, fresh looks, and paint restoration.

item.title: Innovative Model Sheds Light on Human Impact on Water Resources in Arid Regions
item.description: A recent study unveils an innovative data-driven model to differentiate human-induced and natural water consumption in croplands, highlighting the sustainability of arid lake ecosystems. Drylands, supporting 38% of the global population, face pressure from agricultural expansion, impacting water resources. The study, published by researchers from the Chinese Academy of Sciences and collaborators, focuses on the Ebinur Lake Basin in China, revealing insights for sustainable resource management.

item.title: New Online Guide Offers Comprehensive Solutions for Rat Infestations
item.description: RedRodentRemover.com, a new affiliate-powered resource site, has unveiled its flagship article, 'The Ultimate Guide to Rat Control,' to help homeowners facing rodent problems. The guide, authored by Thomas Fitzpatrick, covers identifying rat species, spotting infestations, DIY solutions, sanitation strategies, and when to call professionals. It also provides step-by-step elimination techniques, product recommendations, and a direct phone number for connecting with local exterminators.

item.title: Fractured Horizons Exhibition at NYCxDesign Festival 2025 Bridges Cultural Heritage and Technological Innovation
item.description: Fractured Horizons: The Future of Heritage & Innovation, a groundbreaking international exhibition, recently concluded its run at the NYCxDesign Festival 2025. Organized by VSDesign and partnered by WorldArtExchange, the event brought together artists and tech pioneers to explore the intersection of cultural heritage and technology.

item.title: Ethema Health Corporation Reports Growth and Expansion Amid Challenges
item.description: Ethema Health Corporation files its annual report on Form 10-K, showcasing strong revenue growth and operational updates. The company experienced an increase in revenue from core in-patient services and expansion in Florida and Kentucky. Operating expenses also rose due to the addition of new facilities, resulting in a net operating loss for the year. However, with the re-certification by the Joint Commission and successful integration of new locations, Ethema is optimistic about future revenue prospects.

item.title: ESGold Corp. Identifies Promising New Exploration Target at Montauban Project
item.description:
ESGold, a fully permitted, pre-production resource company, identified a significant geophysical anomaly in the southwest portion of its Montauban Project in Quebec. The zone displays characteristics associated with buried, sulfide-rich VMS deposits high in base and precious metals.

President Brad Kitchen highlighted the zone as a high-priority exploration target, emphasizing the company's focus on production and the potential for self-funded discovery. ESGold's sustainable mining practices at the Montauban property in Quebec position it for long-term value creation.

item.title: ONAR Holding Corp. Revolutionizes Marketing Services with AI-Driven Agency Network
item.description: ONAR (OTCQB: ONAR) is a leading marketing technology company and marketing agency network focused on delivering integrated, AI-driven solutions to accelerate revenue growth for its clients. The company's strategic growth model aims to redefine marketing services by leading with technological advancement and acquiring proven agencies under one umbrella to deliver superior service offerings across industries. ONAR's network of agencies services companies ranging from $50M to $1B+ in revenue, actively seeking to acquire more agencies to expand its reach and impact.

item.title: Search Atlas Revolutionizes Digital Marketing with AI-Powered SEO Services
item.description: Search Atlas revolutionizes SEO with AI automation tools, introducing OTTO SEO for streamlined optimization. The company's comprehensive services empower businesses to enhance digital marketing strategies.

item.title: Summit Restoration Expands to Tampa, Enhancing Disaster Recovery Services in Florida
item.description: Summit Restoration announces the opening of a new regional headquarters in Tampa, Florida, to enhance disaster recovery services across the state. The facility will house a training center and logistics warehouse, creating over 30 new jobs and supporting local economic development.
